name: Bulbasaur
pokedexX: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth.  The plant sprouts and grows with this PokÃ©mon.
pokedexY: For some time after its birth, it grows by gaining nourishment from the seed on its back.
pokedexOR: Bulbasaur can be seen napping in bright sunlight. There is a seed on its back. By soaking up the sun's rays, the seed grows progressively larger.
pokedexAS: Bulbasaur can be seen napping in bright sunlight. There is a seed on its back. By soaking up the sun's rays, the seed grows progressively larger.

name: Ivysaur
pokedexX: There is a plant bulb on its back. When it absorbs nutrients, the bulb is said to blossom into a large flower.
pokedexY: When the bud on its back starts swelling, a sweet  aroma wafts to indicate the flower's coming bloom.
pokedexOR: There is a bud on this PokÃ©mon's back. To support its weight, Ivysaur's legs and trunk grow thick and strong. If it starts spending more time lying in the sunlight, it's a sign that the bud will bloom into a large flower soon.
pokedexAS: There is a bud on this PokÃ©mon's back. To support its weight, Ivysaur's legs and trunk grow thick and strong. If it starts spending more time lying in the sunlight, it's a sign that the bud will bloom into a large flower soon.

name: Venusaur
pokedexX: By spreading the broad petals of its flower and catching the sun's rays, it fills its body with power.
pokedexY: After a rainy day, the flower on its back smells  stronger. The scent attracts other PokÃ©mon.
pokedexOR: There is a large flower on Venusaur's back. The flower is said to take on vivid colors if it gets plenty of nutrition and sunlight. The flower's aroma soothes the emotions of people.
pokedexAS: There is a large flower on Venusaur's back. The flower is said to take on vivid colors if it gets plenty of nutrition and sunlight. The flower's aroma soothes the emotions of people.

name: Charmander
pokedexX: The flame on its tail indicates Charmander's life  force. If it's healthy, the flame burns brightly.
pokedexY: From the time is born, a flame burns at the tip of  its tail. Its life would end if the flame were to  go out.
pokedexOR: The flame that burns at the tip of its tail is an indication of its emotions. The flame wavers when Charmander is enjoying itself. If the PokÃ©mon becomes enraged, the flame burns fiercely.
pokedexAS: The flame that burns at the tip of its tail is an indication of its emotions. The flame wavers when Charmander is enjoying itself. If the PokÃ©mon becomes enraged, the flame burns fiercely.

name: Charmeleon
pokedexX: It lashes about with its tail to knock down its foe.  It then tears up the fallen opponent with  sharp claws.
pokedexY: When it swings its burning tail, it elevates the air temperature to unbearably high levels.
pokedexOR: Charmeleon mercilessly destroys its foes using its sharp claws. If it encounters a strong foe, it turns aggressive. In this excited state, the flame at the tip of its tail flares with a bluish white color.
pokedexAS: Charmeleon mercilessly destroys its foes using its sharp claws. If it encounters a strong foe, it turns aggressive. In this excited state, the flame at the tip of its tail flares with a bluish white color.

name: Charizard
pokedexX: When expelling a blast of superhot fire, the red flame at the tip of its tail burns more intensely.
pokedexY: Its wings can carry this PokÃ©mon close to an altitude of 4,600 feet. It blows out fire at very high temperatures.
pokedexOR: Charizard flies around the sky in search of powerful opponents. It breathes fire of such great heat that it melts anything. However, it never turns its fiery breath on any opponent weaker than itself.
pokedexAS: Charizard flies around the sky in search of powerful opponents. It breathes fire of such great heat that it melts anything. However, it never turns its fiery breath on any opponent weaker than itself.

name: Squirtle
pokedexX: It shelters itself in its shell, then strikes back with spouts of water at every opportunity.
pokedexY: Shoots water at prey while in the water. Withdraws into its shell when in danger.
pokedexOR: Squirtle's shell is not merely used for protection. The shell's rounded shape and the grooves on its surface help minimize resistance in water, enabling this PokÃ©mon to swim at high speeds.
pokedexAS: Squirtle's shell is not merely used for protection. The shell's rounded shape and the grooves on its surface help minimize resistance in water, enabling this PokÃ©mon to swim at high speeds.

name: Wartortle
pokedexX: When tapped, this PokÃ©mon will pull in its head, but its tail will still stick out a little bit.
pokedexY: It is said to live 10,000 years. Its furry tail is popular as a symbol of longevity.
pokedexOR: Its tail is large and covered with a rich, thick fur. The tail becomes increasingly deeper in color as Wartortle ages. The scratches on its shell are evidence of this PokÃ©mon's toughness as a battler.
pokedexAS: Its tail is large and covered with a rich, thick fur. The tail becomes increasingly deeper in color as Wartortle ages. The scratches on its shell are evidence of this PokÃ©mon's toughness as a battler.

name: Blastoise
pokedexX: It crushes its foe under its heavy body to cause fainting. In a pinch, it will withdraw inside its shell.
pokedexY: The pressurized water jets on this brutal PokÃ©mon's shell are used for high-speed tackles.
pokedexOR: Blastoise has water spouts that protrude from its shell. The water spouts are very accurate. They can shoot bullets of water with enough accuracy to strike empty cans from a distance of over 160 feet.
pokedexAS: Blastoise has water spouts that protrude from its shell. The water spouts are very accurate. They can shoot bullets of water with enough accuracy to strike empty cans from a distance of over 160 feet.

name: Caterpie
pokedexX: For protection, it releases a horrible stench from the antennae on its head to drive away enemies.
pokedexY: Its feet have suction cups designed to stick to any surface. It tenaciously climbs trees to forage.
pokedexOR: Caterpie has a voracious appetite. It can devour leaves bigger than its body right before your eyes. From its antenna, this PokÃ©mon releases a terrifically strong odor.
pokedexAS: Caterpie has a voracious appetite. It can devour leaves bigger than its body right before your eyes. From its antenna, this PokÃ©mon releases a terrifically strong odor.

name: Metapod
pokedexX: A steel-hard shell protects its tender body. It quietly endures hardships while awaiting evolution.
pokedexY: This PokÃ©mon is vulnerable to attack while its shell is soft, exposing its weak and tender body.
pokedexOR: The shell covering this PokÃ©mon's body is as hard as an iron slab. Metapod does not move very much. It stays still because it is preparing its soft innards for evolution inside the hard shell.
pokedexAS: The shell covering this PokÃ©mon's body is as hard as an iron slab. Metapod does not move very much. It stays still because it is preparing its soft innards for evolution inside the hard shell.

name: Butterfree
pokedexX: It loves the honey of flowers and can locate flower patches that have even tiny amounts of pollen.
pokedexY: The wings are protected by rain-repellent dust. As a result, this PokÃ©mon can fly about even in rain.
pokedexOR: Butterfree has a superior ability to search for delicious honey from flowers. It can even search out, extract, and carry honey from flowers that are blooming over six miles from its nest.
pokedexAS: Butterfree has a superior ability to search for delicious honey from flowers. It can even search out, extract, and carry honey from flowers that are blooming over six miles from its nest.

name: Weedle
pokedexX: Often found in forests and grasslands. It has a sharp, toxic barb of around two inches on top of its head.
pokedexY: Its poison stinger is very powerful. Its bright-colored body is intended to warn off its enemies.
pokedexOR: Weedle has an extremely acute sense of smell. It is capable of distinguishing its favorite kinds of leaves from those it dislikes just by sniffing with its big red proboscis (nose).
pokedexAS: Weedle has an extremely acute sense of smell. It is capable of distinguishing its favorite kinds of leaves from those it dislikes just by sniffing with its big red proboscis (nose).

name: Kakuna
pokedexX: Almost incapable of moving, this PokÃ©mon can only harden its shell to protect itself when it is in danger.
pokedexY: While awaiting evolution, it hides from predators under leaves and in nooks of branches.
pokedexOR: Kakuna remains virtually immobile as it clings to a tree. However, on the inside, it is extremely busy as it prepares for its coming evolution. This is evident from how hot the shell becomes to the touch.
pokedexAS: Kakuna remains virtually immobile as it clings to a tree. However, on the inside, it is extremely busy as it prepares for its coming evolution. This is evident from how hot the shell becomes to the touch.

name: Beedrill
pokedexX: It has three poisonous stingers on its forelegs and its tail. They are used to jab its enemy repeatedly.
pokedexY: May appear in a swarm. Flies at violent speeds, all the while stabbing with the toxic stinger on its rear.
pokedexOR: Beedrill is extremely territorial. No one should ever approach its nest-this is for their own safety. If angered, they will attack in a furious swarm.
pokedexAS: Beedrill is extremely territorial. No one should ever approach its nest-this is for their own safety. If angered, they will attack in a furious swarm.

name: Pidgey
pokedexX: A common sight in forests and woods. It flaps its wings at ground level to kick up blinding sand.
pokedexY: It is docile and prefers to avoid conflict. If disturbed, however, it can ferociously strike back.
pokedexOR: Pidgey has an extremely sharp sense of direction. It is capable of unerringly returning home to its nest, however far it may be removed from its familiar surroundings.
pokedexAS: Pidgey has an extremely sharp sense of direction. It is capable of unerringly returning home to its nest, however far it may be removed from its familiar surroundings.

name: Pidgeotto
pokedexX: The claws on its feet are well developed. It can carry prey such as an Exeggcute to its nest over 60 miles away.
pokedexY: Very protective of its sprawling territorial area, this PokÃ©mon will fiercely peck at any intruder.
pokedexOR: Pidgeotto claims a large area as its own territory. This PokÃ©mon flies around, patrolling its living space. If its territory is violated, it shows no mercy in thoroughly punishing the foe with its sharp claws.
pokedexAS: Pidgeotto claims a large area as its own territory. This PokÃ©mon flies around, patrolling its living space. If its territory is violated, it shows no mercy in thoroughly punishing the foe with its sharp claws.

name: Pidgeot
pokedexX: When hunting, it skims the surface of water at high speed to pick off unwary prey such as Magikarp.
pokedexY: It spreads its gorgeous wings widely to intimidate enemies. It races through the skies at Mach-2 speed.
pokedexOR: This PokÃ©mon has a dazzling plumage of beautifully glossy feathers. Many Trainers are captivated by the striking beauty of the feathers on its head, compelling them to choose Pidgeot as their PokÃ©mon.
pokedexAS: This PokÃ©mon has a dazzling plumage of beautifully glossy feathers. Many Trainers are captivated by the striking beauty of the feathers on its head, compelling them to choose Pidgeot as their PokÃ©mon.

name: Rattata
pokedexX: Living wherever there is food available, it ceaselessly scavenges for edibles the entire day.
pokedexY: Its fangs are long and very sharp. They grow continuously, so it gnaws on hard things to whittle them down.
pokedexOR: Rattata is cautious in the extreme. Even while it is asleep, it constantly listens by moving its ears around. It is not picky about where it lives-it will make its nest anywhere.
pokedexAS: Rattata is cautious in the extreme. Even while it is asleep, it constantly listens by moving its ears around. It is not picky about where it lives-it will make its nest anywhere.

name: Raticate
pokedexX: It whittles its constantly growing fangs by gnawing on hard things. It can chew apart cinder walls.
pokedexY: The webs on its hind legs enable it to cross rivers. It searches wide areas for food
pokedexOR: Raticate's sturdy fangs grow steadily. To keep them ground down, it gnaws on rocks and logs. It may even chew on the walls of houses.
pokedexAS: Raticate's sturdy fangs grow steadily. To keep them ground down, it gnaws on rocks and logs. It may even chew on the walls of houses.

name: Spearow
pokedexX: Very protective of its territory, it flaps its short wings busily to dart around at high speed.
pokedexY: Eats bugs in grassy areas. It has to flap its short wings at high speed to stay airborne.
pokedexOR: Spearow has a very loud cry that can be heard over half a mile away. If its high, keening cry is heard echoing all around, it is a sign that they are warning each other of danger.
pokedexAS: Spearow has a very loud cry that can be heard over half a mile away. If its high, keening cry is heard echoing all around, it is a sign that they are warning each other of danger.

name: Fearow
pokedexX: With its huge and magnificent wings, it can keep aloft without ever having to land for rest.
pokedexY: It has the stamina to fly all day on its broad wings. It fights by using its sharp beak.
pokedexOR: Fearow is recognized by its long neck and elongated beak. They are conveniently shaped for catching prey in soil or water. It deftly moves its long and skinny beak to pluck prey.
pokedexAS: Fearow is recognized by its long neck and elongated beak. They are conveniently shaped for catching prey in soil or water. It deftly moves its long and skinny beak to pluck prey.

name: Ekans
pokedexX: The older it gets, the longer it grows. At night, it wraps its long body around tree branches to rest.
pokedexY: Moving silently and stealthily, it eats the eggs of birds, such as Pidgey and Spearow, whole.
pokedexOR: Ekans curls itself up in a spiral while it rests. Assuming this position allows it to quickly respond to a threat from any direction with a glare from its upraised head.
pokedexAS: Ekans curls itself up in a spiral while it rests. Assuming this position allows it to quickly respond to a threat from any direction with a glare from its upraised head.

name: Arbok
pokedexX: The pattern on its belly appears to be a frightening face. Weak foes will flee just at the sight of the pattern.
pokedexY: To intimidate foes, it spreads its chest wide and makes eerie sounds by expelling air from its mouth.
pokedexOR: This PokÃ©mon is terrifically strong in order to constrict things with its body. It can even flatten steel oil drums. Once Arbok wraps its body around its foe, escaping its crunching embrace is impossible.
pokedexAS: This PokÃ©mon is terrifically strong in order to constrict things with its body. It can even flatten steel oil drums. Once Arbok wraps its body around its foe, escaping its crunching embrace is impossible.

name: Pikachu
pokedexX: It raises its tail to check its surroundings.  The tail is sometimes struck by lightning  in this pose.
pokedexY: It has small electric sacs on both its cheeks. If threatened, it looses electric charges from the sacs.
pokedexOR: Whenever Pikachu comes across something new, it blasts it with a jolt of electricity. If you come across a blackened berry, it's evidence that this PokÃ©mon mistook the intensity of its charge.
pokedexAS: This PokÃ©mon has electricity-storing pouches on its cheeks. These appear to become electrically charged during the night while Pikachu sleeps. It occasionally discharges electricity when it is dozy after waking up.

name: Raichu
pokedexX: When its electricity builds, its muscles are stimulated, and it becomes more aggressive than usual.
pokedexY: It can loose 100,000-volt bursts of electricity, instantly downing foes several times its size.
pokedexOR: If the electrical sacs become excessively charged, Raichu plants its tail in the ground and discharges. Scorched patches of ground will be found near this PokÃ©mon's nest.
pokedexAS: This PokÃ©mon exudes a weak electrical charge from all over its body that makes it take on a slight glow in darkness. Raichu plants its tail in the ground to discharge electricity.

name: Sandshrew
pokedexX: It burrows and lives underground. If threatened, it curls itself up into a ball for protection.
pokedexY: Disliking water, it lives in deep burrows in arid areas. It can roll itself instantly into a ball.
pokedexOR: Sandshrew's body is configured to absorb water without waste, enabling it to survive in an arid desert. This PokÃ©mon curls up to protect itself from its enemies.
pokedexAS: Sandshrew has a very dry hide that is extremely tough. The PokÃ©mon can roll into a ball that repels any attack. At night, it burrows into the desert sand to sleep.

name: Sandslash
pokedexX: If it digs at an incredible pace, it may snap off its spikes and claws. They grow back in a day.
pokedexY: Curls up into a spiny ball when threatened. It can roll while curled up to attack or escape.
pokedexOR: Sandslash's body is covered by tough spikes, which are hardened sections of its hide. Once a year, the old spikes fall out, to be replaced with new spikes that grow out from beneath the old ones.
pokedexAS: Sandslash can roll up its body as if it were a ball covered with large spikes. In battle, this PokÃ©mon will try to make the foe flinch by jabbing it with its spines. It then leaps at the stunned foe to tear wildly with its sharp claws.

name: Nidoranâ™€
pokedexX: Although small, its venomous barbs render this PokÃ©mon dangerous. The female has smaller horns.
pokedexY: Small and very docile, it protects itself with its small, poisonous horn when attacked.
pokedexOR: Nidoranâ™€ has barbs that secrete a powerful poison. They are thought to have developed as protection for this small-bodied PokÃ©mon. When enraged, it releases a horrible toxin from its horn.
pokedexAS: Nidoranâ™€ has barbs that secrete a powerful poison. They are thought to have developed as protection for this small-bodied PokÃ©mon. When enraged, it releases a horrible toxin from its horn.

name: Nidorina
pokedexX: The female has a gentle temperament. It emits ultrasonic cries that have the power to befuddle foes.
pokedexY: When feeding its young, it first chews the food into  a paste, then spits it out for the offspring.
pokedexOR: When Nidorina are with their friends or family, they keep their barbs tucked away to prevent hurting each other. This PokÃ©mon appears to become nervous if separated from the others.
pokedexAS: When Nidorina are with their friends or family, they keep their barbs tucked away to prevent hurting each other. This PokÃ©mon appears to become nervous if separated from the others.

name: Nidoqueen
pokedexX: It uses its scaly, rugged body to seal the entrance of its nest and protect its young from predators.
pokedexY: The body is covered by stiff, needlelike scales. If it becomes excited, the needles bristle outwards.
pokedexOR: Nidoqueen's body is encased in extremely hard scales. It is adept at sending foes flying with harsh tackles. This PokÃ©mon is at its strongest when it is defending its young.
pokedexAS: Nidoqueen's body is encased in extremely hard scales. It is adept at sending foes flying with harsh tackles. This PokÃ©mon is at its strongest when it is defending its young.

name: Nidoranâ™‚
pokedexX: It scans its surroundings by raising its ears out of the grass. Its toxic horn is for protection.
pokedexY: Its large ears are flapped like wings when it is listening to distant sounds. It extends toxic barbs when angered.
pokedexOR: Nidoranâ™‚ has developed muscles for moving its ears. Thanks to them, the ears can be freely moved in any direction. Even the slightest sound does not escape this PokÃ©mon's notice.
pokedexAS: Nidoranâ™‚ has developed muscles for moving its ears. Thanks to them, the ears can be freely moved in any direction. Even the slightest sound does not escape this PokÃ©mon's notice.

name: Nidorino
pokedexX: It raises its big ears to check its surroundings. If it senses anything, it attacks immediately.
pokedexY: An aggressive PokÃ©mon that is quick to attack. The horn on its head secretes a powerful venom.
pokedexOR: Nidorino has a horn that is harder than a diamond. If it senses a hostile presence, all the barbs on its back bristle up at once, and it challenges the foe with all its might.
pokedexAS: Nidorino has a horn that is harder than a diamond. If it senses a hostile presence, all the barbs on its back bristle up at once, and it challenges the foe with all its might.

name: Nidoking
pokedexX: It is recognized by its rock-hard hide and its extended horn. Be careful with the horn, as it contains venom.
pokedexY: One swing of its mighty tail can snap a telephone pole as if it were a matchstick.
pokedexOR: Nidoking's thick tail packs enormously destructive power. With one swing, it can topple a metal transmission tower. Once this PokÃ©mon goes on a rampage, there is no stopping it.
pokedexAS: Nidoking's thick tail packs enormously destructive power. With one swing, it can topple a metal transmission tower. Once this PokÃ©mon goes on a rampage, there is no stopping it.

name: Clefairy
pokedexX: It is said that happiness will come to those who see a gathering of Clefairy under a full moon.
pokedexY: The moonlight that it stores in the wings on its back apparently gives it the ability to float in midair.
pokedexOR: On every night of a full moon, groups of this PokÃ©mon come out to play. When dawn arrives, the tired Clefairy return to their quiet mountain retreats and go to sleep nestled up against each other.
pokedexAS: On every night of a full moon, groups of this PokÃ©mon come out to play. When dawn arrives, the tired Clefairy return to their quiet mountain retreats and go to sleep nestled up against each other.

name: Clefable
pokedexX: Its hearing is so acute it can hear a pin drop over half a mile away. It lives on quiet mountains.
pokedexY: A timid fairy PokÃ©mon that is rarely seen, it will run and hide the moment it senses people.
pokedexOR: Clefable moves by skipping lightly as if it were flying using its wings. Its bouncy step lets it even walk on water. It is known to take strolls on lakes on quiet, moonlit nights.
pokedexAS: Clefable moves by skipping lightly as if it were flying using its wings. Its bouncy step lets it even walk on water. It is known to take strolls on lakes on quiet, moonlit nights.

name: Vulpix
pokedexX: When it is born, it has just one snow-white tail. The tail splits from its tip as it grows older.
pokedexY: While young, it has six gorgeous tails. When it grows, several new tails are sprouted.
pokedexOR: At the time of its birth, Vulpix has one white tail. The tail separates into six if this PokÃ©mon receives plenty of love from its Trainer. The six tails become magnificently curled.
pokedexAS: Inside Vulpix's body burns a flame that never goes out. During the daytime, when the temperatures rise, this PokÃ©mon releases flames from its mouth to prevent its body from growing too hot.

name: Ninetales
pokedexX: It has nine long tales and fur that gleams gold. It is said to live for 1,000 years.
pokedexY: Very smart and very vengeful. Grabbing one of its many tails could result in a 1,000-year curse.
pokedexOR: Ninetales casts a sinister light from its bright red eyes to gain total control over its foe's mind. This PokÃ©mon is said to live for a thousand years.
pokedexAS: Legend has it that Ninetales came into being when nine wizards possessing sacred powers merged into one. This PokÃ©mon is highly intelligent-it can understand human speech.

name: Jigglypuff
pokedexX: It captivates foes with its huge, round eyes, then lulls them to sleep by singing a soothing melody.
pokedexY: If it inflates to sing a lullaby, it can perform longer and cause sure drowsiness in its audience.
pokedexOR: Jigglypuff's vocal cords can freely adjust the wavelength of its voice. This PokÃ©mon uses this ability to sing at precisely the right wavelength to make its foes most drowsy.
pokedexAS: When this PokÃ©mon sings, it never pauses to breathe. If it is in a battle against an opponent that does not easily fall asleep, Jigglypuff cannot breathe, endangering its life.

name: Wigglytuff
pokedexX: Their fur feels so good that if two of them snuggle together, they won't want to be separated.
pokedexY: The body is soft and rubbery. When angered, it will suck in air and inflate itself to an enormous size.
pokedexOR: Wigglytuff has large, saucerlike eyes. The surfaces of its eyes are always covered with a thin layer of tears. If any dust gets in this PokÃ©mon's eyes, it is quickly washed away.
pokedexAS: Wigglytuff's body is very flexible. By inhaling deeply, this PokÃ©mon can inflate itself seemingly without end. Once inflated, Wigglytuff bounces along lightly like a balloon.

name: Zubat
pokedexX: Even though it has no eyes, it can sense obstacles using ultrasonic waves it emits from its mouth.
pokedexY: It has no eyes. Instead, it relies on its ultrasonic cries for echolocation to flit about in darkness.
pokedexOR: Zubat remains quietly unmoving in a dark spot during the bright daylight hours. It does so because prolonged exposure to the sun causes its body to become slightly burned.
pokedexAS: Zubat avoids sunlight because exposure causes it to become unhealthy. During the daytime, it stays in caves or under the eaves of old houses, sleeping while hanging upside down.

name: Golbat
pokedexX: Once it bites, it will not stop draining energy from the victim even if it gets too heavy to fly.
pokedexY: Once it starts sucking blood, it does not stop until it is full. It flies at night in search of prey.
pokedexOR: Golbat loves to drink the blood of living things. It is particularly active in the pitch black of night. This PokÃ©mon flits around in the night skies, seeking fresh blood.
pokedexAS: Golbat bites down on prey with its four fangs and drinks the victim's blood. It becomes active on inky dark moonless nights, flying around to attack people and PokÃ©mon.

name: Oddish
pokedexX: During the day, it stays in the cold underground to avoid the sun. It grows by bathing in moonlight.
pokedexY: Its scientific name is "Oddium Wanderus." At night, it is said to walk nearly 1,000 feet on its two roots.
pokedexOR: During the daytime, Oddish buries itself in soil to absorb nutrients from the ground using its entire body. The more fertile the soil, the glossier its leaves become.
pokedexAS: Oddish searches for fertile, nutrient-rich soil, then plants itself. During the daytime, while it is planted, this PokÃ©mon's feet are thought to change shape and become similar to the roots of trees.

name: Gloom
pokedexX: Smells incredibly foul! However, around one out of a thousand people enjoy sniffing its nose-bending stink.
pokedexY: The honey it drools from its mouth smells so atrocious, it can curl noses more than a mile away.
pokedexOR: Gloom releases a foul fragrance from the pistil of its flower. When faced with danger, the stench worsens. If this PokÃ©mon is feeling calm and secure, it does not release its usual stinky aroma.
pokedexAS: From its mouth Gloom drips honey that smells absolutely horrible. Apparently, it loves the horrid stench. It sniffs the noxious fumes and then drools even more of its honey.

name: Vileplume
pokedexX: The larger its petals, the more toxic pollen it contains. Its big head is heavy and hard to hold up.
pokedexY: It has the world's largest petals. With every step, the petals shake out heavy clouds of toxic pollen.
pokedexOR: Vileplume's toxic pollen triggers atrocious allergy attacks. That's why it is advisable never to approach any attractive flowers in a jungle, however pretty they may be.
pokedexAS: Vileplume has the world's largest petals. They are used to attract prey that are then doused with toxic spores. Once the prey are immobilized, this PokÃ©mon catches and devours them.

name: Paras
pokedexX: Growing out of the bug's back are mushrooms called tochukaso. The mushrooms grow with the bug host.
pokedexY: Burrows under the ground to gnaw on tree roots. The mushrooms on its back absorb most of the nutrition.
pokedexOR: Paras has parasitic mushrooms growing on its back called tochukaso. They grow large by drawing nutrients from this Bug PokÃ©mon host. They are highly valued as a medicine for extending life.
pokedexAS: Paras has parasitic mushrooms growing on its back called tochukaso. They grow large by drawing nutrients from this Bug PokÃ©mon host. They are highly valued as a medicine for extending life.

name: Parasect
pokedexX: A mushroom grown larger than the host's body controls Parasect. It scatters poisonous spores.
pokedexY: The larger the mushroom on its back grows, the stronger the mushroom spores it scatters.
pokedexOR: Parasect is known to infest large trees en masse and drain nutrients from the lower trunk and roots. When an infested tree dies, they move onto another tree all at once.
pokedexAS: Parasect is known to infest large trees en masse and drain nutrients from the lower trunk and roots. When an infested tree dies, they move onto another tree all at once.

name: Venonat
pokedexX: Its big eyes are actually clusters of tiny eyes. At night, its kind is drawn by light.
pokedexY: Lives in the shadows of tall trees where it eats bugs. It is attracted by light at night.
pokedexOR: Venonat is said to have evolved with a coat of thin, stiff hair that covers its entire body for protection. It possesses large eyes that never fail to spot even minuscule prey.
pokedexAS: Venonat is said to have evolved with a coat of thin, stiff hair that covers its entire body for protection. It possesses large eyes that never fail to spot even minuscule prey.

name: Venomoth
pokedexX: The scales it scatters will paralyze anyone who touches them, making that person unable to stand.
pokedexY: The wings are covered with dustlike scales. Every time it flaps its wings, it looses highly toxic dust.
pokedexOR: Venomoth is nocturnal-it is a PokÃ©mon that only becomes active at night. Its favorite prey are small insects that gather around streetlights, attracted by the light in the darkness.
pokedexAS: Venomoth is nocturnal-it is a PokÃ©mon that only becomes active at night. Its favorite prey are small insects that gather around streetlights, attracted by the light in the darkness.

name: Diglett
pokedexX: Lives about one yard underground where it feeds on plant roots. It sometimes appears aboveground.
pokedexY: Its skin is very thin. If it is exposed to light, its blood heats up, causing it to grow weak.
pokedexOR: Diglett are raised in most farms. The reason is simple- wherever this PokÃ©mon burrows, the soil is left perfectly tilled for planting crops. This soil is made ideal for growing delicious vegetables.
pokedexAS: Diglett are raised in most farms. The reason is simple- wherever this PokÃ©mon burrows, the soil is left perfectly tilled for planting crops. This soil is made ideal for growing delicious vegetables.

name: Dugtrio
pokedexX: In battle, it digs through the ground and strikes the unsuspecting foe from an unexpected direction.
pokedexY: Extremely powerful, they can dig through even the hardest ground to a depth of over 60 miles.
pokedexOR: Dugtrio are actually triplets that emerged from one body. As a result, each triplet thinks exactly like the other two triplets. They work cooperatively to burrow endlessly.
pokedexAS: Dugtrio are actually triplets that emerged from one body. As a result, each triplet thinks exactly like the other two triplets. They work cooperatively to burrow endlessly.

name: Meowth
pokedexX: It is nocturnal in nature. If it spots something shiny, its eyes glitter brightly.
pokedexY: Adores round objects. It wanders the streets on a nightly basis to look for dropped loose change.
pokedexOR: Meowth withdraws its sharp claws into its paws to slinkily sneak about without making any incriminating footsteps. For some reason, this PokÃ©mon loves shiny coins that glitter with light.
pokedexAS: Meowth withdraws its sharp claws into its paws to slinkily sneak about without making any incriminating footsteps. For some reason, this PokÃ©mon loves shiny coins that glitter with light.

name: Persian
pokedexX: A very haughty PokÃ©mon. Among fans, the size of the jewel in its forehead is a topic of much talk.
pokedexY: Its lithe muscles allow it to walk without making a sound. It attacks in an instant.
pokedexOR: Persian has six bold whiskers that give it a look of toughness. The whiskers sense air movements to determine what is in the PokÃ©mon's surrounding vicinity. It becomes docile if grabbed by the whiskers.
pokedexAS: Persian has six bold whiskers that give it a look of toughness. The whiskers sense air movements to determine what is in the PokÃ©mon's surrounding vicinity. It becomes docile if grabbed by the whiskers.

name: Psyduck
pokedexX: It is constantly wracked by a headache. When the headache turns intense, it begins using mysterious powers.
pokedexY: It has mystical powers but doesn't recall that it has used them. That is why it always looks puzzled.
pokedexOR: Psyduck uses a mysterious power. When it does so, this PokÃ©mon generates brain waves that are supposedly only seen in sleepers. This discovery spurred controversy among scholars.
pokedexAS: If it uses its mysterious power, Psyduck can't remember having done so. It apparently can't form a memory of such an event because it goes into an altered state that is much like deep sleep.

name: Golduck
pokedexX: It appears by waterways at dusk. It may use telekinetic powers if its forehead glows mysteriously.
pokedexY: The forelegs are webbed, helping to make it an adept swimmer. It can be seen swimming elegantly in lakes, etc.
pokedexOR: The webbed flippers on its forelegs and hind legs and the streamlined body of Golduck give it frightening speed. This PokÃ©mon is definitely much faster than even the most athletic swimmer.
pokedexAS: Golduck is the fastest swimmer among all PokÃ©mon. It swims effortlessly, even in a rough, stormy sea. It sometimes rescues people from wrecked ships floundering in high seas.

name: Mankey
pokedexX: It's unsafe to approach if it gets violently enraged for no reason and can't distinguish friends from foes.
pokedexY: It lives in treetop colonies. If one becomes enraged, the whole colony rampages for no reason.
pokedexOR: When Mankey starts shaking and its nasal breathing turns rough, it's a sure sign that it is becoming angry. However, because it goes into a towering rage almost instantly, it is impossible for anyone to flee its wrath.
pokedexAS: When Mankey starts shaking and its nasal breathing turns rough, it's a sure sign that it is becoming angry. However, because it goes into a towering rage almost instantly, it is impossible for anyone to flee its wrath.

name: Primeape
pokedexX: It stops being angry only when nobody else is around. To view this moment is very difficult.
pokedexY: It is always outrageously furious. If it gives chase, it will tenaciously track the target no matter how far.
pokedexOR: When Primeape becomes furious, its blood circulation is boosted. In turn, its muscles are made even stronger. However, it also becomes much less intelligent at the same time.
pokedexAS: When Primeape becomes furious, its blood circulation is boosted. In turn, its muscles are made even stronger. However, it also becomes much less intelligent at the same time.

name: Growlithe
pokedexX: Very friendly and faithful to people. It will try to repel enemies by barking and biting.
pokedexY: It has a brave and trustworthy nature. It fearlessly stands up to bigger and stronger foes.
pokedexOR: Growlithe has a superb sense of smell. Once it smells anything, this PokÃ©mon won't forget the scent, no matter what. It uses its advanced olfactory sense to determine the emotions of other living things.
pokedexAS: Growlithe has a superb sense of smell. Once it smells anything, this PokÃ©mon won't forget the scent, no matter what. It uses its advanced olfactory sense to determine the emotions of other living things.

name: Arcanine
pokedexX: A PokÃ©mon that has long been admired for its beauty. It runs agilely as if on wings.
pokedexY: Its magnificent bark conveys a sense of majesty. Anyone hearing it can't help but grovel before it.
pokedexOR: Arcanine is known for its high speed. It is said to be capable of running over 6,200 miles in a single day and night. The fire that blazes wildly within this PokÃ©mon's body is its source of power.
pokedexAS: Arcanine is known for its high speed. It is said to be capable of running over 6,200 miles in a single day and night. The fire that blazes wildly within this PokÃ©mon's body is its source of power.

name: Poliwag
pokedexX: Its slick black skin is thin and damp. A part of its internal organs can be seen through the skin as a spiral pattern.
pokedexY: The direction of the spiral on the belly differs by area. It is more adept at swimming than walking.
pokedexOR: Poliwag has a very thin skin. It is possible to see the PokÃ©mon's spiral innards right through the skin. Despite its thinness, however, the skin is also very flexible. Even sharp fangs bounce right off it.
pokedexAS: Poliwag has a very thin skin. It is possible to see the PokÃ©mon's spiral innards right through the skin. Despite its thinness, however, the skin is also very flexible. Even sharp fangs bounce right off it.

name: Poliwhirl
pokedexX: It can live in or out of water. When out of water, it constantly sweats to keep its body slimy.
pokedexY: Its two legs are well developed. Even though it can live on the ground, it prefers living in water.
pokedexOR: The surface of Poliwhirl's body is always wet and slick with a slimy fluid. Because of this slippery covering, it can easily slip and slide out of the clutches of any enemy in battle.
pokedexAS: The surface of Poliwhirl's body is always wet and slick with a slimy fluid. Because of this slippery covering, it can easily slip and slide out of the clutches of any enemy in battle.

name: Poliwrath
pokedexX: With extremely tough muscles, it can keep swimming in the Pacific Ocean without resting.
pokedexY: A swimmer adept at both the front crawl and breaststroke. Easily overtakes the best human swimmers.
pokedexOR: Poliwrath's highly developed, brawny muscles never grow fatigued, however much it exercises. It is so tirelessly strong, this PokÃ©mon can swim back and forth across the ocean without effort.
pokedexAS: Poliwrath's highly developed, brawny muscles never grow fatigued, however much it exercises. It is so tirelessly strong, this PokÃ©mon can swim back and forth across the ocean without effort.

name: Abra
pokedexX: It sleeps for 18 hours a day. It uses a variety of extrasensory powers even while asleep.
pokedexY: It senses impending attacks and teleports away to safety before the actual attacks can strike.
pokedexOR: Abra sleeps for eighteen hours a day. However, it can sense the presence of foes even while it is sleeping. In such a situation, this PokÃ©mon immediately teleports to safety.
pokedexAS: Abra needs to sleep for eighteen hours a day. If it doesn't, this PokÃ©mon loses its ability to use telekinetic powers. If it is attacked, Abra escapes using Teleport while it is still sleeping.

name: Kadabra
pokedexX: When it uses its psychic power, it emits strong  alpha waves that can ruin precision devices.
pokedexY: If it uses its abilities, it emits special alpha waves that cause machines to malfunction.
pokedexOR: Kadabra emits a peculiar alpha wave if it develops a headache. Only those people with a particularly strong psyche can hope to become a Trainer of this PokÃ©mon.
pokedexAS: Kadabra holds a silver spoon in its hand. The spoon is used to amplify the alpha waves in its brain. Without the spoon, the PokÃ©mon is said to be limited to half the usual amount of its telekinetic powers.

name: Alakazam
pokedexX: Its brain cells multiply continually until it dies. As a result, it remembers everything.
pokedexY: Its brain can outperform a supercomputer. Its IQ (intelligence quotient) is said to be around 5,000.
pokedexOR: Alakazam's brain continually grows, making its head far too heavy to support with its neck. This PokÃ©mon holds its head up using its psychokinetic power instead.
pokedexAS: Alakazam's brain continually grows, infinitely multiplying brain cells. This amazing brain gives this PokÃ©mon an astoundingly high IQ of 5,000. It has a thorough memory of everything that has occurred in the world.

name: Machop
pokedexX: It hefts a Graveler repeatedly to strengthen its entire body. It uses every type of martial arts.
pokedexY: Its whole body is composed of muscles. Even though it's the size of a human child, it can hurl 100 grown-ups.
pokedexOR: Machop's muscles are special-they never get sore no matter how much they are used in exercise. This PokÃ©mon has sufficient power to hurl a hundred adult humans.
pokedexAS: Machop exercises by hefting around a Graveler as if it were a barbell. There are some Machop that travel the world in a quest to master all kinds of martial arts.

name: Machoke
pokedexX: Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a power-save belt to be able to regulate its motions.
pokedexY: It can lift a dump truck with one hand. Using that power, it helps people with heavy jobs.
pokedexOR: Machoke's thoroughly toned muscles possess the hardness of steel. This PokÃ©mon has so much strength, it can easily hold aloft a sumo wrestler on just one finger.
pokedexAS: Machoke undertakes bodybuilding every day even as it helps people with tough, physically demanding labor. On its days off, this PokÃ©mon heads to the fields and mountains to exercise and train.

name: Machamp
pokedexX: Its four ruggedly developed arms can launch a flurry of 1,000 punches in just two seconds.
pokedexY: It uses its four powerful arms to pin the limbs of its foe, then throws the victim over the horizon.
pokedexOR: Machamp has the power to hurl anything aside. However, trying to do any work requiring care and dexterity causes its arms to get tangled. This PokÃ©mon tends to leap into action before it thinks.
pokedexAS: Machamp is known as the PokÃ©mon that has mastered every kind of martial arts. If it grabs hold of the foe with its four arms, the battle is all but over. The hapless foe is thrown far over the horizon.

name: Bellsprout
pokedexX: Even though its body is extremely skinny, it is blindingly fast when catching its prey.
pokedexY: Its bud looks like a human face. Because of the bud, it is rumored to be a type of legendary  mandrake plant.
pokedexOR: Bellsprout's thin and flexible body lets it bend and sway to avoid any attack, however strong it may be. From its mouth, this PokÃ©mon spits a corrosive fluid that melts even iron.
pokedexAS: Bellsprout's thin and flexible body lets it bend and sway to avoid any attack, however strong it may be. From its mouth, this PokÃ©mon spits a corrosive fluid that melts even iron.

name: Weepinbell
pokedexX: The leafy parts act as cutters for slashing foes. It spits a fluid that dissolves everything.
pokedexY: It spits out Poison Powder to immobilize the enemy  and then finishes it with a spray of Acid.
pokedexOR: Weepinbell has a large hook on its rear end. At night, the PokÃ©mon hooks on to a tree branch and goes to sleep. If it moves around in its sleep, it may wake up to find itself on the ground.
pokedexAS: Weepinbell has a large hook on its rear end. At night, the PokÃ©mon hooks on to a tree branch and goes to sleep. If it moves around in its sleep, it may wake up to find itself on the ground.

name: Victreebel
pokedexX: Said to live in huge colonies deep in jungles, although no one has ever returned from there.
pokedexY: Once ingested into this PokÃ©mon's body,  even the hardest object will melt into nothing.
pokedexOR: Victreebel has a long vine that extends from its head. This vine is waved and flicked about as if it were an animal to attract prey. When an unsuspecting prey draws near, this PokÃ©mon swallows it whole.
pokedexAS: Victreebel has a long vine that extends from its head. This vine is waved and flicked about as if it were an animal to attract prey. When an unsuspecting prey draws near, this PokÃ©mon swallows it whole.

name: Tentacool
pokedexX: Its body is virtually composed of water. It shoots strange beams from its crystal-like eyes.
pokedexY: Drifts in shallow seas. Anglers who hook them by accident are often punished by their stingers.
pokedexOR: Tentacool's body is largely composed of water. If it is removed from the sea, it dries up like parchment. If this PokÃ©mon happens to become dehydrated, put it back into the sea.
pokedexAS: Tentacool absorbs sunlight and refracts it using water inside its body to convert it into beam energy. This PokÃ©mon shoots beams from the small round organ above its eyes.

name: Tentacruel
pokedexX: The tentacles are normally kept short. On hunts, they are extended to ensnare and immobilize prey.
pokedexY: It has 80 tentacles that move about freely.  They can sting, causing poisoning and sharp,  stabbing pain.
pokedexOR: Tentacruel has large red orbs on its head. The orbs glow before lashing the vicinity with a harsh ultrasonic blast. This PokÃ©mon's outburst creates rough waves around it.
pokedexAS: Tentacruel has tentacles that can be freely elongated and shortened at will. It ensnares prey with its tentacles and weakens the prey by dosing it with a harsh toxin. It can catch up to 80 prey at the same time.

name: Geodude
pokedexX: Found in fields and mountains. Mistaking them for boulders, people often step or trip on them.
pokedexY: It is impossible to distinguish from rocks. It slams against others in contests of hardness.
pokedexOR: The longer a Geodude lives, the more its edges are chipped and worn away, making it more rounded in appearance. However, this PokÃ©mon's heart will remain hard, craggy, and rough always.
pokedexAS: When Geodude sleeps deeply, it buries itself halfway into the ground. It will not awaken even if hikers step on it unwittingly. In the morning, this PokÃ©mon rolls downhill in search of food.

name: Graveler
pokedexX: With a free and uncaring nature, it doesn't mind if pieces break off while it rolls down mountains.
pokedexY: Rolls down slopes to move. It rolls over any obstacle without slowing or changing its direction.
pokedexOR: Graveler grows by feeding on rocks. Apparently, it prefers to eat rocks that are covered in moss. This PokÃ©mon eats its way through a ton of rocks on a daily basis.
pokedexAS: Rocks are Graveler's favorite food. This PokÃ©mon will climb a mountain from the base to the summit, crunchingly feasting on rocks all the while. Upon reaching the peak, it rolls back down to the bottom.

name: Golem
pokedexX: It tumbles down mountains, leaving grooves from peak to base. Stay clear of these grooves.
pokedexY: Even dynamite can't harm its hard, boulder-like body. It sheds its hide just once a year.
pokedexOR: Golem live up on mountains. If there is a large earthquake, these PokÃ©mon will come rolling down off the mountains en masse to the foothills below.
pokedexAS: Golem is known for rolling down from mountains. To prevent them from rolling into the homes of people downhill, grooves have been dug into the sides of mountains to serve as guideways for diverting this PokÃ©mon's course.

name: Ponyta
pokedexX: As a newborn, it can barely stand. However, through galloping, its legs are made tougher and faster.
pokedexY: Its legs grow strong while it chases after its parent. It runs in fields and mountains all day.
pokedexOR: Ponyta is very weak at birth. It can barely stand up. This PokÃ©mon becomes stronger by stumbling and falling to keep up with its parent.
pokedexAS: Ponyta is very weak at birth. It can barely stand up. This PokÃ©mon becomes stronger by stumbling and falling to keep up with its parent.

name: Rapidash
pokedexX: Very competitive, this PokÃ©mon will chase anything that moves fast in the hopes of racing it.
pokedexY: It gallops at nearly 150 mph. With its mane blazing ferociously, it races as if it were an arrow.
pokedexOR: Rapidash usually can be seen casually cantering in the fields and plains. However, when this PokÃ©mon turns serious, its fiery manes flare and blaze as it gallops its way up to 150 mph.
pokedexAS: Rapidash usually can be seen casually cantering in the fields and plains. However, when this PokÃ©mon turns serious, its fiery manes flare and blaze as it gallops its way up to 150 mph.

name: Slowpoke
pokedexX: It is always vacantly lost in thought, but no one knows what it is thinking about. It is good at fishing with its tail.
pokedexY: It lazes vacantly near water. If something bites its tail, it won't even notice for a whole day.
pokedexOR: Slowpoke uses its tail to catch prey by dipping it in water at the side of a river. However, this PokÃ©mon often forgets what it's doing and often spends entire days just loafing at water's edge.
pokedexAS: Slowpoke uses its tail to catch prey by dipping it in water at the side of a river. However, this PokÃ©mon often forgets what it's doing and often spends entire days just loafing at water's edge.

name: Slowbro
pokedexX: An attached Shellder won't let go because of the tasty flavor that oozes out of its tail.
pokedexY: When a Slowpoke went hunting in the sea, its tail was bitten by a Shellder. That made it evolve into Slowbro.
pokedexOR: Slowbro's tail has a Shellder firmly attached with a bite. As a result, the tail can't be used for fishing anymore. This causes Slowbro to grudgingly swim and catch prey instead.
pokedexAS: Slowbro's tail has a Shellder firmly attached with a bite. As a result, the tail can't be used for fishing anymore. This causes Slowbro to grudgingly swim and catch prey instead.

name: Magnemite
pokedexX: The units at the sides of its body generate antigravity energy to keep it aloft in the air.
pokedexY: It moves while constantly hovering. It discharges  Thunder Wave and so on from the units at its sides.
pokedexOR: Magnemite attaches itself to power lines to feed on electricity. If your house has a power outage, check your circuit breakers. You may find a large number of this PokÃ©mon clinging to the breaker box.
pokedexAS: Magnemite floats in the air by emitting electromagnetic waves from the units at its sides. These waves block gravity. This PokÃ©mon becomes incapable of flight if its internal electrical supply is depleted.

name: Magneton
pokedexX: A linked cluster formed of several Magnemite. It discharges powerful magnetic waves at high voltage.
pokedexY: Generates strange radio signals. It raises the temperature by 3.6 degrees Fahrenheit within 3,300 feet.
pokedexOR: Magneton emits a powerful magnetic force that is fatal to mechanical devices. As a result, large cities sound sirens to warn citizens of large-scale outbreaks of this PokÃ©mon.
pokedexAS: Magneton emits a powerful magnetic force that is fatal to electronics and precision instruments. Because of this, it is said that some towns warn people to keep this PokÃ©mon inside a PokÃ© Ball.

name: Farfetch'd
pokedexX: The plant stalk it holds is its weapon. The stalk is used like a sword to cut all sorts of things.
pokedexY: It always walks about with a plant stalk clamped in its beak. The stalk is used for building its nest.
pokedexOR: Farfetch'd is always seen with a stalk from a plant of some sort. Apparently, there are good stalks and bad stalks. This PokÃ©mon has been known to fight with others over stalks.
pokedexAS: Farfetch'd is always seen with a stalk from a plant of some sort. Apparently, there are good stalks and bad stalks. This PokÃ©mon has been known to fight with others over stalks.

name: Doduo
pokedexX: A two-headed PokÃ©mon that was discovered as a sudden mutation. It runs at a pace of over 60 miles per hour.
pokedexY: The brains in its two heads appear to communicate emotions to each other with a telepathic power.
pokedexOR: Doduo's two heads never sleep at the same time. Its two heads take turns sleeping, so one head can always keep watch for enemies while the other one sleeps.
pokedexAS: Doduo's two heads contain completely identical brains. A scientific study reported that on rare occasions, there will be examples of this PokÃ©mon possessing different sets of brains.

name: Dodrio
pokedexX: An enemy that takes its eyes off any of the three heads--even for a second--will get pecked severely.
pokedexY: An odd species that is rarely found. The three heads respectively represent joy, sadness, and anger.
pokedexOR: Watch out if Dodrio's three heads are looking in three separate directions. It's a sure sign that it is on its guard. Don't go near this PokÃ©mon if it's being wary-it may decide to peck you.
pokedexAS: Apparently, the heads aren't the only parts of the body that Dodrio has three of. It has three sets of hearts and lungs as well, so it is capable of running long distances without rest.

name: Seel
pokedexX: A PokÃ©mon that lives on icebergs. It swims in the sea using the point on its head to break up ice.
pokedexY: Covered with light blue fur, its hide is thick and tough. It is active in bitter cold of -40 degrees Fahrenheit.
pokedexOR: Seel hunts for prey in the frigid sea underneath sheets of ice. When it needs to breathe, it punches a hole through the ice with the sharply protruding section of its head.
pokedexAS: Seel hunts for prey in the frigid sea underneath sheets of ice. When it needs to breathe, it punches a hole through the ice with the sharply protruding section of its head.

name: Dewgong
pokedexX: Its body is covered with a pure white fur. The colder the weather, the more active it becomes.
pokedexY: Its streamlined body has little drag in water. The colder the temperature, the friskier it gets.
pokedexOR: Dewgong loves to snooze on bitterly cold ice. The sight of this PokÃ©mon sleeping on a glacier was mistakenly thought to be a mermaid by a mariner long ago.
pokedexAS: Dewgong loves to snooze on bitterly cold ice. The sight of this PokÃ©mon sleeping on a glacier was mistakenly thought to be a mermaid by a mariner long ago.

name: Grimer
pokedexX: Sludge exposed to X-rays from the moon transformed into Grimer. It loves feeding on filthy things.
pokedexY: Appears in flithy areas. It thrives by sucking up polluted sludge that is pumped out of factories.
pokedexOR: Grimer's sludgy and rubbery body can be forced through any opening, however small it may be. This PokÃ©mon enters sewer pipes to drink filthy wastewater.
pokedexAS: Grimer emerged from the sludge that settled on a polluted seabed. This PokÃ©mon loves anything filthy. It constantly leaks a horribly germ-infested fluid from all over its body.

name: Muk
pokedexX: They love to gather in smelly areas where sludge accumulates, making the stench around  them worse.
pokedexY: A toxic fluid seeps from its body. The fluid instantly kills plants and trees on contact.
pokedexOR: From Muk's body seeps a foul fluid that gives off a nose-bendingly horrible stench. Just one drop of this PokÃ©mon's body fluid can turn a pool stagnant and rancid.
pokedexAS: This PokÃ©mon's favorite food is anything that is repugnantly filthy. In dirty towns where people think nothing of throwing away litter on the streets, Muk are certain to gather.

name: Shellder
pokedexX: Its hard shell repels any kind of attack. It is vulnerable only when its shell is open.
pokedexY: Clamping on to an opponent reveals its vulnerable  parts, so it uses this move only as a last resort.
pokedexOR: At night, this PokÃ©mon uses its broad tongue to burrow a hole in the seafloor sand and then sleep in it. While it is sleeping, Shellder closes its shell, but leaves its tongue hanging out.
pokedexAS: At night, this PokÃ©mon uses its broad tongue to burrow a hole in the seafloor sand and then sleep in it. While it is sleeping, Shellder closes its shell, but leaves its tongue hanging out.

name: Cloyster
pokedexX: Cloyster that live in the seas with harsh tidal currents grow large, sharp spikes on their shells.
pokedexY: Its shell is extremely hard. It cannot be shattered,  even with a bomb. The shell opens only when it  is attacking.
pokedexOR: Cloyster is capable of swimming in the sea. It does so by swallowing water, then jetting it out toward the rear. This PokÃ©mon shoots spikes from its shell using the same system.
pokedexAS: Cloyster is capable of swimming in the sea. It does so by swallowing water, then jetting it out toward the rear. This PokÃ©mon shoots spikes from its shell using the same system.

name: Gastly
pokedexX: Its body is made of gas. Despite lacking substance, it can envelop an opponent of any size and cause suffocation.
pokedexY: Born from gases, anyone would faint if engulfed by its gaseous body, which contains poison.
pokedexOR: Gastly is largely composed of gaseous matter. When exposed to a strong wind, the gaseous body quickly dwindles away. Groups of this PokÃ©mon cluster under the eaves of houses to escape the ravages of wind.
pokedexAS: Gastly is largely composed of gaseous matter. When exposed to a strong wind, the gaseous body quickly dwindles away. Groups of this PokÃ©mon cluster under the eaves of houses to escape the ravages of wind.

name: Haunter
pokedexX: If you get the feeling of being watched in darkness when nobody is around, Haunter is there.
pokedexY: It licks with its gaseous tongue to steal the victim's life force. It lurks in darkness for prey.
pokedexOR: Haunter is a dangerous PokÃ©mon. If one beckons you while floating in darkness, you must never approach it. This PokÃ©mon will try to lick you with its tongue and steal your life away.
pokedexAS: Haunter is a dangerous PokÃ©mon. If one beckons you while floating in darkness, you must never approach it. This PokÃ©mon will try to lick you with its tongue and steal your life away.

name: Gengar
pokedexX: It hides in shadows. It is said that if Gengar is hiding, it cools the area by nearly 10 degrees Fahrenheit.
pokedexY: Hiding in people's shadows at night, it absorbs their heat. The chill it causes makes the victims shake.
pokedexOR: Sometimes, on a dark night, your shadow thrown by a streetlight will suddenly and startlingly overtake you. It is actually a Gengar running past you, pretending to be your shadow.
pokedexAS: Sometimes, on a dark night, your shadow thrown by a streetlight will suddenly and startlingly overtake you. It is actually a Gengar running past you, pretending to be your shadow.

name: Onix
pokedexX: Burrows at high speed in search of food. The tunnels it leaves are used as homes by Diglett.
pokedexY: It usually lives underground. It searches for food while boring its way through the ground at 50 miles per hour.
pokedexOR: Onix has a magnet in its brain. It acts as a compass so that this PokÃ©mon does not lose direction while it is tunneling. As it grows older, its body becomes increasingly rounder and smoother.
pokedexAS: Onix has a magnet in its brain. It acts as a compass so that this PokÃ©mon does not lose direction while it is tunneling. As it grows older, its body becomes increasingly rounder and smoother.

name: Drowzee
pokedexX: Puts enemies to sleep, then eats their dreams. Occasionally gets sick from eating only bad dreams.
pokedexY: If you think that you had a good dream but you can't remember it, a Drowzee has probably eaten it.
pokedexOR: If your nose becomes itchy while you are sleeping, it's a sure sign that one of these PokÃ©mon is standing above your pillow and trying to eat your dream through your nostrils.
pokedexAS: If your nose becomes itchy while you are sleeping, it's a sure sign that one of these PokÃ©mon is standing above your pillow and trying to eat your dream through your nostrils.

name: Hypno
pokedexX: When it locks eyes with an enemy, it will use a mix of PSI moves such as Hypnosis and Confusion.
pokedexY: Seeing its swinging pendulum can induce sleep in three seconds, even in someone who just woke up.
pokedexOR: Hypno holds a pendulum in its hand. The arcing movement and glitter of the pendulum lull the foe into a deep state of hypnosis. While this PokÃ©mon searches for prey, it polishes the pendulum.
pokedexAS: Hypno holds a pendulum in its hand. The arcing movement and glitter of the pendulum lull the foe into a deep state of hypnosis. While this PokÃ©mon searches for prey, it polishes the pendulum.

name: Krabby
pokedexX: If it senses danger approaching, it cloaks itself with bubbles from its mouth so it will look bigger.
pokedexY: It can be found near the sea. The large pincers grow back if they are torn out of their sockets.
pokedexOR: Krabby live on beaches, burrowed inside holes dug into the sand. On sandy beaches with little in the way of food, these PokÃ©mon can be seen squabbling with each other over territory.
pokedexAS: Krabby live on beaches, burrowed inside holes dug into the sand. On sandy beaches with little in the way of food, these PokÃ©mon can be seen squabbling with each other over territory.

name: Kingler
pokedexX: The large and hard pincer has 10,000-horsepower strength. However, being so big, it is unwieldy to move.
pokedexY: Its pincers grow peculiarly large. If it lifts the pincers too fast, it loses its balance and staggers.
pokedexOR: Kingler has an enormous, oversized claw. It waves this huge claw in the air to communicate with others. However, because the claw is so heavy, the PokÃ©mon quickly tires.
pokedexAS: Kingler has an enormous, oversized claw. It waves this huge claw in the air to communicate with others. However, because the claw is so heavy, the PokÃ©mon quickly tires.

name: Voltorb
pokedexX: It was discovered when PokÃ© Balls were introduced. It is said that there is some connection.
pokedexY: Usually found in power plants. Easily mistaken for a PokÃ© Ball, it has zapped many people.
pokedexOR: Voltorb was first sighted at a company that manufactures PokÃ© Balls. The link between that sighting and the fact that this PokÃ©mon looks very similar to a PokÃ© Ball remains a mystery.
pokedexAS: Voltorb is extremely sensitive-it explodes at the slightest of shocks. It is rumored that it was first created when a PokÃ© Ball was exposed to a powerful pulse of energy.

name: Electrode
pokedexX: It explodes in response to even minor stimuli. It is feared, with the nickname of "The Bomb Ball."
pokedexY: It stores an overflowing amount of electric energy inside its body. Even a small shock makes it explode.
pokedexOR: Electrode eats electricity in the atmosphere. On days when lightning strikes, you can see this PokÃ©mon exploding all over the place from eating too much electricity.
pokedexAS: One of Electrode's characteristics is its attraction to electricity. It is a problematical PokÃ©mon that congregates mostly at electrical power plants to feed on electricity that has just been generated.

name: Exeggcute
pokedexX: Its six eggs converse using telepathy. They can quickly gather if they become sparated.
pokedexY: Even though it appears to be eggs of some sort,  it was discovered to be a life-form more like  plant seeds.
pokedexOR: This PokÃ©mon consists of six eggs that form a closely knit cluster. The six eggs attract each other and spin around. When cracks increasingly appear on the eggs, Exeggcute is close to evolution.
pokedexAS: This PokÃ©mon consists of six eggs that form a closely knit cluster. The six eggs attract each other and spin around. When cracks increasingly appear on the eggs, Exeggcute is close to evolution.

name: Exeggutor
pokedexX: Its three heads think independently. However, they are friendly and never appear to squabble.
pokedexY: It is called "The Walking Jungle." If a head grows  too big, it falls off and becomes an Exeggcute.
pokedexOR: Exeggutor originally came from the tropics. Its heads steadily grow larger from exposure to strong sunlight. It is said that when the heads fall off, they group together to form Exeggcute.
pokedexAS: Exeggutor originally came from the tropics. Its heads steadily grow larger from exposure to strong sunlight. It is said that when the heads fall off, they group together to form Exeggcute.

name: Cubone
pokedexX: It wears the skull of its dead mother on its head. When it becomes lonesome, it is said to cry loudly.
pokedexY: It always wears the skull of its dead mother, so no one has any idea what its hidden face looks like.
pokedexOR: Cubone pines for the mother it will never see again. Seeing a likeness of its mother in the full moon, it cries. The stains on the skull the PokÃ©mon wears are made by the tears it sheds.
pokedexAS: Cubone pines for the mother it will never see again. Seeing a likeness of its mother in the full moon, it cries. The stains on the skull the PokÃ©mon wears are made by the tears it sheds.

name: Marowak
pokedexX: It is small and was originally very weak. Its temperament turned ferocious when it began using bones.
pokedexY: The bone it holds is its key weapon. It throws the bone skillfully like a boomerang to KO targets.
pokedexOR: Marowak is the evolved form of a Cubone that has overcome its sadness at the loss of its mother and grown tough. This PokÃ©mon's tempered and hardened spirit is not easily broken.
pokedexAS: Marowak is the evolved form of a Cubone that has overcome its sadness at the loss of its mother and grown tough. This PokÃ©mon's tempered and hardened spirit is not easily broken.

name: Hitmonlee
pokedexX: The legs freely contract and stretch. The stretchy legs allow it to hit a distant foe with a rising kick.
pokedexY: If it starts kicking repeatedly, both legs will stretch even longer to strike a fleeing foe.
pokedexOR: Hitmonlee's legs freely contract and stretch. Using these springlike legs, it bowls over foes with devastating kicks. After battle, it rubs down its legs and loosens the muscles to overcome fatigue.
pokedexAS: Hitmonlee's legs freely contract and stretch. Using these springlike legs, it bowls over foes with devastating kicks. After battle, it rubs down its legs and loosens the muscles to overcome fatigue.

name: Hitmonchan
pokedexX: The arm-twisting punches it throws pulverize even concrete. It rests after three minutes of fighting.
pokedexY: The spirit of a pro boxer has infused this PokÃ©mon. It throws punches that are faster than a bullet train.
pokedexOR: Hitmonchan is said to possess the spirit of a boxer who had been working toward a world championship. This PokÃ©mon has an indomitable spirit and will never give up in the face of adversity.
pokedexAS: Hitmonchan is said to possess the spirit of a boxer who had been working toward a world championship. This PokÃ©mon has an indomitable spirit and will never give up in the face of adversity.

name: Lickitung
pokedexX: Its long tongue, slathered with a gooey saliva, sticks to anything, so it is very useful.
pokedexY: Its tongue is twice the length of its body. It can be moved like an arm for grabbing food and attacking.
pokedexOR: Whenever Lickitung comes across something new, it will unfailingly give it a lick. It does so because it memorizes things by texture and by taste. It is somewhat put off by sour things.
pokedexAS: Whenever Lickitung comes across something new, it will unfailingly give it a lick. It does so because it memorizes things by texture and by taste. It is somewhat put off by sour things.

name: Koffing
pokedexX: Its thin, filmy body is filled with gases that cause constant sniffles, coughs and teary eyes.
pokedexY: Lighter-than-air gases in its body keep it aloft. The gases not only smell, they are also explosive.
pokedexOR: If Koffing becomes agitated, it raises the toxicity of its internal gases and jets them out from all over its body. This PokÃ©mon may also overinflate its round body, then explode.
pokedexAS: Koffing embodies toxic substances. It mixes the toxins with raw garbage to set off a chemical reaction that results in a terribly powerful poison gas. The higher the temperature, the more gas is concocted by this PokÃ©mon.

name: Weezing
pokedexX: If one of the twin Koffing inflates, the other one deflates. It constantly mixes its poisonous gases.
pokedexY: Very rarely, a sudden mutation can result in two small Koffing twins becoming conjoined as a Weezing.
pokedexOR: Weezing loves the gases given off by rotted kitchen garbage. This PokÃ©mon will find a dirty, unkempt house and make it its home. At night, when the people in the house are asleep, it will go through the trash.
pokedexAS: Weezing alternately shrinks and inflates its twin bodies to mix together toxic gases inside. The more the gases are mixed, the more powerful the toxins become. The PokÃ©mon also becomes more putrid.

name: Rhyhorn
pokedexX: Strong, but not too bright, this PokÃ©mon can shatter even a skyscraper with its charging Tackles.
pokedexY: It is inept at turning because of its four short legs. It can only charge and run in one direction.
pokedexOR: Rhyhorn runs in a straight line, smashing everything in its path. It is not bothered even if it rushes headlong into a block of steel. This PokÃ©mon may feel some pain from the collision the next day, however.
pokedexAS: Rhyhorn's brain is very small. It is so dense, while on a run it forgets why it started running in the first place. It apparently remembers sometimes if it demolishes something.

name: Rhydon
pokedexX: Protected by an armor-like hide, it is capable of living in molten lava of 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit.
pokedexY: It begins walking on its hind legs after evolution. It can punch holes through boulders with its horn.
pokedexOR: Rhydon's horn can crush even uncut diamonds. One sweeping blow of its tail can topple a building. This PokÃ©mon's hide is extremely tough. Even direct cannon hits don't leave a scratch.
pokedexAS: Rhydon has a horn that serves as a drill. It is used for destroying rocks and boulders. This PokÃ©mon occasionally rams into streams of magma, but the armor-like hide prevents it from feeling the heat.

name: Chansey
pokedexX: It is said to deliver happiness. Being compassionate, it shares its eggs with injured people.
pokedexY: It lays several eggs in a day. The eggs are apparently rich in nutrients and extremely delicious.
pokedexOR: Chansey lays nutritionally excellent eggs on an everyday basis. The eggs are so delicious, they are easily and eagerly devoured by even those people who have lost their appetite.
pokedexAS: Chansey lays nutritionally excellent eggs on an everyday basis. The eggs are so delicious, they are easily and eagerly devoured by even those people who have lost their appetite.

name: Tangela
pokedexX: Many writhing vines cover it, so its true identity remains unknown. The blue vines grow its whole  life long.
pokedexY: It tangles any moving thing with its vines. Their subtle shaking is ticklish if you get ensnared.
pokedexOR: Tangela's vines snap off easily if they are grabbed. This happens without pain, allowing it to make a quick getaway. The lost vines are replaced by newly grown vines the very next day.
pokedexAS: Tangela's vines snap off easily if they are grabbed. This happens without pain, allowing it to make a quick getaway. The lost vines are replaced by newly grown vines the very next day.

name: Kangaskhan
pokedexX: It raises its offspring in its belly pouch. It lets the baby out to play only when it feels safe.
pokedexY: If it is safe, the young gets out of the belly pouch to play. The adult keeps a close eye on the youngster.
pokedexOR: If you come across a young Kangaskhan playing by itself, you must never disturb it or attempt to catch it. The baby PokÃ©mon's parent is sure to be in the area, and it will become violently enraged at you.
pokedexAS: If you come across a young Kangaskhan playing by itself, you must never disturb it or attempt to catch it. The baby PokÃ©mon's parent is sure to be in the area, and it will become violently enraged at you.

name: Horsea
pokedexX: Known to shoot down flying bugs with precision blasts of ink from the surface of the water.
pokedexY: It makes its nest in the shade of corals. If it senses danger, it spits murky ink and flees.
pokedexOR: Horsea eats small insects and moss off of rocks. If the ocean current turns fast, this PokÃ©mon anchors itself by wrapping its tail around rocks or coral to prevent being washed away.
pokedexAS: If Horsea senses danger, it will reflexively spray a dense black ink from its mouth and try to escape. This PokÃ©mon swims by cleverly flapping the fin on its back.

name: Seadra
pokedexX: Its body bristles with sharp spikes. Carelessly trying to touch it could cause fainting from the spikes.
pokedexY: It is capable of swimming backwards by rapidly flapping its winglike pectoral fins and stout tail.
pokedexOR: Seadra sleeps after wriggling itself between the branches of coral. Those trying to harvest coral are occasionally stung by this PokÃ©mon's poison barbs if they fail to notice it.
pokedexAS: Seadra generates whirlpools by spinning its body. The whirlpools are strong enough to swallow even fishing boats. This PokÃ©mon weakens prey with these currents, then swallows it whole.

name: Goldeen
pokedexX: It swims at a steady 5 knots. If it senses danger, it will strike back with its sharp horn.
pokedexY: Its dorsal, pectoral, and tail fins wave elegantly in water. That is why it is known as the water dancer.
pokedexOR: Goldeen is a very beautiful PokÃ©mon with fins that billow elegantly in water. However, don't let your guard down around this PokÃ©mon-it could ram you powerfully with its horn.
pokedexAS: Goldeen loves swimming wild and free in rivers and ponds. If one of these PokÃ©mon is placed in an aquarium, it will shatter even the thickest glass with one ram of its horn and make its escape.

name: Seaking
pokedexX: In the autumn spawning season, they can be seen swimming powerfully up rivers and creeks.
pokedexY: It makes its nest by hollowing out boulders in  streams with its horn. It defends its eggs with  its life.
pokedexOR: In the autumn, Seaking males can be seen performing courtship dances in riverbeds to woo females. During this season, this PokÃ©mon's body coloration is at its most beautiful.
pokedexAS: Seaking is very protective of its eggs. The male and female will take turns patrolling around their nest and eggs. The guarding of eggs by these PokÃ©mon goes on for over a month.

name: Staryu
pokedexX: Even if its body is torn, it can regenerate as long as the glowing central core remains intact.
pokedexY: It appears in large numbers by seashores. At night,  its central core flashes with a red light.
pokedexOR: Staryu's center section has an organ called the core that shines bright red. If you go to a beach toward the end of summer, the glowing cores of these PokÃ©mon look like the stars in the sky.
pokedexAS: Staryu apparently communicates with the stars in the night sky by flashing the red core at the center of its body. If parts of its body are torn, this PokÃ©mon simply regenerates the missing pieces and limbs.

name: Starmie
pokedexX: Its central core glows with the seven colors of the rainbow. Some people value the core as a gem.
pokedexY: At the center of its body is a red core, which sends  mysterious radio signals into the night sky.
pokedexOR: Starmie's center section-the core-glows brightly in seven colors. Because of its luminous nature, this PokÃ©mon has been given the nickname "the gem of the sea."
pokedexAS: Starmie swims through water by spinning its star-shaped body as if it were a propeller on a ship. The core at the center of this PokÃ©mon's body glows in seven colors.

name: Mr. Mime
pokedexX: Emanations from its fingertips solidify the air into invisible walls that repel even harsh attacks.
pokedexY: It is adept at conning people. It is said to be able to create walls out of thin air by miming.
pokedexOR: Mr. Mime is a master of pantomime. Its gestures and motions convince watchers that something unseeable actually exists. Once the watchers are convinced, the unseeable thing exists as if it were real.
pokedexAS: Mr. Mime is a master of pantomime. Its gestures and motions convince watchers that something unseeable actually exists. Once the watchers are convinced, the unseeable thing exists as if it were real.

name: Scyther
pokedexX: It tears and shreds prey with its wickedly sharp scythes. It very rarely spreads its wings to fly.
pokedexY: It slashes through grass with its sharp scythes,  moving too fast for the human eye to track.
pokedexOR: Scyther is blindingly fast. Its blazing speed enhances the effectiveness of the twin scythes on its forearms. This PokÃ©mon's scythes are so effective, they can slice through thick logs in one wicked stroke.
pokedexAS: Scyther is blindingly fast. Its blazing speed enhances the effectiveness of the twin scythes on its forearms. This PokÃ©mon's scythes are so effective, they can slice through thick logs in one wicked stroke.

name: Jynx
pokedexX: It wiggles its hips as it walks. It can  cause people to dance in unison with it.
pokedexY: It speaks using a language that sounds human. Research is under way to determine what is being said.
pokedexOR: Jynx walks rhythmically, swaying and shaking its hips as if it were dancing. Its motions are so bouncingly alluring, people seeing it are compelled to shake their hips without giving any thought to what they are doing.
pokedexAS: Jynx walks rhythmically, swaying and shaking its hips as if it were dancing. Its motions are so bouncingly alluring, people seeing it are compelled to shake their hips without giving any thought to what they are doing.

name: Electabuzz
pokedexX: Electricity runs across the surface of its body. In darkness, its entire body glows a whitish blue.
pokedexY: It loves to feed on strong electricity. It occasionally appears around large power plants and so on.
pokedexOR: When a storm arrives, gangs of this PokÃ©mon compete with each other to scale heights that are likely to be stricken by lightning bolts. Some towns use Electabuzz in place of lightning rods.
pokedexAS: When a storm arrives, gangs of this PokÃ©mon compete with each other to scale heights that are likely to be stricken by lightning bolts. Some towns use Electabuzz in place of lightning rods.

name: Magmar
pokedexX: Found near the mouth of a volcano. This fire-breather's body temperature is nearly 2,200 degree Fahrenheit.
pokedexY: Born in the spout of a volcano, its body is covered by flames that shimmer like the sun.
pokedexOR: In battle, Magmar blows out intensely hot flames from all over its body to intimidate its opponent. This PokÃ©mon's fiery bursts create heat waves that ignite grass and trees in its surroundings.
pokedexAS: In battle, Magmar blows out intensely hot flames from all over its body to intimidate its opponent. This PokÃ©mon's fiery bursts create heat waves that ignite grass and trees in its surroundings.

name: Pinsir
pokedexX: It grips prey with its pincers until the prey is torn in half. What it can't tear, it tosses far.
pokedexY: It swings its long pincer horns wildly to attack.  During cold periods, it hides deep in forests.
pokedexOR: Pinsir is astoundingly strong. It can grip a foe weighing twice its weight in its horns and easily lift it. This PokÃ©mon's movements turn sluggish in cold places.
pokedexAS: Pinsir has a pair of massive horns. Protruding from the surface of these horns are thorns. These thorns are driven deeply into the foe's body when the pincer closes, making it tough for the foe to escape.

name: Tauros
pokedexX: After heightening its will to fight by whipping itself with its three tails, it charges at full speed.
pokedexY: When it is about to tackle, it whips its body repeatedly with its three long tails.
