pokedexOR: This PokÃ©mon is not satisfied unless it is rampaging at all times. If there is no opponent for Tauros to battle, it will charge at thick trees and knock them down to calm itself.
pokedexAS: This PokÃ©mon is not satisfied unless it is rampaging at all times. If there is no opponent for Tauros to battle, it will charge at thick trees and knock them down to calm itself.

name: Magikarp
pokedexX: It is virtually worthless in terms of both power and speed. It is the most weak and pathetic PokÃ©mon in the world.
pokedexY: In the distant past, it was somewhat stronger than the horribly weak descendants that exist today.
pokedexOR: Magikarp is a pathetic excuse for a PokÃ©mon that is only capable of flopping and splashing. This behavior prompted scientists to undertake research into it.
pokedexAS: Magikarp is virtually useless in battle as it can only splash around. As a result, it is considered to be weak. However, it is actually a very hardy PokÃ©mon that can survive in any body of water no matter how polluted it is.

name: Gyarados
pokedexX: In ancient literature, there is a record of a Gyarados that razed a village when violence flared.
pokedexY: Rarely seen in the wild. Huge and vicious, it is capable of destroying entire cities in a rage.
pokedexOR: When Magikarp evolves into Gyarados, its brain cells undergo a structural transformation. It is said that this transformation is to blame for this PokÃ©mon's wildly violent nature.
pokedexAS: Once Gyarados goes on a rampage, its ferociously violent blood doesn't calm until it has burned everything down. There are records of this PokÃ©mon's rampages lasting a whole month.

name: Lapras
pokedexX: They have gentle hearts. Because they rarely fight, many have been caught. Their number has dwindled.
pokedexY: Its high intelligence enables it to understand human speech. It likes to ferry people on its back.
pokedexOR: People have driven Lapras almost to the point of extinction. In the evenings, this PokÃ©mon is said to sing plaintively as it seeks what few others of its kind still remain.
pokedexAS: People have driven Lapras almost to the point of extinction. In the evenings, this PokÃ©mon is said to sing plaintively as it seeks what few others of its kind still remain.

name: Ditto
pokedexX: It has the ability to reconstitute its entire cellular structure to transform into whatever it sees.
pokedexY: It can freely recombine its own cellular structure to transform into other life-forms.
pokedexOR: Ditto rearranges its cell structure to transform itself into other shapes. However, if it tries to transform itself into something by relying on its memory, this PokÃ©mon manages to get details wrong.
pokedexAS: Ditto rearranges its cell structure to transform itself into other shapes. However, if it tries to transform itself into something by relying on its memory, this PokÃ©mon manages to get details wrong.

name: Eevee
pokedexX: A rare PokÃ©mon that adapts to harsh environments by taking on different evolutionary forms.
pokedexY: Thanks to its unstable genetic makeup, this special PokÃ©mon conceals many different possible evolutions.
pokedexOR: Eevee has an unstable genetic makeup that suddenly mutates due to the environment in which it lives. Radiation from various stones causes this PokÃ©mon to evolve.
pokedexAS: Eevee has an unstable genetic makeup that suddenly mutates due to the environment in which it lives. Radiation from various stones causes this PokÃ©mon to evolve.

name: Vaporeon
pokedexX: It prefers beautiful shores. With cells similar to water molecules, it could melt in water.
pokedexY: It has evolved to be suitable for an aquatic life. It can invisibly melt away into water.
pokedexOR: Vaporeon underwent a spontaneous mutation and grew fins and gills that allow it to live underwater. This PokÃ©mon has the ability to freely control water.
pokedexAS: Vaporeon underwent a spontaneous mutation and grew fins and gills that allow it to live underwater. This PokÃ©mon has the ability to freely control water.

name: Jolteon
pokedexX: Every hair on its body starts to stand sharply on  end if it becomes charged with electricity.
pokedexY: It accumulates negative ions in the atmosphere to blast out 10,000-volt lightning bolts.
pokedexOR: Jolteon's cells generate a low level of electricity. This power is amplified by the static electricity of its fur, enabling the PokÃ©mon to drop thunderbolts. The bristling fur is made of electrically charged needles.
pokedexAS: Jolteon's cells generate a low level of electricity. This power is amplified by the static electricity of its fur, enabling the PokÃ©mon to drop thunderbolts. The bristling fur is made of electrically charged needles.

name: Flareon
pokedexX: It has a flame sac in its body. Its body temperature  tops 1,650 degrees Fahrenheit before battle.
pokedexY: It has a flame bag inside its body. After inhaling deeply, it blows out flames of nearly 3,000 degrees Fahrenheit.
pokedexOR: Flareon's fluffy fur has a functional purpose-it releases heat into the air so that its body does not get excessively hot. This PokÃ©mon's body temperature can rise to a maximum of 1,650 degrees Fahrenheit.
pokedexAS: Flareon's fluffy fur has a functional purpose-it releases heat into the air so that its body does not get excessively hot. This PokÃ©mon's body temperature can rise to a maximum of 1,650 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: Porygon
pokedexX: A manmade PokÃ©mon that came about as a result of research. It is programmed with only basic motions.
pokedexY: A PokÃ©mon that consists entirely of programming code. It is capable of moving freely in cyberspace.
pokedexOR: Porygon is capable of reverting itself entirely back to program data and entering cyberspace. This PokÃ©mon is copy protected so it cannot be duplicated by copying.
pokedexAS: Porygon is capable of reverting itself entirely back to program data and entering cyberspace. This PokÃ©mon is copy protected so it cannot be duplicated by copying.

name: Omanyte
pokedexX: A prehistoric PokÃ©mon that lived in the primordial sea, it swims by twisting its 10 tentacles about.
pokedexY: Revived from an ancient fossil, this PokÃ©mon uses air stored in its shell to sink and rise in water.
pokedexOR: Omanyte is one of the ancient and long-since-extinct PokÃ©mon that have been regenerated from fossils by people. If attacked by an enemy, it withdraws itself inside its hard shell.
pokedexAS: Omanyte is one of the ancient and long-since-extinct PokÃ©mon that have been regenerated from fossils by people. If attacked by an enemy, it withdraws itself inside its hard shell.

name: Omastar
pokedexX: Its tentacles are highly developed as if they are hands and feet. As soon as it ensnares prey, it bites.
pokedexY: Once wrapped around its prey, it never lets go. It eats the prey by tearing at it with sharp fangs.
pokedexOR: Omastar uses its tentacles to capture its prey. It is believed to have become extinct because its shell grew too large and heavy, causing its movements to become too slow and ponderous.
pokedexAS: Omastar uses its tentacles to capture its prey. It is believed to have become extinct because its shell grew too large and heavy, causing its movements to become too slow and ponderous.

name: Kabuto
pokedexX: It is thought to have inhabited beaches 300 million years ago. It is protected by a stiff shell.
pokedexY: This PokÃ©mon was regenerated from the fossil of an ancient creature. It protects itself with a hard shell.
pokedexOR: Kabuto is a PokÃ©mon that has been regenerated from a fossil. However, in extremely rare cases, living examples have been discovered. The PokÃ©mon has not changed at all for 300 million years.
pokedexAS: Kabuto is a PokÃ©mon that has been regenerated from a fossil. However, in extremely rare cases, living examples have been discovered. The PokÃ©mon has not changed at all for 300 million years.

name: Kabutops
pokedexX: In the water, it tucks in its limbs to become more compact, then it wiggles its shell to swim fast.
pokedexY: A slim and fast swimmer. It slices its prey with its sharp sickles and drinks the body fluids.
pokedexOR: Kabutops swam underwater to hunt for its prey in ancient times. The PokÃ©mon was apparently evolving from being a water dweller to living on land as evident from the beginnings of change in its gills and legs.
pokedexAS: Kabutops swam underwater to hunt for its prey in ancient times. The PokÃ©mon was apparently evolving from being a water dweller to living on land as evident from the beginnings of change in its gills and legs.

name: Aerodactyl
pokedexX: It was regenerated from a dinosaur's genetic matter that was found in amber. It flies with high-pitched cries.
pokedexY: This vicious PokÃ©mon is said to have flown in ancient skies while shrieking high-pitched cries.
pokedexOR: Aerodactyl is a PokÃ©mon from the age of dinosaurs. It was regenerated from genetic material extracted from amber. It is imagined to have been the king of the skies in ancient times.
pokedexAS: Aerodactyl is a PokÃ©mon from the age of dinosaurs. It was regenerated from genetic material extracted from amber. It is imagined to have been the king of the skies in ancient times.

name: Snorlax
pokedexX: It is not satisfied unless it eats over 880 pounds of  food every day. When it is done eating, it goes  promptly to sleep.
pokedexY: Its stomach can digest any kind of food, even if it happens to be moldy or rotten.
pokedexOR: Snorlax's typical day consists of nothing more than eating and sleeping. It is such a docile PokÃ©mon that there are children who use its expansive belly as a place to play.
pokedexAS: Snorlax's typical day consists of nothing more than eating and sleeping. It is such a docile PokÃ©mon that there are children who use its expansive belly as a place to play.

name: Articuno
pokedexX: A legendary bird PokÃ©mon. It can create blizzards by freezing moisture in the air.
pokedexY: A legendary bird PokÃ©mon that is said to appear to doomed people who are lost in icy mountains.
pokedexOR: Articuno is a legendary bird PokÃ©mon that can control ice. The flapping of its wings chills the air. As a result, it is said that when this PokÃ©mon flies, snow will fall.
pokedexAS: Articuno is a legendary bird PokÃ©mon that can control ice. The flapping of its wings chills the air. As a result, it is said that when this PokÃ©mon flies, snow will fall.

name: Zapdos
pokedexX: A legendary bird PokÃ©mon that is said to appear from clouds while dropping enormous lightning bolts.
pokedexY: A legendary PokÃ©mon that is said to live in  thunderclouds. It freely controls lightning bolts.
pokedexOR: Zapdos is a legendary bird PokÃ©mon that has the ability to control electricity. It usually lives in thunderclouds. The PokÃ©mon gains power if it is stricken by lightning bolts.
pokedexAS: Zapdos is a legendary bird PokÃ©mon that has the ability to control electricity. It usually lives in thunderclouds. The PokÃ©mon gains power if it is stricken by lightning bolts.

name: Moltres
pokedexX: It is said to be the legendary bird PokÃ©mon of fire. Every flap of its wings creates a dazzling flare of flames.
pokedexY: One of the legendary bird PokÃ©mon. It is said that its appearance indicates the coming of spring.
pokedexOR: Moltres is a legendary bird PokÃ©mon that has the ability to control fire. If this PokÃ©mon is injured, it is said to dip its body in the molten magma of a volcano to burn and heal itself.
pokedexAS: Moltres is a legendary bird PokÃ©mon that has the ability to control fire. If this PokÃ©mon is injured, it is said to dip its body in the molten magma of a volcano to burn and heal itself.

name: Dratini
pokedexX: It is called the "Mirage PokÃ©mon" because so few have seen it. Its shed skin has been found.
pokedexY: This PokÃ©mon is full of life energy. It continually sheds its skin and grows steadily larger.
pokedexOR: Dratini continually molts and sloughs off its old skin. It does so because the life energy within its body steadily builds to reach uncontrollable levels.
pokedexAS: Dratini continually molts and sloughs off its old skin. It does so because the life energy within its body steadily builds to reach uncontrollable levels.

name: Dragonair
pokedexX: Its crystalline orbs appear to give this PokÃ©mon the power to freely control the weather.
pokedexY: A mystical PokÃ©mon that exudes a gentle aura. It is said to have the ability to change the weather.
pokedexOR: Dragonair stores an enormous amount of energy inside its body. It is said to alter weather conditions in its vicinity by discharging energy from the crystals on its neck and tail.
pokedexAS: Dragonair stores an enormous amount of energy inside its body. It is said to alter weather conditions in its vicinity by discharging energy from the crystals on its neck and tail.

name: Dragonite
pokedexX: It can fly in spite of its big and bulky physique. It circles the globe in just 16 hours.
pokedexY: It is said to make its home somewhere in the sea. It guides crews of shipwrecks to shore.
pokedexOR: Dragonite is capable of circling the globe in just 16 hours. It is a kindhearted PokÃ©mon that leads lost and foundering ships in a storm to the safety of land.
pokedexAS: Dragonite is capable of circling the globe in just 16 hours. It is a kindhearted PokÃ©mon that leads lost and foundering ships in a storm to the safety of land.

name: Mewtwo
pokedexX: It was created by a scientist after years of horrific gene-splicing and DNA-engineering experiments.
pokedexY: A PokÃ©mon created by recombining Mew's genes. It's said to have the most savage heart among PokÃ©mon.
pokedexOR: Mewtwo is a PokÃ©mon that was created by genetic manipulation. However, even though the scientific power of humans created this PokÃ©mon's body, they failed to endow Mewtwo with a compassionate heart.
pokedexAS: Mewtwo is a PokÃ©mon that was created by genetic manipulation. However, even though the scientific power of humans created this PokÃ©mon's body, they failed to endow Mewtwo with a compassionate heart.

name: Mew
pokedexX: Because it can use all kinds of moves, many scientists believe Mew to be the ancestor of PokÃ©mon.
pokedexY: Its DNA is said to contain the genetic codes of all PokÃ©mon, so it can use all kinds of techniques.
pokedexOR: Mew is said to possess the genetic composition of all PokÃ©mon. It is capable of making itself invisible at will, so it entirely avoids notice even if it approaches people.
pokedexAS: Mew is said to possess the genetic composition of all PokÃ©mon. It is capable of making itself invisible at will, so it entirely avoids notice even if it approaches people.

name: Chikorita
pokedexX: A sweet aroma gently wafts from the leaf on its head. It is docile and loves to soak up sunrays.
pokedexY: It uses the leaf on its head to determine the temperature and humidity. It loves to sunbathe.
pokedexOR: In battle, Chikorita waves its leaf around to keep the foe at bay. However, a sweet fragrance also wafts from the leaf, becalming the battling PokÃ©mon and creating a cozy, friendly atmosphere all around.
pokedexAS: In battle, Chikorita waves its leaf around to keep the foe at bay. However, a sweet fragrance also wafts from the leaf, becalming the battling PokÃ©mon and creating a cozy, friendly atmosphere all around.

name: Bayleef
pokedexX: A spicy aroma emanates from around its neck. The aroma acts as a stimulant to restore health.
pokedexY: The buds that ring its neck give off a spicy aroma that perks people up.
pokedexOR: Bayleef's neck is ringed by curled-up leaves. Inside each tubular leaf is a small shoot of a tree. The fragrance of this shoot makes people peppy.
pokedexAS: Bayleef's neck is ringed by curled-up leaves. Inside each tubular leaf is a small shoot of a tree. The fragrance of this shoot makes people peppy.

name: Meganium
pokedexX: The aroma that rises from its petals contains a substance that calms aggressive feelings.
pokedexY: Meganium's breath has the power to revive dead grass and plants. It can make them healthy again.
pokedexOR: The fragrance of Meganium's flower soothes and calms emotions. In battle, this PokÃ©mon gives off more of its becalming scent to blunt the foe's fighting spirit.
pokedexAS: The fragrance of Meganium's flower soothes and calms emotions. In battle, this PokÃ©mon gives off more of its becalming scent to blunt the foe's fighting spirit.

name: Cyndaquil
pokedexX: It is timid, and always curls itself up in a ball. If attacked, it flares up its back for protection.
pokedexY: It has a timid nature. If it is startled, the flames on its back burn more vigorously.
pokedexOR: Cyndaquil protects itself by flaring up the flames on its back. The flames are vigorous if the PokÃ©mon is angry. However, if it is tired, the flames splutter fitfully with incomplete combustion.
pokedexAS: Cyndaquil protects itself by flaring up the flames on its back. The flames are vigorous if the PokÃ©mon is angry. However, if it is tired, the flames splutter fitfully with incomplete combustion.

name: Quilava
pokedexX: Before battle, it turns its back on its opponent to demonstrate how ferociously its fire blazes
pokedexY: Be careful if it turns its back during battle. It means that it will attack with the fire on its back.
pokedexOR: Quilava keeps its foes at bay with the intensity of its flames and gusts of superheated air. This PokÃ©mon applies its outstanding nimbleness to dodge attacks even while scorching the foe with flames.
pokedexAS: Quilava keeps its foes at bay with the intensity of its flames and gusts of superheated air. This PokÃ©mon applies its outstanding nimbleness to dodge attacks even while scorching the foe with flames.

name: Typhlosion
pokedexX: If its rage peaks, it becomes so hot that anything that touches it will instantly go up in flames.
pokedexY: It has a secret, devastating move. It rubs its blazing fur together to cause huge explosions.
pokedexOR: Typhlosion obscures itself behind a shimmering heat haze that it creates using its intensely hot flames. This PokÃ©mon creates blazing explosive blasts that burn everything to cinders.
pokedexAS: Typhlosion obscures itself behind a shimmering heat haze that it creates using its intensely hot flames. This PokÃ©mon creates blazing explosive blasts that burn everything to cinders.

name: Totodile
pokedexX: It is small but rough and tough. It won't hesitate to take a bite out of anything that moves.
pokedexY: Its powerful, well-developed jaws are capable of crushing anything. Even its Trainer must be careful.
pokedexOR: Despite the smallness of its body, Totodile's jaws are very powerful. While the PokÃ©mon may think it is just playfully nipping, its bite has enough power to cause serious injury.
pokedexAS: Despite the smallness of its body, Totodile's jaws are very powerful. While the PokÃ©mon may think it is just playfully nipping, its bite has enough power to cause serious injury.

name: Croconaw
pokedexX: If it loses a fang, a new one grows back in its place. There are always 48 fangs lining its mouth.
pokedexY: Once it bites down, it won't let go until it loses its fangs. New fangs quickly grow into place.
pokedexOR: Once Croconaw has clamped its jaws on its foe, it will absolutely not let go. Because the tips of its fangs are forked back like barbed fishhooks, they become impossible to remove when they have sunk in.
pokedexAS: Once Croconaw has clamped its jaws on its foe, it will absolutely not let go. Because the tips of its fangs are forked back like barbed fishhooks, they become impossible to remove when they have sunk in.

name: Feraligatr
pokedexX: It usually moves slowly, but it goes at blinding speed when it attacks and bites prey.
pokedexY: When it bites with its massive and powerful jaws, it shakes its head and savagely tears its victim up.
pokedexOR: Feraligatr intimidates its foes by opening its huge mouth. In battle, it will kick the ground hard with its thick and powerful hind legs to charge at the foe at an incredible speed.
pokedexAS: Feraligatr intimidates its foes by opening its huge mouth. In battle, it will kick the ground hard with its thick and powerful hind legs to charge at the foe at an incredible speed.

name: Sentret
pokedexX: When acting as a lookout, it warns others of danger by screeching and hitting the ground with its tail.
pokedexY: It stands on its tail so it can see a long way. If it spots an enemy, it cries loudly to warn its kind.
pokedexOR: When Sentret sleeps, it does so while another stands guard. The sentry wakes the others at the first sign of danger. When this PokÃ©mon becomes separated from its pack, it becomes incapable of sleep due to fear.
pokedexAS: When Sentret sleeps, it does so while another stands guard. The sentry wakes the others at the first sign of danger. When this PokÃ©mon becomes separated from its pack, it becomes incapable of sleep due to fear.

name: Furret
pokedexX: The mother puts its offspring to sleep by curling up around them. It corners foes with speed.
pokedexY: It makes a nest to suit its long and skinny body. The nest is impossible for other PokÃ©mon to enter.
pokedexOR: Furret has a very slim build. When under attack, it can slickly squirm through narrow spaces and get away. In spite of its short limbs, this PokÃ©mon is very nimble and fleet.
pokedexAS: Furret has a very slim build. When under attack, it can slickly squirm through narrow spaces and get away. In spite of its short limbs, this PokÃ©mon is very nimble and fleet.

name: Hoothoot
pokedexX: It has a perfect sense of time. Whatever happens, it keeps rhythm by precisely tilting its head in time.
pokedexY: It always stands on one foot. It changes feet so fast, the movement can rarely be seen.
pokedexOR: Hoothoot has an internal organ that senses and tracks the earth's rotation. Using this special organ, this PokÃ©mon begins hooting at precisely the same time every day.
pokedexAS: Hoothoot has an internal organ that senses and tracks the earth's rotation. Using this special organ, this PokÃ©mon begins hooting at precisely the same time every day.

name: Noctowl
pokedexX: Its eyes are specially adapted. They concentrate even faint light and enable it to see in the dark.
pokedexY: When it needs to think, it rotates its head 180 degrees to sharpen its intellectual power.
pokedexOR: Noctowl never fails at catching prey in darkness. This PokÃ©mon owes its success to its superior vision that allows it to see in minimal light, and to its soft, supple wings that make no sound in flight.
pokedexAS: Noctowl never fails at catching prey in darkness. This PokÃ©mon owes its success to its superior vision that allows it to see in minimal light, and to its soft, supple wings that make no sound in flight.

name: Ledyba
pokedexX: When the weather turns cold, lots of Ledyba gather from everywhere to cluster and keep each other warm.
pokedexY: It is timid and clusters together with others. The fluid secreted by its feet indicates its location.
pokedexOR: Ledyba secretes an aromatic fluid from where its legs join its body. This fluid is used for communicating with others. This PokÃ©mon conveys its feelings to others by altering the fluid's scent.
pokedexAS: Ledyba secretes an aromatic fluid from where its legs join its body. This fluid is used for communicating with others. This PokÃ©mon conveys its feelings to others by altering the fluid's scent.

name: Ledian
pokedexX: When the stars flicker in the night sky, it flutters about, scattering a glowing powder.
pokedexY: The spot patterns on its back grow larger or smaller  depending on the number of stars in the night sky.
pokedexOR: It is said that in lands with clean air, where the stars fill the sky, there live Ledian in countless numbers. There is a good reason for this-the PokÃ©mon uses the light of the stars as its energy.
pokedexAS: It is said that in lands with clean air, where the stars fill the sky, there live Ledian in countless numbers. There is a good reason for this-the PokÃ©mon uses the light of the stars as its energy.

name: Spinarak
pokedexX: It spins a web using fine--but durable--thread. It then waits patiently for prey to be trapped.
pokedexY: It lies still in the same pose for days in its web, waiting for its unsuspecting prey to wander close.
pokedexOR: The web spun by Spinarak can be considered its second nervous system. It is said that this PokÃ©mon can determine what kind of prey is touching its web just by the tiny vibrations it feels through the web's strands.
pokedexAS: The web spun by Spinarak can be considered its second nervous system. It is said that this PokÃ©mon can determine what kind of prey is touching its web just by the tiny vibrations it feels through the web's strands.

name: Ariados
pokedexX: It spins string not only from its rear but also from its mouth. It's hard to tell which end is which.
pokedexY: It attaches silk to its prey and sets it free. Later, it tracks the silk to the prey and its friends.
pokedexOR: Ariados's feet are tipped with tiny hooked claws that enable it to scuttle on ceilings and vertical walls. This PokÃ©mon constricts the foe with thin and strong silk webbing.
pokedexAS: Ariados's feet are tipped with tiny hooked claws that enable it to scuttle on ceilings and vertical walls. This PokÃ©mon constricts the foe with thin and strong silk webbing.

name: Crobat
pokedexX: It flies so silently through the dark on its four wings that it may not be noticed even when nearby.
pokedexY: Having four wings allows it to fly more quickly and quietly so it can sneak up on prey without its noticing.
pokedexOR: If this PokÃ©mon is flying by fluttering only a pair of wings on either the forelegs or hind legs, it's proof that Crobat has been flying a long distance. It switches the wings it uses if it is tired.
pokedexAS: Crobat sneaks up on its intended prey using wings that barely make a sound. This PokÃ©mon rests by hanging on a tree branch with its rear legs that serve as wings.

name: Chinchou
pokedexX: On the dark ocean floor, its only means of communication is its constantly flashing lights.
pokedexY: It shoots positive and negative electricity between the tips of its two antennae and zaps its enemies.
pokedexOR: Chinchou lets loose positive and negative electrical charges from its two antennas to make its prey faint. This PokÃ©mon flashes its electric lights to exchange signals with others.
pokedexAS: Chinchou's two antennas are filled with cells that generate strong electricity. This PokÃ©mon's cells create so much electrical power, it even makes itself tingle slightly.

name: Lanturn
pokedexX: Lanturn's light can shine up from great depths. It is nicknamed "The Deep-Sea Star."
pokedexY: It blinds prey with an intense burst of light.  With the prey incapacitated, the PokÃ©mon  swallows it in a single gulp.
pokedexOR: Lanturn is nicknamed "the deep-sea star" for its illuminated antenna. This PokÃ©mon produces light by causing a chemical reaction between bacteria and its bodily fluids inside the antenna.
pokedexAS: Lanturn is known to emit light. If you peer down into the dark sea from a ship at night, you can sometimes see this PokÃ©mon's light rising from the depths where it swims. It gives the sea an appearance of a starlit night.

name: Pichu
pokedexX: It plays with others by touching tails and setting off sparks. This appears to be a test of courage.
pokedexY: It is not yet skilled at storing electricity. It may send out a jolt if amused or startled.
pokedexOR: Pichu charges itself with electricity more easily on days with thunderclouds or when the air is very dry. You can hear the crackling of static electricity coming off this PokÃ©mon.
pokedexAS: When Pichu plays with others, it may short out electricity with another Pichu, creating a shower of sparks. In that event, this PokÃ©mon will begin crying, startled by the flash of sparks.

name: Cleffa
pokedexX: Because of its unusual, starlike silhouette, people believe that it came here on a meteor.
pokedexY: Many appear when the night skies are filled with shooting stars. They disappear with sunrise.
pokedexOR: On nights with many shooting stars, Cleffa can be seen dancing in a ring. They dance through the night and stop only at the break of day, when these PokÃ©mon quench their thirst with the morning dew.
pokedexAS: On nights with many shooting stars, Cleffa can be seen dancing in a ring. They dance through the night and stop only at the break of day, when these PokÃ©mon quench their thirst with the morning dew.

name: Igglybuff
pokedexX: Instead of walking with its short legs, it moves around by bouncing on its soft, tender body.
pokedexY: It has a very soft body. If it starts to roll, it will bounce all over and be impossible to stop.
pokedexOR: Igglybuff's vocal cords are not sufficiently developed. It would hurt its throat if it were to sing too much. This PokÃ©mon gargles with freshwater from a clean stream.
pokedexAS: Igglybuff has a soft and plushy body that feels very much like a marshmallow. From this body wafts a gently sweet fragrance that soothes and calms the emotions of its foes.

name: Togepi
pokedexX: The shell seems to be filled with joy. It is said that it will share good luck when treated kindly.
pokedexY: A proverb claims that happiness will come to anyone who can make a sleeping Togepi stand up.
pokedexOR: As its energy, Togepi uses the positive emotions of compassion and pleasure exuded by people and PokÃ©mon. This PokÃ©mon stores up feelings of happiness inside its shell, then shares them with others.
pokedexAS: As its energy, Togepi uses the positive emotions of compassion and pleasure exuded by people and PokÃ©mon. This PokÃ©mon stores up feelings of happiness inside its shell, then shares them with others.

name: Togetic
pokedexX: It grows dispirited if it is not with kind people. It can float in midair without moving its wings.
pokedexY: They say that it will appear before kindhearted, caring people and shower them with happiness.
pokedexOR: Togetic is said to be a PokÃ©mon that brings good fortune. When the PokÃ©mon spots someone who is pure of heart, it is said to appear and share its happiness with that person.
pokedexAS: Togetic is said to be a PokÃ©mon that brings good fortune. When the PokÃ©mon spots someone who is pure of heart, it is said to appear and share its happiness with that person.

name: Natu
pokedexX: Because its wings aren't yet fully grown, it has to hop to get around. It is always staring at something.
pokedexY: It usually forages for food on the ground but may, on rare occasions, hop onto branches to peck at shoots.
pokedexOR: Natu cannot fly because its wings are not yet fully grown. If your eyes meet with this PokÃ©mon's eyes, it will stare back intently at you. But if you move even slightly, it will hop away to safety.
pokedexAS: Natu has a highly developed jumping ability. The PokÃ©mon flaps and leaps onto tree branches that are taller than grown-up people to pick at the tree's new shoots.

name: Xatu
pokedexX: Once it begins to meditate at sunrise, the entire day will pass before it will move again.
pokedexY: They say that it stays still and quiet because it is seeing both the past and future at the same time.
pokedexOR: Xatu stands rooted and still in one spot all day long. People believe that this PokÃ©mon does so out of fear of the terrible things it has foreseen in the future.
pokedexAS: Xatu is known to stand motionless while staring at the sun all day long. Some people revere it as a mystical PokÃ©mon out of their belief that Xatu is in possession of the power to see into the future.

name: Mareep
pokedexX: Its fluffy coat swells to double when static electricity builds up. Touching it can be shocking.
pokedexY: It stores lots of air in its soft fur, allowing it to stay cool in summer and warm in winter.
pokedexOR: Mareep's fluffy coat of wool rubs together and builds a static charge. The more static electricity is charged, the more brightly the lightbulb at the tip of its tail glows.
pokedexAS: Mareep's fluffy coat of wool rubs together and builds a static charge. The more static electricity is charged, the more brightly the lightbulb at the tip of its tail glows.

name: Flaaffy
pokedexX: Its fluffy fleece easily stores electricity. Its rubbery hide keeps it from being electrocuted.
pokedexY: If its coat becomes fully charged with electricity,  its tail lights up. It fires hair that zaps on impact.
pokedexOR: Flaaffy's wool quality changes so that it can generate a high amount of static electricity with a small amount of wool. The bare and slick parts of its hide are shielded against electricity.
pokedexAS: Flaaffy's wool quality changes so that it can generate a high amount of static electricity with a small amount of wool. The bare and slick parts of its hide are shielded against electricity.

name: Ampharos
pokedexX: The tail's tip shines brightly and can be seen from far away. It acts as a beacon for lost people.
pokedexY: The tail's tip shines brightly and can be seen from  far away. It acts as a beacon for lost people.
pokedexOR: Ampharos gives off so much light that it can be seen even from space. People in the old days used the light of this PokÃ©mon to send signals back and forth with others far away.
pokedexAS: Ampharos gives off so much light that it can be seen even from space. People in the old days used the light of this PokÃ©mon to send signals back and forth with others far away.

name: Bellossom
pokedexX: Bellossom gather at times and seem to dance. They say that the dance is a ritual to summon the sun.
pokedexY: When the heavy rainfall season ends, it is drawn out by warm sunlight to dance in the open.
pokedexOR: When Bellossom gets exposed to plenty of sunlight, the leaves ringing its body begin to spin around. This PokÃ©mon's dancing is renowned in the southern lands.
pokedexAS: A Bellossom grows flowers more beautifully if it has evolved from a smelly Gloom-the more stinky the better. At night, this PokÃ©mon closes its petals and goes to sleep.

name: Marill
pokedexX: The fur on its body naturally repels water. It can stay dry, even when it plays in the water.
pokedexY: The tip of its tail is filled with oil that is lighter than water, so it acts as a float.
pokedexOR: Marill's oil-filled tail acts much like a life preserver. If you see just its tail bobbing on the water's surface, it's a sure indication that this PokÃ©mon is diving beneath the water to feed on aquatic plants.
pokedexAS: When fishing for food at the edge of a fast-running stream, Marill wraps its tail around the trunk of a tree. This PokÃ©mon's tail is flexible and configured to stretch.

name: Azumarill
pokedexX: Its long ears are superb sensors. It can distinguish the movements of living things on riverbeds.
pokedexY: The bubble-like pattern on its stomach helps it camouflage itself when it's in the water.
pokedexOR: Azumarill's long ears are indispensable sensors. By focusing its hearing, this PokÃ©mon can identify what kinds of prey are around, even in rough and fast-running rivers.
pokedexAS: Azumarill can make balloons out of air. It makes these air balloons if it spots a drowning PokÃ©mon. The air balloons enable the PokÃ©mon in trouble to breathe.

name: Sudowoodo
pokedexX: Although it always pretends to be a tree, its composition appears more similar to rock than to vegetation.
pokedexY: It disguises itself as a tree to avoid attack. It hates  water, so it will disappear if it starts raining.
pokedexOR: Sudowoodo camouflages itself as a tree to avoid being attacked by enemies. However, because its hands remain green throughout the year, the PokÃ©mon is easily identified as a fake during the winter.
pokedexAS: Sudowoodo camouflages itself as a tree to avoid being attacked by enemies. However, because its hands remain green throughout the year, the PokÃ©mon is easily identified as a fake during the winter.

name: Politoed
pokedexX: Whenever three or more of these get together, they sing in a loud voice that sounds like bellowing.
pokedexY: If Poliwag and Poliwhirl hear its echoing cry, they respond by gathering from far and wide.
pokedexOR: The curled hair on Politoed's head is proof of its status as a king. It is said that the longer and more curled the hair, the more respect this PokÃ©mon earns from its peers.
pokedexAS: The curled hair on Politoed's head is proof of its status as a king. It is said that the longer and more curled the hair, the more respect this PokÃ©mon earns from its peers.

name: Hoppip
pokedexX: Its body is so light, it must grip the ground firmly with its feet to keep from being blown away.
pokedexY: It drifts on winds. It is said that when Hoppip gather in fields and mountains, spring is on the way.
pokedexOR: This PokÃ©mon drifts and floats with the wind. If it senses the approach of strong winds, Hoppip links its leaves with other Hoppip to prepare against being blown away.
pokedexAS: This PokÃ©mon drifts and floats with the wind. If it senses the approach of strong winds, Hoppip links its leaves with other Hoppip to prepare against being blown away.

name: Skiploom
pokedexX: The bloom on top of its head opens and closes as the temperature fluctuates up and down.
pokedexY: It spreads its petals to absorb sunlight. It also floats in the air to get closer to the sun.
pokedexOR: Skiploom's flower blossoms when the temperature rises above 64 degrees Fahrenheit. How much the flower opens depends on the temperature. For that reason, this PokÃ©mon is sometimes used as a thermometer.
pokedexAS: Skiploom's flower blossoms when the temperature rises above 64 degrees Fahrenheit. How much the flower opens depends on the temperature. For that reason, this PokÃ©mon is sometimes used as a thermometer.

name: Jumpluff
pokedexX: Blown by seasonal winds, it circles the globe, scattering cotton spores as it goes.
pokedexY: Even in the fiercest wind, it can control its fluff to make its way to any place in the world it wants.
pokedexOR: Jumpluff rides warm southern winds to cross the sea and fly to foreign lands. The PokÃ©mon descends to the ground when it encounters cold air while it is floating.
pokedexAS: Jumpluff rides warm southern winds to cross the sea and fly to foreign lands. The PokÃ©mon descends to the ground when it encounters cold air while it is floating.

name: Aipom
pokedexX: It lives atop tall trees. When leaping from branch to branch, it deftly uses its tail for balance.
pokedexY: Its tail is so powerful that it can use it to grab a tree branch and hold itself up in the air.
pokedexOR: Aipom's tail ends in a hand-like appendage that can be cleverly manipulated. However, because the PokÃ©mon uses its tail so much, its real hands have become rather clumsy.
pokedexAS: Aipom's tail ends in a hand-like appendage that can be cleverly manipulated. However, because the PokÃ©mon uses its tail so much, its real hands have become rather clumsy.

name: Sunkern
pokedexX: It may plummet from the sky. If attacked by a Spearow, it will violently shake its leaves.
pokedexY: It lives by drinking only dewdrops from under the leaves of plants. It is said that it eats nothing else.
pokedexOR: Sunkern tries to move as little as it possibly can. It does so because it tries to conserve all the nutrients it has stored in its body for its evolution. It will not eat a thing, subsisting only on morning dew.
pokedexAS: Sunkern tries to move as little as it possibly can. It does so because it tries to conserve all the nutrients it has stored in its body for its evolution. It will not eat a thing, subsisting only on morning dew.

name: Sunflora
pokedexX: As the hot season approaches, the petals on this PokÃ©mon's face become more vivid and lively.
pokedexY: It gets energy from warm sunlight and is known for its habit of moving in pursuit of it.
pokedexOR: Sunflora converts solar energy into nutrition. It moves around actively in the daytime when it is warm. It stops moving as soon as the sun goes down for the night.
pokedexAS: Sunflora converts solar energy into nutrition. It moves around actively in the daytime when it is warm. It stops moving as soon as the sun goes down for the night.

name: Yanma
pokedexX: Its eyes can see 360 degrees without moving its head. It won't miss prey--even those behind it.
pokedexY: If it flaps its wings really fast, it can generate shock waves that will shatter windows in the area.
pokedexOR: Yanma is capable of seeing 360 degrees without having to move its eyes. It is a great flier that is adept at making sudden stops and turning midair. This PokÃ©mon uses its flying ability to quickly chase down targeted prey.
pokedexAS: Yanma is capable of seeing 360 degrees without having to move its eyes. It is a great flier that is adept at making sudden stops and turning midair. This PokÃ©mon uses its flying ability to quickly chase down targeted prey.

name: Wooper
pokedexX: This PokÃ©mon lives in cold water. It will leave the water to search for food when it gets cold outside.
pokedexY: When the temperature cools in the evening, they emerge from water to seek food along the shore.
pokedexOR: Wooper usually lives in water. However, it occasionally comes out onto land in search of food. On land, it coats its body with a gooey, toxic film.
pokedexAS: Wooper usually lives in water. However, it occasionally comes out onto land in search of food. On land, it coats its body with a gooey, toxic film.

name: Quagsire
pokedexX: It has a sluggish nature. It lies at the river's bottom, waiting for prey to stray into its mouth.
pokedexY: This carefree PokÃ©mon has an easygoing nature. While swimming, it always bumps into boat hulls.
pokedexOR: Quagsire hunts for food by leaving its mouth wide open in water and waiting for its prey to blunder in unaware. Because the PokÃ©mon does not move, it does not get very hungry.
pokedexAS: Quagsire hunts for food by leaving its mouth wide open in water and waiting for its prey to blunder in unaware. Because the PokÃ©mon does not move, it does not get very hungry.

name: Espeon
pokedexX: The tip of its forked tail quivers when it is predicting its opponent's next move.
pokedexY: Its fur is so sensitive, it can feel minute shifts in the air and predict the weather...and its foes' thoughts.
pokedexOR: Espeon is extremely loyal to any Trainer it considers to be worthy. It is said that this PokÃ©mon developed its precognitive powers to protect its Trainer from harm.
pokedexAS: Espeon is extremely loyal to any Trainer it considers to be worthy. It is said that this PokÃ©mon developed its precognitive powers to protect its Trainer from harm.

name: Umbreon
pokedexX: The light of the moon changed Eevee's genetic structure. It lurks in darkness for prey.
pokedexY: When exposed to the moon's aura, the rings on its body glow faintly and it's filled with a mysterious power.
pokedexOR: Umbreon evolved as a result of exposure to the moon's waves. It hides silently in darkness and waits for its foes to make a move. The rings on its body glow when it leaps to attack.
pokedexAS: Umbreon evolved as a result of exposure to the moon's waves. It hides silently in darkness and waits for its foes to make a move. The rings on its body glow when it leaps to attack.

name: Murkrow
pokedexX: It hides any shiny object it finds in a secret location. Murkrow and Meowth loot one another's stashes.
pokedexY: Feared and loathed by many, it is believed to bring misfortune to all those who see it at night.
pokedexOR: Murkrow was feared and loathed as the alleged bearer of ill fortune. This PokÃ©mon shows strong interest in anything that sparkles or glitters. It will even try to steal rings from women.
pokedexAS: Murkrow was feared and loathed as the alleged bearer of ill fortune. This PokÃ©mon shows strong interest in anything that sparkles or glitters. It will even try to steal rings from women.

name: Slowking
pokedexX: It has incredible intellect and intuition. Whatever the situation, it remains calm and collected.
pokedexY: When its head was bitten, toxins entered Slowpoke's head and unlocked an extraordinary power.
pokedexOR: Slowking undertakes research every day in an effort to solve the mysteries of the world. However, this PokÃ©mon apparently forgets everything it has learned if the Shellder on its head comes off.
pokedexAS: Slowking undertakes research every day in an effort to solve the mysteries of the world. However, this PokÃ©mon apparently forgets everything it has learned if the Shellder on its head comes off.

name: Misdreavus
pokedexX: It gets nourishment from fear that it absorbs into its red orbs. In daytime, it sleeps in darkness.
pokedexY: It likes playing mischievous tricks, such as screaming and wailing to startle people at night.
pokedexOR: Misdreavus frightens people with a creepy, sobbing cry. The PokÃ©mon apparently uses its red spheres to absorb the fearful feelings of foes and turn them into nutrition.
pokedexAS: Misdreavus frightens people with a creepy, sobbing cry. The PokÃ©mon apparently uses its red spheres to absorb the fearful feelings of foes and turn them into nutrition.

name: Unown
pokedexX: Its flat, thin body is always stuck on walls. Its shape appears to have some meaning.
pokedexY: Shaped like ancient writing, it is a huge mystery whether language or Unown came first.
pokedexOR: This PokÃ©mon is shaped like ancient writing. It is a mystery as to which came first, the ancient writings or the various Unown. Research into this topic is ongoing but nothing is known.
pokedexAS: This PokÃ©mon is shaped like ancient writing. It is a mystery as to which came first, the ancient writings or the various Unown. Research into this topic is ongoing but nothing is known.

name: Wobbuffet
pokedexX: It hates light and shock. If attacked, it inflates its body to build up its counterstrike.
pokedexY: To keep its pitch-black tail hidden, it lives quietly in the darkness. It is never first to attack.
pokedexOR: If two or more Wobbuffet meet, they will turn competitive and try to outdo each other's endurance. However, they may try to see which one can endure the longest without food. Trainers need to beware of this habit.
pokedexAS: Wobbuffet does nothing but endure attacks-it won't attack on its own. However, it won't endure an attack on its tail. When that happens, the PokÃ©mon will try to take the foe with it using Destiny Bond.

name: Girafarig
pokedexX: While it sleeps, the head on is tail keeps watch. The tail doesn't need to sleep.
pokedexY: Its tail has a small brain of its own. Beware! If you get close, it may react to your scent by biting.
pokedexOR: Girafarig's rear head also has a brain, but it is small. The rear head attacks in response to smells and sounds. Approaching this PokÃ©mon from behind can cause the rear head to suddenly lash out and bite.
pokedexAS: Girafarig's rear head contains a tiny brain that is too small for thinking. However, the rear head doesn't need to sleep, so it can keep watch over its surroundings 24 hours a day.

name: Pineco
pokedexX: It likes to make its shell thicker by adding layers of tree bark. The additional weight doesn't bother it.
pokedexY: It looks just like a pinecone. Its shell protects it from bird PokÃ©mon that peck it by mistake.
pokedexOR: Pineco hangs from a tree branch and patiently waits for prey to come along. If the PokÃ©mon is disturbed while eating by someone shaking its tree, it drops down to the ground and explodes with no warning.
pokedexAS: Pineco hangs from a tree branch and patiently waits for prey to come along. If the PokÃ©mon is disturbed while eating by someone shaking its tree, it drops down to the ground and explodes with no warning.

name: Forretress
pokedexX: It is encased in a steel shell. Its peering eyes are all that can be seen of its mysterious innards.
pokedexY: It remains immovably rooted to its tree. It scatters pieces of its hard shell to drive its enemies away.
pokedexOR: Forretress conceals itself inside its hardened steel shell. The shell is opened when the PokÃ©mon is catching prey, but it does so at such a quick pace that the shell's inside cannot be seen.
pokedexAS: Forretress conceals itself inside its hardened steel shell. The shell is opened when the PokÃ©mon is catching prey, but it does so at such a quick pace that the shell's inside cannot be seen.

name: Dunsparce
pokedexX: When spotted, this PokÃ©mon escapes backward by furiously boring into the ground with its tail.
pokedexY: It digs into the ground with its tail and makes a mazelike nest. It can fly just a little.
pokedexOR: Dunsparce has a drill for its tail. It uses this tail to burrow into the ground backward. This PokÃ©mon is known to make its nest in complex shapes deep under the ground.
pokedexAS: Dunsparce has a drill for its tail. It uses this tail to burrow into the ground backward. This PokÃ©mon is known to make its nest in complex shapes deep under the ground.

name: Gligar
pokedexX: It usually clings to cliffs. When it spots its prey, it spreads its wings and glides down to attack.
pokedexY: It flies straight at its target's face, then clamps down on the startled victim to inject poison.
pokedexOR: Gligar glides through the air without a sound as if it were sliding. This PokÃ©mon hangs on to the face of its foe using its clawed hind legs and the large pincers on its forelegs, then injects the prey with its poison barb.
pokedexAS: Gligar glides through the air without a sound as if it were sliding. This PokÃ©mon hangs on to the face of its foe using its clawed hind legs and the large pincers on its forelegs, then injects the prey with its poison barb.

name: Steelix
pokedexX: Tempered underground under high pressure and heat, its body is harder than any metal.
pokedexY: It chews its way through boulders with its sturdy jaws. Its eyes can see in the darkness underground.
pokedexOR: Steelix lives even further underground than Onix. This PokÃ©mon is known to dig toward the earth's core. There are records of this PokÃ©mon reaching a depth of over six-tenths of a mile underground.
pokedexAS: Steelix lives even further underground than Onix. This PokÃ©mon is known to dig toward the earth's core. There are records of this PokÃ©mon reaching a depth of over six-tenths of a mile underground.

name: Snubbull
pokedexX: It has an active, playful nature. Many women like to frolic with it because of its affectionate ways.
pokedexY: Small PokÃ©mon flee from its scary face. It is, however, considered by women to be cute.
pokedexOR: By baring its fangs and making a scary face, Snubbull sends smaller PokÃ©mon scurrying away in terror. However, this PokÃ©mon seems a little sad at making its foes flee.
pokedexAS: By baring its fangs and making a scary face, Snubbull sends smaller PokÃ©mon scurrying away in terror. However, this PokÃ©mon seems a little sad at making its foes flee.

name: Granbull
pokedexX: It is timid in spite of its looks. If it becomes enraged, however, it will strike with its huge fangs.
pokedexY: It can make most any PokÃ©mon run away simply by opening its mouth wide to reveal its big fangs.
pokedexOR: Granbull has a particularly well-developed lower jaw. The enormous fangs are heavy, causing the PokÃ©mon to tip its head back for balance. Unless it is startled, it will not try to bite indiscriminately.
pokedexAS: Granbull has a particularly well-developed lower jaw. The enormous fangs are heavy, causing the PokÃ©mon to tip its head back for balance. Unless it is startled, it will not try to bite indiscriminately.

name: Qwilfish
pokedexX: To fire its poison spikes, it must inflate its body by drinking over 2.6 gallons of water all at once.
pokedexY: The small spikes covering its body developed from scales. They inject a toxin that causes fainting.
pokedexOR: Qwilfish sucks in water, inflating itself. This PokÃ©mon uses the pressure of the water it swallowed to shoot toxic quills all at once from all over its body. It finds swimming somewhat challenging.
pokedexAS: Qwilfish sucks in water, inflating itself. This PokÃ©mon uses the pressure of the water it swallowed to shoot toxic quills all at once from all over its body. It finds swimming somewhat challenging.

name: Scizor
pokedexX: This PokÃ©mon's pincers, which contain steel, can crush any hard object it gets ahold of into bits.
pokedexY: It has a steel-hard body. It intimidates foes by upraising its eye-patterned pincers.
pokedexOR: Scizor has a body with the hardness of steel. It is not easily fazed by ordinary sorts of attacks. This PokÃ©mon flaps its wings to regulate its body temperature.
pokedexAS: Scizor has a body with the hardness of steel. It is not easily fazed by ordinary sorts of attacks. This PokÃ©mon flaps its wings to regulate its body temperature.

name: Shuckle
pokedexX: The berries stored in its jar-like shell eventually become a thick, pulpy juice.
pokedexY: It stores berries inside its shell. To avoid attacks, it hides beneath rocks and remains completely still.
pokedexOR: Shuckle quietly hides itself under rocks, keeping its body concealed inside its hard shell while eating berries it has stored away. The berries mix with its body fluids to become a juice.
pokedexAS: Shuckle quietly hides itself under rocks, keeping its body concealed inside its hard shell while eating berries it has stored away. The berries mix with its body fluids to become a juice.

name: Heracross
pokedexX: This powerful PokÃ©mon thrusts its prized horn under its enemies' bellies, then lifts and throws them.
pokedexY: With its Herculean powers, it can easily throw around an object that is 100 times its own weight.
pokedexOR: Heracross charges in a straight line at its foe, slips beneath the foe's grasp, and then scoops up and hurls the opponent with its mighty horn. This PokÃ©mon even has enough power to topple a massive tree.
pokedexAS: Heracross has sharp claws on its feet. These are planted firmly into the ground or the bark of a tree, giving the PokÃ©mon a secure and solid footing to forcefully fling away foes with its proud horn.

name: Sneasel
pokedexX: It feeds on eggs stolen from nests. Its sharply hooked claws rip vulnerable spots on prey.
pokedexY: Its paws conceal sharp claws. If attacked, it suddenly extends the claws and startles its enemy.
pokedexOR: Sneasel scales trees by punching its hooked claws into the bark. This PokÃ©mon seeks out unguarded nests and steals eggs for food while the parents are away.
pokedexAS: Sneasel scales trees by punching its hooked claws into the bark. This PokÃ©mon seeks out unguarded nests and steals eggs for food while the parents are away.

name: Teddiursa
pokedexX: If it finds honey, its crescent mark glows. It always licks its paws because they're soaked with honey.
pokedexY: Before food becomes scarce in wintertime, its habit is to hoard food in many hidden locations.
pokedexOR: This PokÃ©mon likes to lick its palms that are sweetened by being soaked in honey. Teddiursa concocts its own honey by blending fruits and pollen collected by Beedrill.
pokedexAS: This PokÃ©mon likes to lick its palms that are sweetened by being soaked in honey. Teddiursa concocts its own honey by blending fruits and pollen collected by Beedrill.

name: Ursaring
pokedexX: With its ability to distinguish any aroma, it unfailingly finds all food buried deep underground.
pokedexY: Although it has a large body, it is quite skilled at  climbing trees. It eats and sleeps in the treetops.
pokedexOR: In the forests inhabited by Ursaring, it is said that there are many streams and towering trees where they gather food. This PokÃ©mon walks through its forest gathering food every day.
pokedexAS: In the forests inhabited by Ursaring, it is said that there are many streams and towering trees where they gather food. This PokÃ©mon walks through its forest gathering food every day.

name: Slugma
pokedexX: A common sight in volcanic areas, it slowly slithers around in a constant search for warm places.
pokedexY: Its body is made of magma. If it doesn't keep moving, its body will cool and harden.
pokedexOR: Molten magma courses throughout Slugma's circulatory system. If this PokÃ©mon is chilled, the magma cools and hardens. Its body turns brittle and chunks fall off, reducing its size.
pokedexAS: Slugma does not have any blood in its body. Instead, intensely hot magma circulates throughout this PokÃ©mon's body, carrying essential nutrients and oxygen to its organs.

name: Magcargo
pokedexX: Its brittle shell occasionally spouts intense flames that circulate throughout its body.
pokedexY: Its body is as hot as lava and is always billowing. Flames will occasionally burst from its shell.
pokedexOR: Magcargo's shell is actually its skin that hardened as a result of cooling. Its shell is very brittle and fragile-just touching it causes it to crumble apart. This PokÃ©mon returns to its original size by dipping itself in magma.
pokedexAS: Magcargo's body temperature is approximately 18,000 degrees Fahrenheit. Water is vaporized on contact. If this PokÃ©mon is caught in the rain, the raindrops instantly turn into steam, cloaking the area in a thick fog.

name: Swinub
pokedexX: It rubs its snout on the ground to find and dig up food. It sometimes discovers hot springs.
pokedexY: If it smells something enticing, it dashes off headlong to find the source of the aroma.
pokedexOR: Swinub roots for food by rubbing its snout against the ground. Its favorite food is a mushroom that grows under the cover of dead grass. This PokÃ©mon occasionally roots out hot springs.
pokedexAS: Swinub roots for food by rubbing its snout against the ground. Its favorite food is a mushroom that grows under the cover of dead grass. This PokÃ©mon occasionally roots out hot springs.

name: Piloswine
pokedexX: Although its legs are short, its rugged hooves prevent it from slipping, even on icy ground.
pokedexY: Because the long hair all over its body obscures its sight, it just keeps charging repeatedly.
pokedexOR: Piloswine is covered by a thick coat of long hair that enables it to endure the freezing cold. This PokÃ©mon uses its tusks to dig up food that has been buried under ice.
pokedexAS: Piloswine is covered by a thick coat of long hair that enables it to endure the freezing cold. This PokÃ©mon uses its tusks to dig up food that has been buried under ice.

name: Corsola
pokedexX: It continuously sheds and grows. The tip of its head is prized as a treasure because of its beauty.
pokedexY: They prefer unpolluted southern seas. Their coral  branches lose their color and deteriorate in  dirty water.
pokedexOR: Corsola's branches glitter very beautifully in seven colors when they catch sunlight. If any branch breaks off, this PokÃ©mon grows it back in just one night.
pokedexAS: Clusters of Corsola congregate in warm seas where they serve as ideal hiding places for smaller PokÃ©mon. When the water temperature falls, this PokÃ©mon migrates to the southern seas.

name: Remoraid
pokedexX: It has superb accuracy. The water it shoots out can strike moving prey from more than 300 feet away.
pokedexY: Using its dorsal fin as a suction pad, it clings to a  Mantine's underside to scavenge for leftovers.
pokedexOR: Remoraid sucks in water, then expels it at high velocity using its abdominal muscles to shoot down flying prey. When evolution draws near, this PokÃ©mon travels downstream from rivers.
pokedexAS: Remoraid sucks in water, then expels it at high velocity using its abdominal muscles to shoot down flying prey. When evolution draws near, this PokÃ©mon travels downstream from rivers.

name: Octillery
pokedexX: It has a tendency to want to be in holes. It prefers rock crags or pots and sprays ink from them  before attacking.
pokedexY: It traps foes with the suction cups on its tentacles,  then smashes them with its rock-hard head.
pokedexOR: Octillery grabs onto its foe using its tentacles. This PokÃ©mon tries to immobilize it before delivering the finishing blow. If the foe turns out to be too strong, Octillery spews ink to escape.
pokedexAS: Octillery grabs onto its foe using its tentacles. This PokÃ©mon tries to immobilize it before delivering the finishing blow. If the foe turns out to be too strong, Octillery spews ink to escape.

name: Delibird
pokedexX: It carries food rolled up in its tail. It has the habit of sharing food with people lost in mountains.
pokedexY: It carries food all day long. When someone is lost in the mountains, it shares that food.
pokedexOR: Delibird carries its food bundled up in its tail. There once was a famous explorer who managed to reach the peak of the world's highest mountain, thanks to one of these PokÃ©mon sharing its food.
pokedexAS: Delibird carries its food bundled up in its tail. There once was a famous explorer who managed to reach the peak of the world's highest mountain, thanks to one of these PokÃ©mon sharing its food.

name: Mantine
pokedexX: If it builds up enough speed swimming, it can fly over 300 feet out of the water from the surface of the ocean.
pokedexY: While elegantly swimming in the sea, it ignores  Remoraid that cling to its fins seeking food scraps.
pokedexOR: On sunny days, schools of Mantine can be seen elegantly leaping over the sea's waves. This PokÃ©mon is not bothered by the Remoraid that hitches rides.
pokedexAS: On sunny days, schools of Mantine can be seen elegantly leaping over the sea's waves. This PokÃ©mon is not bothered by the Remoraid that hitches rides.

name: Skarmory
pokedexX: After nesting in bramble bushes, the wings of its chicks grow hard from scratches by thorns.
pokedexY: Despite being clad entirely in iron-hard armor,  it flies at speeds over 180 mph.
pokedexOR: Skarmory is entirely encased in hard, protective armor. This PokÃ©mon flies at close to 190 mph. It slashes foes with its wings that possess swordlike cutting edges.
pokedexAS: Skarmory's steel wings become tattered and bashed in from repeated battles. Once a year, the battered wings grow back completely, restoring the cutting edges to their pristine state.

name: Houndour
pokedexX: Around dawn, its ominous howl echoes through the area to announce that this is its territory.
pokedexY: To corner prey, they check each other's location using barks that only they can understand.
pokedexOR: Houndour hunt as a coordinated pack. They communicate with each other using a variety of cries to corner their prey. This PokÃ©mon's remarkable teamwork is unparalleled.
pokedexAS: Houndour hunt as a coordinated pack. They communicate with each other using a variety of cries to corner their prey. This PokÃ©mon's remarkable teamwork is unparalleled.

name: Houndoom
pokedexX: Long ago, people imagined its eerie howls to be the call of the grim reaper.
pokedexY: The flames it breathes when angry contain toxins.  If they cause a burn, it will hurt forever.
pokedexOR: In a Houndoom pack, the one with its horns raked sharply toward the back serves a leadership role. These PokÃ©mon choose their leader by fighting among themselves.
pokedexAS: In a Houndoom pack, the one with its horns raked sharply toward the back serves a leadership role. These PokÃ©mon choose their leader by fighting among themselves.

name: Kingdra
pokedexX: It is said that it usually hides in underwater caves. It can create whirlpools by yawning.
pokedexY: It stores energy by sleeping at underwater depths at which no other life-forms can survive.
pokedexOR: Kingdra lives at extreme ocean depths that are otherwise uninhabited. It has long been believed that the yawning of this PokÃ©mon creates spiraling ocean currents.
pokedexAS: Kingdra sleeps on the seafloor where it is otherwise devoid of life. When a storm arrives, the PokÃ©mon is said to awaken and wander about in search of prey.

name: Phanpy
pokedexX: As a sign of affection, it bumps with its snout. However, it is so strong, it may send you flying.
pokedexY: It is strong despite its compact size. It can easily pick up and carry an adult human on its back.
pokedexOR: For its nest, Phanpy digs a vertical pit in the ground at the edge of a river. It marks the area around its nest with its trunk to let the others know that the area has been claimed.
pokedexAS: Phanpy uses its long nose to shower itself. When others gather around, they thoroughly douse each other with water. These PokÃ©mon can be seen drying their soaking-wet bodies at the edge of water.

name: Donphan
pokedexX: It has sharp, hard tusks and a rugged hide. Its Tackle is strong enough to knock down a house.
pokedexY: The longer and bigger its tusks, the higher its rank in its herd. The tusks take long to grow,
pokedexOR: Donphan's favorite attack is curling its body into a ball, then charging at its foe while rolling at high speed. Once it starts rolling, this PokÃ©mon can't stop very easily.
pokedexAS: If Donphan were to tackle with its hard body, even a house could be destroyed. Using its massive strength, the PokÃ©mon helps clear rock and mud slides that block mountain trails.

name: Porygon2
pokedexX: Further research enhanced its abilities. Sometimes, it may exhibit motions that were not programmed.
pokedexY: With planetary development software installed, it became capable of working in space.
pokedexOR: Porygon2 was created by humans using the power of science. The man-made PokÃ©mon has been endowed with artificial intelligence that enables it to learn new gestures and emotions on its own.
pokedexAS: Porygon2 was created by humans using the power of science. The man-made PokÃ©mon has been endowed with artificial intelligence that enables it to learn new gestures and emotions on its own.

name: Stantler
pokedexX: Staring at its antlers creates an odd sensation as if one were being drawn into their centers.
pokedexY: The curved antlers subtly change the flow of air to create a strange space where reality is distorted.
pokedexOR: Stantler's magnificent antlers were traded at high prices as works of art. As a result, this PokÃ©mon was hunted close to extinction by those who were after the priceless antlers.
pokedexAS: Stantler's magnificent antlers were traded at high prices as works of art. As a result, this PokÃ©mon was hunted close to extinction by those who were after the priceless antlers.

name: Smeargle
pokedexX: It marks its territory by using its tail like a paintbrush. There are more than 5,000 different marks.
pokedexY: Once it becomes an adult, it has a tendency to let its comrades plant footprints on its back.
pokedexOR: Smeargle marks the boundaries of its territory using a body fluid that leaks out from the tip of its tail. Over 5,000 different marks left by this PokÃ©mon have been found.
pokedexAS: Smeargle marks the boundaries of its territory using a body fluid that leaks out from the tip of its tail. Over 5,000 different marks left by this PokÃ©mon have been found.

name: Tyrogue
pokedexX: It is always bursting with energy. To make itself stronger, it keeps on fighting even if it loses.
pokedexY: To brush up on its fighting skills, it will challenge anyone. It has a very strong competitive spirit.
pokedexOR: Tyrogue becomes stressed out if it does not get to train every day. When raising this PokÃ©mon, the Trainer must establish and uphold various training methods.
pokedexAS: Tyrogue becomes stressed out if it does not get to train every day. When raising this PokÃ©mon, the Trainer must establish and uphold various training methods.

name: Hitmontop
pokedexX: It fights while spinning like a top. The centrifugal force boosts its destructive power by 10.
pokedexY: If you are enchanted by its smooth, dance-like kicks, you may get a closer experience with one than you'd like.
pokedexOR: Hitmontop spins on its head at high speed, all the while delivering kicks. This technique is a remarkable mix of both offense and defense at the same time. The PokÃ©mon travels faster spinning than it does walking.
pokedexAS: Hitmontop spins on its head at high speed, all the while delivering kicks. This technique is a remarkable mix of both offense and defense at the same time. The PokÃ©mon travels faster spinning than it does walking.

name: Smoochum
pokedexX: Its lips are the most sensitive part of its body. It always uses its lips first to examine things.
pokedexY: It tests everything by touching with its lips, which remember what it likes and dislikes.
pokedexOR: Smoochum actively runs about, but also falls quite often. Whenever the chance arrives, it will look for its reflection to make sure its face hasn't become dirty.
pokedexAS: Smoochum actively runs about, but also falls quite often. Whenever the chance arrives, it will look for its reflection to make sure its face hasn't become dirty.

name: Elekid
pokedexX: It generates electricity by whirling its arms. However, it can't store the energy it makes.
pokedexY: Spinning its arms around to generate electricity makes the area between its horns shine light blue.
pokedexOR: Elekid stores electricity in its body. If it touches metal and accidentally discharges all its built-up electricity, this PokÃ©mon begins swinging its arms in circles to recharge itself.
pokedexAS: Elekid stores electricity in its body. If it touches metal and accidentally discharges all its built-up electricity, this PokÃ©mon begins swinging its arms in circles to recharge itself.

name: Magby
pokedexX: It's small, but its body temperature is over 1,100 degrees Fahrenheit. Embers escape its mouth and nose when it breathes.
pokedexY: Its magma-like blood circulates throughout its body. Its body's heat can top 1,100 degrees Fahrenheit.
pokedexOR: Magby's state of health is determined by observing the fire it breathes. If the PokÃ©mon is spouting yellow flames from its mouth, it is in good health. When it is fatigued, black smoke will be mixed in with the flames.
pokedexAS: Magby's state of health is determined by observing the fire it breathes. If the PokÃ©mon is spouting yellow flames from its mouth, it is in good health. When it is fatigued, black smoke will be mixed in with the flames.

name: Miltank
pokedexX: If it is around babies, the milk it produces contains much more nutrition than usual.
pokedexY: Its milk is packed with nutrition, making it the ultimate beverage for the sick or weary.
pokedexOR: Miltank gives over five gallons of milk on a daily basis. Its sweet milk is enjoyed by children and grown-ups alike. People who can't drink milk turn it into yogurt and eat it instead.
pokedexAS: Miltank gives over five gallons of milk on a daily basis. Its sweet milk is enjoyed by children and grown-ups alike. People who can't drink milk turn it into yogurt and eat it instead.

name: Blissey
pokedexX: The eggs it lays are filled with happiness. Eating even one bite will bring a smile to anyone.
pokedexY: This kindhearted PokÃ©mon nurses sick PokÃ©mon to health. It senses feelings of sadness.
pokedexOR: Blissey senses sadness with its fluffy coat of fur. If it does so, this PokÃ©mon will rush over to a sad person, no matter how far away, to share a Lucky Egg that brings a smile to any face.
pokedexAS: Blissey senses sadness with its fluffy coat of fur. If it does so, this PokÃ©mon will rush over to a sad person, no matter how far away, to share a Lucky Egg that brings a smile to any face.

name: Raikou
pokedexX: The rain clouds it carries let it fire thunderbolts at will. They say that it descended with lightning.
pokedexY: This rough PokÃ©mon stores energy inside its body, then sweeps across the land, shooting off electricity
pokedexOR: Raikou embodies the speed of lightning. The roars of this PokÃ©mon send shock waves shuddering through the air and shake the ground as if lightning bolts had come crashing down.
pokedexAS: Raikou embodies the speed of lightning. The roars of this PokÃ©mon send shock waves shuddering through the air and shake the ground as if lightning bolts had come crashing down.

name: Entei
pokedexX: A PokÃ©mon that races across the land. It is said that one is born every time a new volcano appears.
pokedexY: It is said that when it roars, a volcano erupts somewhere around the globe.
pokedexOR: Entei embodies the passion of magma. This PokÃ©mon is thought to have been born in the eruption of a volcano. It sends up massive bursts of fire that utterly consume all that they touch.
pokedexAS: Entei embodies the passion of magma. This PokÃ©mon is thought to have been born in the eruption of a volcano. It sends up massive bursts of fire that utterly consume all that they touch.

name: Suicune
pokedexX: It races around the world to purify fouled water. It dashes away with the north wind.
pokedexY: Said to be the embodiment of north winds, it can instantly purify filthy, murky water.
pokedexOR: Suicune embodies the compassion of a pure spring of water. It runs across the land with gracefulness. This PokÃ©mon has the power to purify dirty water.
pokedexAS: Suicune embodies the compassion of a pure spring of water. It runs across the land with gracefulness. This PokÃ©mon has the power to purify dirty water.

name: Larvitar
pokedexX: It feeds on soil. After it has eaten a large mountain, it falls asleep so it can grow.
pokedexY: Born deep underground, it comes aboveground and becomes a pupa once it has finished eating the surrounding soil.
pokedexOR: Larvitar is born deep under the ground. To come up to the surface, this PokÃ©mon must eat its way through the soil above. Until it does so, Larvitar cannot see its parents.
pokedexAS: Larvitar is born deep under the ground. To come up to the surface, this PokÃ©mon must eat its way through the soil above. Until it does so, Larvitar cannot see its parents.

name: Pupitar
pokedexX: Its body is as hard as bedrock. By venting pressurized gas, it can launch itself like a rocket.
pokedexY: Its shell is as hard as sheet rock, and it is also very strong. Its thrashing can topple a mountain.
pokedexOR: Pupitar creates a gas inside its body that it compresses and forcefully ejects to propel itself like a jet. The body is very durable-it avoids damage even if it hits solid steel.
pokedexAS: Pupitar creates a gas inside its body that it compresses and forcefully ejects to propel itself like a jet. The body is very durable-it avoids damage even if it hits solid steel.

name: Tyranitar
pokedexX: In just one of its mighty hands, it has the power to make the ground shake and mountains crumble.
pokedexY: If it rampages, it knocks down mountains and buries  rivers. Maps must be redrawn afterward.
pokedexOR: Tyranitar is so overwhelmingly powerful, it can bring down a whole mountain to make its nest. This PokÃ©mon wanders about in mountains seeking new opponents to fight.
pokedexAS: Tyranitar is so overwhelmingly powerful, it can bring down a whole mountain to make its nest. This PokÃ©mon wanders about in mountains seeking new opponents to fight.

name: Lugia
pokedexX: It sleeps in a deep-sea trench. If it flaps its wings, it is said to cause a 40-day storm.
pokedexY: It is said to be the guardian of the seas. It is rumored to have been seen on the night of a storm.
pokedexOR: Lugia's wings pack devastating power-a light fluttering of its wings can blow apart regular houses. As a result, this PokÃ©mon chooses to live out of sight deep under the sea.
pokedexAS: Lugia's wings pack devastating power-a light fluttering of its wings can blow apart regular houses. As a result, this PokÃ©mon chooses to live out of sight deep under the sea.

name: Ho-Oh
pokedexX: A legend says that its body glows in seven colors. A rainbow is said to form behind it when it flies.
pokedexY: It will reveal itself before a pure-hearted Trainer by shining its bright, rainbow-colored wings.
pokedexOR: Ho-Oh's feathers glow in seven colors depending on the angle at which they are struck by light. These feathers are said to bring happiness to the bearers. This PokÃ©mon is said to live at the foot of a rainbow.
pokedexAS: Ho-Oh's feathers glow in seven colors depending on the angle at which they are struck by light. These feathers are said to bring happiness to the bearers. This PokÃ©mon is said to live at the foot of a rainbow.

name: Celebi
pokedexX: This PokÃ©mon wanders across time. Grass and trees flourish in the forests in which it has appeared.
pokedexY: It has the power to travel across time, but it is said to appear only in peaceful times.
pokedexOR: This PokÃ©mon came from the future by crossing over time. It is thought that so long as Celebi appears, a bright and shining future awaits us.
pokedexAS: This PokÃ©mon came from the future by crossing over time. It is thought that so long as Celebi appears, a bright and shining future awaits us.

name: Treecko
pokedexX: It quickly scales even vertical walls. It senses humidity with its tail to predict the next day's weather.
pokedexY: Small hooks on the bottom of its feet catch on walls and ceilings. That is how it can hang from above.
pokedexOR: Treecko has small hooks on the bottom of its feet that enable it to scale vertical walls. This PokÃ©mon attacks by slamming foes with its thick tail.
pokedexAS: Treecko is cool, calm, and collected-it never panics under any situation. If a bigger foe were to glare at this PokÃ©mon, it would glare right back without conceding an inch of ground.

name: Grovyle
pokedexX: Its strongly developed thigh muscles give it astounding agility and jumping performance.
pokedexY: It leaps from tree branch to tree branch quite swiftly. It shows astounding agility.
pokedexOR: The leaves growing out of Grovyle's body are convenient for camouflaging it from enemies in the forest. This PokÃ©mon is a master at climbing trees in jungles.
pokedexAS: This PokÃ©mon adeptly flies from branch to branch in trees. In a forest, no PokÃ©mon can ever hope to catch a fleeing Grovyle however fast they may be.

name: Sceptile
pokedexX: The leaves on its forelegs are as sharp as swords. It agilely leaps about the branches of trees to strike.
pokedexY: It agilely leaps about the jungle and uses the sharp leaves on its arms to strike its prey.
pokedexOR: The leaves growing on Sceptile's body are very sharp edged. This PokÃ©mon is very agile-it leaps all over the branches of trees and jumps on its foe from above or behind.
pokedexAS: Sceptile has seeds growing on its back. They are said to be bursting with nutrients that revitalize trees. This PokÃ©mon raises the trees in a forest with loving care.

name: Torchic
pokedexX: It has a flame sac inside its belly that perpetually burns. It feels warm if hugged.
pokedexY: A fire burns inside, so it feels very warm to hug. It launches fireballs of 1,800 degrees Fahrenheit.
pokedexOR: Torchic sticks with its Trainer, following behind with unsteady steps. This PokÃ©mon breathes fire of over 1,800 degrees Fahrenheit, including fireballs that leave the foe scorched black.
pokedexAS: Torchic has a place inside its body where it keeps its flame. Give it a hug-it will be glowing with warmth. This PokÃ©mon is covered all over by a fluffy coat of down.

name: Combusken
pokedexX: Its kicking mastery lets it loose 10 kicks per second. It emits sharp creis to intimidate foes.
pokedexY: During a battle, the hot flame in its body increases. Its kicks have outstanding destructive power.
pokedexOR: Combusken toughens up its legs and thighs by running through fields and mountains. This PokÃ©mon's legs possess both speed and power, enabling it to dole out 10 kicks in one second.
pokedexAS: Combusken battles with the intensely hot flames it spews from its beak and with outstandingly destructive kicks. This PokÃ©mon's cry is very loud and distracting.

name: Blaziken
pokedexX: It can clear a 30-story building in a leap. Its fiery punches scorch its foes.
pokedexY: When facing a tough foe, it looses flames from its wrists. Its powerful legs it jump clear over buildings.
pokedexOR: In battle, Blaziken blows out intense flames from its wrists and attacks foes courageously. The stronger the foe, the more intensely this PokÃ©mon's wrists burn.
