pokedexAS: Blaziken has incredibly strong legs-it can easily clear a 30-story building in one leap. This PokÃ©mon's blazing punches leave its foes scorched and blackened.

name: Mudkip
pokedexX: Its large tail fin propels it through water with powerful acceleration. It is strong in spite of its size.
pokedexY: To alert it, the fin on its head senses the flow of water. It has the strength to heft boulders.
pokedexOR: The fin on Mudkip's head acts as highly sensitive radar. Using this fin to sense movements of water and air, this PokÃ©mon can determine what is taking place around it without using its eyes.
pokedexAS: In water, Mudkip breathes using the gills on its cheeks. If it is faced with a tight situation in battle, this PokÃ©mon will unleash its amazing power-it can crush rocks bigger than itself.

name: Marshtomp
pokedexX: It is at its best when on muddy ground with poor footing. It quickly overwhelms foes struggling in mud.
pokedexY: Living on muddy ground that provides poor footing has made its legs sturdy.
pokedexOR: The surface of Marshtomp's body is enveloped by a thin, sticky film that enables it to live on land. This PokÃ©mon plays in mud on beaches when the ocean tide is low.
pokedexAS: Marshtomp is much faster at traveling through mud than it is at swimming. This PokÃ©mon's hindquarters exhibit obvious development, giving it the ability to walk on just its hind legs.

name: Swampert
pokedexX: Its arms are rock-hard. With one swing, they can batter down its foe. It makes its nest on beautiful beaches.
pokedexY: It can swim while towing a large ship. It bashes down foes with a swing of its thick arms.
pokedexOR: Swampert is very strong. It has enough power to easily drag a boulder weighing more than a ton. This PokÃ©mon also has powerful vision that lets it see even in murky water.
pokedexAS: Swampert predicts storms by sensing subtle differences in the sounds of waves and tidal winds with its fins. If a storm is approaching, it piles up boulders to protect itself.

name: Poochyena
pokedexX: A PokÃ©mon with a persistent nature, it chases its chosen prey until the prey becomes exhausted.
pokedexY: It has a very tenacious nature. Its acute sense of smell lets it chase a chosen prey without ever losing track.
pokedexOR: At first sight, Poochyena takes a bite at anything that moves. This PokÃ©mon chases after prey until the victim becomes exhausted. However, it may turn tail if the prey strikes back.
pokedexAS: Poochyena is an omnivore-it will eat anything. A distinguishing feature is how large its fangs are compared to its body. This PokÃ©mon tries to intimidate its foes by making the hair on its tail bristle out.

name: Mightyena
pokedexX: It will always obey the commands of a skilled Trainer. Its behavior arises from its living in packs in ancient times.
pokedexY: It chases down prey in a pack of around ten. They defeat foes with perfectly coordinated teamwork.
pokedexOR: Mightyena gives obvious signals when it is preparing to attack. It starts to growl deeply and then flattens its body. This PokÃ©mon will bite savagely with its sharply pointed fangs.
pokedexAS: Mightyena travel and act as a pack in the wild. The memory of its life in the wild compels the PokÃ©mon to obey only those Trainers that it recognizes to possess superior skill.

name: Zigzagoon
pokedexX: It walks in zigzag fashion. It's good at finding items in the grass and even in the ground.
pokedexY: A PokÃ©mon with abundant curiosity. It shows an interest in everything, so it always zigzags.
pokedexOR: Zigzagoon restlessly wanders everywhere at all times. This PokÃ©mon does so because it is very curious. It becomes interested in anything that it happens to see.
pokedexAS: The hair on Zigzagoon's back is bristly. It rubs the hard back hair against trees to leave its territorial markings. This PokÃ©mon may play dead to fool foes in battle.

name: Linoone
pokedexX: When running in a straight line, it can easily top 60 miles an hour. It has a tough time with curved roads.
pokedexY: It charges prey at speeds over 60 mph. However, because it can only run straight, it often fails.
pokedexOR: Linoone always runs full speed and only in straight lines. If facing an obstacle, it makes a right-angle turn to evade it. This PokÃ©mon is very challenged by gently curving roads.
pokedexAS: When hunting, Linoone will make a beeline straight for the prey at a full run. While this PokÃ©mon is capable of topping 60 mph, it has to come to a screeching halt before it can turn.

name: Wurmple
pokedexX: It loves to eat leaves. If it is attacked by a Starly, it will defend itself with its spiked rear.
pokedexY: It lives among the tall grass and in forests. It repels attacks by raising up the spikes on its rear.
pokedexOR: Using the spikes on its rear end, Wurmple peels the bark off trees and feeds on the sap that oozes out. This PokÃ©mon's feet are tipped with suction pads that allow it to cling to glass without slipping.
pokedexAS: Wurmple is targeted by Swellow as prey. This PokÃ©mon will try to resist by pointing the spikes on its rear at the attacking predator. It will weaken the foe by leaking poison from the spikes.

name: Silcoon
pokedexX: It wraps silk around the branches of a tree. It drinks rainwater on its silk while awaiting evolution.
pokedexY: It drinks dew that collects on its silk and waits for evolution. Its hard cocoon repels attacks.
pokedexOR: Silcoon tethers itself to a tree branch using silk to keep from falling. There, this PokÃ©mon hangs quietly while it awaits evolution. It peers out of the silk cocoon through a small hole.
pokedexAS: Silcoon was thought to endure hunger and not consume anything before its evolution. However, it is now thought that this PokÃ©mon slakes its thirst by drinking rainwater that collects on its silk.

name: Beautifly
pokedexX: Vibrantly patterned wings are its prominent feature. It sucks sweet flower nectar with its long mouth.
pokedexY: It has an aggressive nature. It stabs prey with its long, narrow mouth to drain the prey's fluids.
pokedexOR: Beautifly's favorite food is the sweet pollen of flowers. If you want to see this PokÃ©mon, just leave a potted flower by an open window. Beautifly is sure to come looking for pollen.
pokedexAS: Beautifly has a long mouth like a coiled needle, which is very convenient for collecting pollen from flowers. This PokÃ©mon rides the spring winds as it flits around gathering pollen.

name: Cascoon
pokedexX: Its body, which is made of soft silk, hardens over time. When cracks appear, evolution is near.
pokedexY: It never forgets any attack it endured while in the cocoon. After evolution, it seeks payback.
pokedexOR: Cascoon makes its protective cocoon by wrapping its body entirely with a fine silk from its mouth. Once the silk goes around its body, it hardens. This PokÃ©mon prepares for its evolution inside the cocoon.
pokedexAS: If it is attacked, Cascoon remains motionless however badly it may be hurt. It does so because if it were to move, its body would be weak upon evolution. This PokÃ©mon will also not forget the pain it endured.

name: Dustox
pokedexX: A nocturnal PokÃ©mon. Drawn by streetlights, they messily eat the leaves of trees lining boulevards.
pokedexY: It violently flutters its wings to scatter toxic dust when attacked. It becomes active after sunset.
pokedexOR: Dustox is instinctively drawn to light. Swarms of this PokÃ©mon are attracted by the bright lights of cities, where they wreak havoc by stripping the leaves off roadside trees for food.
pokedexAS: When Dustox flaps its wings, a fine dust is scattered all over. This dust is actually a powerful poison that will even make a pro wrestler sick. This PokÃ©mon searches for food using its antennae like radar.

name: Lotad
pokedexX: It looks like an aquatic plant and serves as a ferry to PokÃ©mon that can't swim.
pokedexY: It searches about for clean water. If it does not drink water for too long, the leaf on its head wilts.
pokedexOR: Lotad live in ponds and lakes, where they float on the surface. It grows weak if its broad leaf dies. On rare occasions, this PokÃ©mon travels on land in search of clean water.
pokedexAS: Lotad is said to have dwelled on land before. However, this PokÃ©mon is thought to have returned to water because the leaf on its head grew large and heavy. It now lives by floating atop the water.

name: Lombre
pokedexX: It lives at the water's edge where it is sunny. It sleeps on a bed of water-grass by day and becomes active at night.
pokedexY: It has a mischievous spirit. If it spots an angler,  it will tug on the fishing line to interfere.
pokedexOR: Lombre is nocturnal-it will get active after dusk. It is also a mischief maker. When this PokÃ©mon spots anglers, it tugs on their fishing lines from beneath the surface and enjoys their consternation.
pokedexAS: Lombre's entire body is covered by a slippery, slimy film. It feels horribly unpleasant to be touched by this PokÃ©mon's hands. Lombre is often mistaken for a human child.

name: Ludicolo
pokedexX: If it hears festive music, all its muscles fill with energy. It can't help breaking out into a dance.
pokedexY: The rhythm of bright, festive music activates  Ludicolo's cells, making it more powerful.
pokedexOR: Ludicolo begins dancing as soon as it hears cheerful, festive music. This PokÃ©mon is said to appear when it hears the singing of children on hiking outings.
pokedexAS: Upon hearing an upbeat and cheerful rhythm, the cells in Ludicolo's body become very energetic and active. Even in battle, this PokÃ©mon will exhibit an amazing amount of power.

name: Seedot
pokedexX: It attaches itself to a tree branch using the top of its head. Strong winds can sometimes make it fall.
pokedexY: When it dangles from a tree branch, it looks just like an acorn. It enjoys scaring other PokÃ©mon.
pokedexOR: Seedot attaches itself to a tree branch using the top of its head. It sucks moisture from the tree while hanging off the branch. The more water it drinks, the glossier this PokÃ©mon's body becomes.
pokedexAS: Seedot looks exactly like an acorn when it is dangling from a tree branch. It startles other PokÃ©mon by suddenly moving. This PokÃ©mon polishes its body once a day using leaves.

name: Nuzleaf
pokedexX: The sound of its grass flute makes its listeners uneasy. It lives deep in forests.
pokedexY: It lives deep in forests. With the leaf on its head, it makes a flute whose song makes listeners uneasy.
pokedexOR: Nuzleaf live in densely overgrown forests. They occasionally venture out of the forest to startle people. This PokÃ©mon dislikes having its long nose pinched.
pokedexAS: This PokÃ©mon pulls out the leaf on its head and makes a flute with it. The sound of Nuzleaf's flute strikes fear and uncertainty in the hearts of people lost in a forest.

name: Shiftry
pokedexX: A PokÃ©mon that was feared as a forest guardian. It can read the foe's mind and take preemptive action.
pokedexY: By flapping its leafy fan, it can whip up gusts of 100 feet per second that can level houses.
pokedexOR: Shiftry is a mysterious PokÃ©mon that is said to live atop towering trees dating back over a thousand years. It creates terrific windstorms with the fans it holds.
pokedexAS: Shiftry's large fans generate awesome gusts of wind at a speed close to 100 feet per second. The whipped-up wind blows anything away. This PokÃ©mon chooses to live quietly deep in forests.

name: Taillow
pokedexX: It has a gutsy spirit that makes it bravely take on tough foes. It flies in search of warm climates.
pokedexY: It dislikes cold seasons. They migrate to other lands in search of warmth, flying over 180 miles a day.
pokedexOR: Taillow courageously stands its ground against foes, however strong they may be. This gutsy PokÃ©mon will remain defiant even after a loss. On the other hand, it cries loudly if it becomes hungry.
pokedexAS: Taillow is young-it has only just left its nest. As a result, it sometimes becomes lonesome and cries at night. This PokÃ©mon feeds on Wurmple that live in forests.

name: Swellow
pokedexX: If its two tail feathers are standing at attention, it is proof of good health. It soars elegantly in the sky.
pokedexY: It dives at a steep angle as soon as it spots its prey. It catches its prey with sharp claws.
pokedexOR: Swellow flies high above our heads, making graceful arcs in the sky. This PokÃ©mon dives at a steep angle as soon as it spots its prey. The hapless prey is tightly grasped by Swellow's clawed feet, preventing escape.
pokedexAS: Swellow is very conscientious about the upkeep of its glossy wings. Once two Swellow are gathered, they diligently take care of cleaning each other's wings.

name: Wingull
pokedexX: Catching sea winds with its long wings, it soars as if it were a glider. It folds its wings to rest.
pokedexY: It makes its nest on steep sea cliffs.  Riding updrafts, it soars to great heights.
pokedexOR: Wingull has the habit of carrying prey and valuables in its beak and hiding them in all sorts of locations. This PokÃ©mon rides the winds and flies as if it were skating across the sky.
pokedexAS: Wingull rides updrafts rising from the sea by extending its long and narrow wings to glide. This PokÃ©mon's long beak is useful for catching prey.

name: Pelipper
pokedexX: It dips its large bill in the sea, then scoops up numerous prey along with water.
pokedexY: It is a messenger of the skies, carrying small  PokÃ©mon and eggs to safety in its bill.
pokedexOR: Pelipper is a flying transporter that carries small PokÃ©mon and eggs inside its massive bill. This PokÃ©mon builds its nest on steep cliffs facing the sea.
pokedexAS: Pelipper searches for food while in flight by skimming the wave tops. This PokÃ©mon dips its large bill in the sea to scoop up food, then swallows everything in one big gulp.

name: Ralts
pokedexX: If its horns capture the warm feelings of people or  PokÃ©mon, its body warms up slightly.
pokedexY: It is highly attuned to the emotions of people and  PokÃ©mon. It hides if it senses hostility.
pokedexOR: Ralts senses the emotions of people using the horns on its head. This PokÃ©mon rarely appears before people. But when it does, it draws closer if it senses that the person has a positive disposition.
pokedexAS: Ralts has the ability to sense the emotions of people. If its Trainer is in a cheerful mood, this PokÃ©mon grows cheerful and joyous in the same way.

name: Kirlia
pokedexX: The cheerful spirit of its Trainer gives it energy for  its psychokinetic power. It spins and dances  when happy.
pokedexY: It has a psychic power that enables it to distort the  space around it and see into the future.
pokedexOR: It is said that a Kirlia that is exposed to the positive emotions of its Trainer grows beautiful. This PokÃ©mon controls psychokinetic powers with its highly developed brain.
pokedexAS: Kirlia uses the horns on its head to amplify its psychokinetic power. When the PokÃ©mon uses its power, the air around it becomes distorted, creating mirages of nonexistent scenery.

name: Gardevoir
pokedexX: To protect its Trainer, it will expend all its psychic power to create a small black hole.
pokedexY: It has the power to predict the future. Its power peaks when it is protecting its Trainer.
pokedexOR: Gardevoir has the ability to read the future. If it senses impending danger to its Trainer, this PokÃ©mon is said to unleash its psychokinetic energy at full power.
pokedexAS: Gardevoir has the psychokinetic power to distort the dimensions and create a small black hole. This PokÃ©mon will try to protect its Trainer even at the risk of its own life.

name: Surskit
pokedexX: They usually live on ponds, but after an evening shower, they may appear on puddles in towns.
pokedexY: It appears as if it is skating on water. It draws prey with a sweet scent from the tip of its head.
pokedexOR: From the tips of its feet, Surskit secretes an oil that enables it to walk on water as if it were skating. This PokÃ©mon feeds on microscopic organisms in ponds and lakes.
pokedexAS: If Surskit senses danger, it secretes a thick, sugary syrup from the tip of its head. There are some PokÃ©mon that love eating this syrup.

name: Masquerain
pokedexX: Its antennae have eye patterns on them. Its four wings enable it to hover and fly in any direction.
pokedexY: It flaps its four wings to hover and fly freely in any direction--to and fro and sideways.
pokedexOR: Masquerain intimidates enemies with the eyelike patterns on its antennas. This PokÃ©mon flaps its four wings to freely fly in any direction-even sideways and backwards-as if it were a helicopter.
pokedexAS: Masquerain's antennas have eyelike patterns that usually give it an angry look. If the "eyes" are droopy and appear sad, it is said to be a sign that a heavy rainfall is on its way.

name: Shroomish
pokedexX: It prefers damp places. By day it remains still in the forest shade. It releases toxic powder from its head.
pokedexY: It spouts poison spores from the top of its head. These spores cause pain all over if inhaled.
pokedexOR: Shroomish live in damp soil in the dark depths of forests. They are often found keeping still under fallen leaves. This PokÃ©mon feeds on compost that is made up of fallen, rotted leaves.
pokedexAS: If Shroomish senses danger, it shakes its body and scatters spores from the top of its head. This PokÃ©mon's spores are so toxic, they make trees and weeds wilt.

name: Breloom
pokedexX: Its short arms stretch when it throws punches. Its technique is equal to that of pro boxers.
pokedexY: It scatters poisonous spores and throws powerful punches while its foe is hampered by inhaled spores.
pokedexOR: Breloom closes in on its foe with light and sprightly footwork, then throws punches with its stretchy arms. This PokÃ©mon's fighting technique puts boxers to shame.
pokedexAS: The seeds ringing Breloom's tail are made of hardened toxic spores. It is horrible to eat the seeds. Just taking a bite of this PokÃ©mon's seed will cause your stomach to rumble.

name: Slakoth
pokedexX: The way Slakoth lolls around makes anyone who watches it feel like doing the same.
pokedexY: If it eats just three leaves a day, it is satisfied. Other than that, it sleeps for 20 hours a day.
pokedexOR: Slakoth lolls around for over 20 hours every day. Because it moves so little, it does not need much food. This PokÃ©mon's sole daily meal consists of just three leaves.
pokedexAS: Slakoth's heart beats just once a minute. Whatever happens, it is content to loaf around motionless. It is rare to see this PokÃ©mon in motion.

name: Vigoroth
pokedexX: Its hearbeat is fast and its blood so agitated that it can't sit still for one secodn.
pokedexY: Its stress level rises if it cannot keep moving constantly. Too much stress makes it feel sick.
pokedexOR: Vigoroth is always itching and agitated to go on a wild rampage. It simply can't tolerate sitting still for even a minute. This PokÃ©mon's stress level rises if it can't be moving constantly.
pokedexAS: Vigoroth is simply incapable of remaining still. Even when it tries to sleep, the blood in its veins grows agitated, compelling this PokÃ©mon to run wild throughout the jungle before it can settle down.

name: Slaking
pokedexX: The world's laziest PokÃ©mon. When it is lounging, it is actually saving energy for striking back.
pokedexY: It is the world's most slothful PokÃ©mon However, it can exert horrifying power by releasing pent-up energy all at once.
pokedexOR: Slaking spends all day lying down and lolling about. It eats grass growing within its reach. If it eats all the grass it can reach, this PokÃ©mon reluctantly moves to another spot.
pokedexAS: Wherever Slaking live, rings of over a yard in diameter appear in grassy fields. They are made by the PokÃ©mon as it eats all the grass within reach while lying prone on the ground.

name: Nincada
pokedexX: Because it lived almost entirely underground, it is nearly blind. It uses its antennae instead.
pokedexY: It can sometimes live underground for more than 10 years. It absorbs nutrients from the roots of trees.
pokedexOR: Nincada lives underground for many years in complete darkness. This PokÃ©mon absorbs nutrients from the roots of trees. It stays motionless as it waits for evolution.
pokedexAS: Nincada lives underground. It uses its sharp claws to carve the roots of trees and absorb moisture and nutrients. This PokÃ©mon can't withstand bright sunlight so avoids it.

name: Ninjask
pokedexX: Its cry leaves a lasting headache if heard for too long. It moves so quickly that it is almost invisible.
pokedexY: Because it moves so quickly, it sometimes becomes  unseeable. It congregates around tree sap.
pokedexOR: Ninjask moves around at such a high speed that it cannot be seen, even while its crying can be clearly heard. For that reason, this PokÃ©mon was long believed to be invisible.
pokedexAS: If Ninjask is not trained properly, it will refuse to obey the Trainer and cry loudly continuously. Because of this quality, this PokÃ©mon is said to be one that puts the Trainer's abilities to the test.

name: Shedinja
pokedexX: A discarded bug shell that came to life. Peering into the crack on its back is said to steal one's spirit.
pokedexY: A most peculiar PokÃ©mon that somehow appears in a PokÃ© Ball when a Nincada evolves.
pokedexOR: Shedinja's hard body doesn't move-not even a twitch. In fact, its body appears to be merely a hollow shell. It is believed that this PokÃ©mon will steal the spirit of anyone peering into its hollow body from its back.
pokedexAS: Shedinja is a peculiar PokÃ©mon. It seems to appear unsought in a PokÃ© Ball after a Nincada evolves. This bizarre PokÃ©mon is entirely immobile-it doesn't even breathe.

name: Whismur
pokedexX: It usually murmurs but starts crying loudly if it senses danger. It stops when its ear covers are shut.
pokedexY: If it senses danger, it scares the foe by crying out with the volume of a jet-plane engine.
pokedexOR: Normally, Whismur's voice is very quiet-it is barely audible even if one is paying close attention. However, if this PokÃ©mon senses danger, it starts crying at an earsplitting volume.
pokedexAS: Whismur is very timid. If it starts to cry loudly, it becomes startled by its own crying and cries even harder. When it finally stops crying, the PokÃ©mon goes to sleep, all tired out.

name: Loudred
pokedexX: It shouts loudly by inhaling air, and then uses its well-developed stomach muscles to exhale.
pokedexY: The shock waves from its cries can tip over trucks. It stamps its feet to power up.
pokedexOR: Loudred's bellowing can completely decimate a wood-frame house. It uses its voice to punish its foes. This PokÃ©mon's round ears serve as loudspeakers.
pokedexAS: Loudred shouts while stamping its feet. After it finishes shouting, this PokÃ©mon becomes incapable of hearing anything for a while. This is considered to be a weak point.

name: Exploud
pokedexX: It howls can be heard over six miles away. It emits all sorts of noises from the ports on its body.
pokedexY: Its roar in battle shakes the ground like a tremor--or like an earthquake has struck.
pokedexOR: Exploud triggers earthquakes with the tremors it creates by bellowing. If this PokÃ©mon violently inhales from the ports on its body, it's a sign that it is preparing to let loose a huge bellow.
pokedexAS: Exploud communicates its feelings to the others by emitting whistle-like sounds from the tubes on its body. This PokÃ©mon only raises its voice when it is in battle.

name: Makuhita
pokedexX: It toughens up by slamming into thick trees over and over. It gains a sturdy body and dauntless spirit.
pokedexY: It grows stronger by enduring harsh training. It is a gutsy PokÃ©mon that can withstand any attack.
pokedexOR: Makuhita is tenacious-it will keep getting up and attacking its foe however many times it is knocked down. Every time it gets back up, this PokÃ©mon stores more energy in its body for evolving.
pokedexAS: Makuhita has a tireless spirit-it will never give up hope. It eats a lot of food, gets plenty of sleep, and it trains very rigorously. By living that way, this PokÃ©mon packs its body with energy.

name: Hariyama
pokedexX: It stomps on the ground to build power. It can send a 10-ton truck flying with a straight-arm punch.
pokedexY: It loves to match power with big-bodied PokÃ©mon. It can knock a truck flying with its arm thrusts.
pokedexOR: Hariyama practices its straight-arm slaps in any number of locations. One hit of this PokÃ©mon's powerful, openhanded, straight-arm punches could snap a telephone pole in two.
pokedexAS: Hariyama's thick body may appear fat, but it is actually a hunk of solid muscle. If this PokÃ©mon bears down and tightens all its muscles, its body becomes as hard as a rock.

name: Azurill
pokedexX: A PokÃ©mon that lives by water. It moves quickly on land by bouncing on its big tail.
pokedexY: It swings its large, nutrient-filled tail around to fight opponents bigger than itself.
pokedexOR: Azurill spins its tail as if it were a lasso, then hurls it far. The momentum of the throw sends its body flying, too. Using this unique action, one of these PokÃ©mon managed to hurl itself a record 33 feet.
pokedexAS: Azurill's tail is large and bouncy. It is packed full of the nutrients this PokÃ©mon needs to grow. Azurill can be seen bouncing and playing on its big, rubbery tail.

name: Nosepass
pokedexX: Its magnetic nose always faces north and draws iron objects to its body to protect itself better.
pokedexY: Its magnetic nose consistently faces north.  Travellers check Nosepass to get their bearings.
pokedexOR: Nosepass's magnetic nose is always pointed to the north. If two of these PokÃ©mon meet, they cannot turn their faces to each other when they are close because their magnetic noses repel one another.
pokedexAS: Nosepass had been said to be completely unmoving, with its magnetic nose pointed due north. However, close observation has revealed that the PokÃ©mon actually moves by a little over 3/8 of an inch every year.

name: Skitty
pokedexX: It can't stop itself from chasing moving things, and it runs in a circle, chasing its own tail.
pokedexY: It shows its cute side by chasing its own tail until it gets dizzy.
pokedexOR: Skitty has the habit of becoming fascinated by moving objects and chasing them around. This PokÃ©mon is known to chase after its own tail and become dizzy.
pokedexAS: Skitty is known to chase around playfully after its own tail. In the wild, this PokÃ©mon lives in holes in the trees of forests. It is very popular as a pet because of its adorable looks.

name: Delcatty
pokedexX: It dislikes dirty places. It often searches for a comfortable place in which to groom itself.
pokedexY: It is highly popular among female Trainers for its sublime fur. It does not keep a nest.
pokedexOR: Delcatty prefers to live an unfettered existence in which it can do as it pleases at its own pace. Because this PokÃ©mon eats and sleeps whenever it decides, its daily routines are completely random.
pokedexAS: Delcatty sleeps anywhere it wants without keeping a permanent nest. If other PokÃ©mon approach it as it sleeps, this PokÃ©mon will never fight-it will just move away somewhere else.

name: Sableye
pokedexX: It hides in the darkness of caves. Its diet of gems has transformed its eyes into gemstones.
pokedexY: It dwells in the darkness of caves. It uses its sharp claws to dig up gems to nourish itself.
pokedexOR: Sableye lead quiet lives deep inside caverns. They are feared, however, because these PokÃ©mon are thought to steal the spirits of people when their eyes burn with a sinister glow in the darkness.
pokedexAS: Sableye digs the ground with sharpened claws to find rocks that it eats. Substances in the eaten rocks crystallize and rise up to the PokÃ©mon's body surface.

name: Mawile
pokedexX: It uses its docile-looking face to lull foes into complacency, then bites with its huge, relentless jaws.
pokedexY: Attached to its head is a huge set of jaws formed by horns. It can chew through iron beams.
pokedexOR: Mawile's huge jaws are actually steel horns that have been transformed. Its docile-looking face serves to lull its foe into letting down its guard. When the foe least expects it, Mawile chomps it with its gaping jaws.
pokedexAS: Don't be taken in by this PokÃ©mon's cute face-it's very dangerous. Mawile fools the foe into letting down its guard, then chomps down with its massive jaws. The steel jaws are really horns that have been transformed.

name: Aron
pokedexX: It usually lives deep in mountains. However, hunger may drive it to eat railroad tracks and cars.
pokedexY: When it evolves, it sheds the steel carapace that  covered its whole body and develops a new one.
pokedexOR: This PokÃ©mon has a body of steel. To make its body, Aron feeds on iron ore that it digs from mountains. Occasionally, it causes major trouble by eating bridges and rails.
pokedexAS: Aron has a body of steel. With one all-out charge, this PokÃ©mon can demolish even a heavy dump truck. The destroyed dump truck then becomes a handy meal for the PokÃ©mon.

name: Lairon
pokedexX: It loves iron ore. Groups of them fight for territory by bashing one another with their steel bodies.
pokedexY: It habitually shows off its strength with the size of  sparks it creates by ramming its steel body  into boulders.
pokedexOR: Lairon tempers its steel body by drinking highly nutritious mineral springwater until it is bloated. This PokÃ©mon makes its nest close to springs of delicious water.
pokedexAS: Lairon feeds on iron contained in rocks and water. It makes its nest on mountains where iron ore is buried. As a result, the PokÃ©mon often clashes with humans mining the iron ore.

name: Aggron
pokedexX: It claims an entire mountain as its own. The more wounds it has, the more it has battled, so don't take it lightly.
pokedexY: While seeking iron for food, it digs tunnels by  breaking through bedrock with its steel horns.
pokedexOR: Aggron claims an entire mountain as its own territory. It mercilessly beats up anything that violates its environment. This PokÃ©mon vigilantly patrols its territory at all times.
pokedexAS: Aggron is protective of its environment. If its mountain is ravaged by a landslide or a fire, this PokÃ©mon will haul topsoil to the area, plant trees, and beautifully restore its own territory.

name: Meditite
pokedexX: It always trains deep in mountains. It levitates when it heightens its spiritual power through meditation.
pokedexY: It eats just one berry a day. By enduring hunger, its spirit is tempered and made sharper.
pokedexOR: Meditite undertakes rigorous mental training deep in the mountains. However, whenever it meditates, this PokÃ©mon always loses its concentration and focus. As a result, its training never ends.
pokedexAS: Meditite heightens its inner energy through meditation. It survives on just one berry a day. Minimal eating is another aspect of this PokÃ©mon's training.

name: Medicham
pokedexX: It elegantly avoids attacks with dance-like steps, then launches a devastating blow in the  same motion.
pokedexY: Through yoga training, it gained the psychic power to predict its foe's next move.
pokedexOR: It is said that through meditation, Medicham heightens energy inside its body and sharpens its sixth sense. This PokÃ©mon hides its presence by merging itself with fields and mountains.
pokedexAS: Through the power of meditation, Medicham developed its sixth sense. It gained the ability to use psychokinetic powers. This PokÃ©mon is known to meditate for a whole month without eating.

name: Electrike
pokedexX: Using electricity stored in its fur, it stimulates its muscles to heighten its reaction speed.
pokedexY: It stores static electricity in its fur for discharging. It gives off sparks if a storm approaches.
pokedexOR: Electrike stores electricity in its long body hair. This PokÃ©mon stimulates its leg muscles with electric charges. These jolts of power give its legs explosive acceleration performance.
pokedexAS: Electrike runs faster than the human eye can follow. The friction from running is converted into electricity, which is then stored in this PokÃ©mon's fur.

name: Manectric
pokedexX: It rarely appears before people. It is said to nest where lightning has fallen.
pokedexY: It discharges electricity from its mane. It creates a thundercloud overhead to drop lightning bolts.
pokedexOR: Manectric is constantly discharging electricity from its mane. The sparks sometimes ignite forest fires. When it enters a battle, this PokÃ©mon creates thunderclouds.
pokedexAS: Manectric discharges strong electricity from its mane. The mane is used for collecting electricity in the atmosphere. This PokÃ©mon creates thunderclouds above its head.

name: Plusle
pokedexX: It cheers on friends with pom-poms made of sparks. It drains power from telephone poles.
pokedexY: It absorbs electricity from telephone poles. It shorts  out its body to create crackling noises.
pokedexOR: Plusle always acts as a cheerleader for its partners. Whenever a teammate puts out a good effort in battle, this PokÃ©mon shorts out its body to create the crackling noises of sparks to show its joy.
pokedexAS: When Plusle is cheering on its partner, it flashes with electric sparks from all over its body. If its partner loses, this PokÃ©mon cries loudly.

name: Minun
pokedexX: Exposure to electricity from Minun and Plusle promotes blood circulation and relaxes muscles.
pokedexY: It cheers on friends. If its friends are losing, its body lets off more and more sparks.
pokedexOR: Minun is more concerned about cheering on its partners than its own safety. It shorts out the electricity in its body to create brilliant showers of sparks to cheer on its teammates.
pokedexAS: Minun loves to cheer on its partner in battle. It gives off sparks from its body while it is doing so. If its partner is in trouble, this PokÃ©mon gives off increasing amounts of sparks.

name: Volbeat
pokedexX: It communicates with others by lighting up its rear at night. It loves Illumise's sweet aroma.
pokedexY: It lives around clean ponds. At night, its rear lights up. It converses with others by flashing its light.
pokedexOR: With the arrival of night, Volbeat emits light from its tail. It communicates with others by adjusting the intensity and flashing of its light. This PokÃ©mon is attracted by the sweet aroma of Illumise.
pokedexAS: Volbeat's tail glows like a lightbulb. With other Volbeat, it uses its tail to draw geometric shapes in the night sky. This PokÃ©mon loves the sweet aroma given off by Illumise.

name: Illumise
pokedexX: Its fragrance attracts a swarm of Volbeat, so they draw over 200 patterns in the night sky.
pokedexY: With its sweet aroma, it guides Volbeat to draw signs with light in the night sky.
pokedexOR: Illumise attracts a swarm of Volbeat using a sweet fragrance. Once the Volbeat have gathered, this PokÃ©mon leads the lit-up swarm in drawing geometric designs on the canvas of the night sky.
pokedexAS: Illumise leads a flight of illuminated Volbeat to draw signs in the night sky. This PokÃ©mon is said to earn greater respect from its peers by composing more complex designs in the sky.

name: Roselia
pokedexX: It uses the different poisons in each hand separately when it attacks. The stronger its aroma, the healthier it is.
pokedexY: Roselia that drink nutritionally rich springwater are said to reveal rare coloration when they bloom.
pokedexOR: Roselia shoots sharp thorns as projectiles at any opponent that tries to steal the flowers on its arms. The aroma of this PokÃ©mon brings serenity to living things.
pokedexAS: On extremely rare occasions, a Roselia is said to appear with its flowers in unusual colors. The thorns on this PokÃ©mon's head contain a vicious poison.

name: Gulpin
pokedexX: It has a small heart and brain. Its stomach comprises most of its body, with enzymes to dissolve anything.
pokedexY: There is nothing its stomach can't digest. While it is digesting, vile, overpowering gases are expelled.
pokedexOR: Virtually all of Gulpin's body is its stomach. As a result, it can swallow something its own size. This PokÃ©mon's stomach contains a special fluid that digests anything.
pokedexAS: Most of Gulpin's body is made up of its stomach-its heart and brain are very small in comparison. This PokÃ©mon's stomach contains special enzymes that dissolve anything.

name: Swalot
pokedexX: It swallows anything whole. It sweats toxic fluids from its follicles to douse foes.
pokedexY: It gulps anything that fits in its mouth. Its special enzymes can dissolve anything.
pokedexOR: When Swalot spots prey, it spurts out a hideously toxic fluid from its pores and sprays the target. Once the prey has weakened, this PokÃ©mon gulps it down whole with its cavernous mouth.
pokedexAS: Swalot has no teeth, so what it eats, it swallows whole, no matter what. Its cavernous mouth yawns widely. An automobile tire could easily fit inside this PokÃ©mon's mouth.

name: Carvanha
pokedexX: They form packs to attack boats and rip out their hulls to sink them. They live in rivers in the jungle.
pokedexY: It lives in massive rivers that course through jungles. It swarms prey that enter its territory.
pokedexOR: Carvanha's strongly developed jaws and its sharply pointed fangs pack the destructive power to rip out boat hulls. Many boats have been attacked and sunk by this PokÃ©mon.
pokedexAS: If anything invades Carvanha's territory, it will swarm and tear at the intruder with its pointed fangs. On its own, however, this PokÃ©mon turns suddenly timid.

name: Sharpedo
pokedexX: Its fangs rip through sheet iron. It swims at 75 mph and is known as "The Bully of the Sea."
pokedexY: It can swim at speeds of 75 mph by jetting seawater through its body. It is the bandit of the sea.
pokedexOR: Nicknamed "the bully of the sea," Sharpedo is widely feared. Its cruel fangs grow back immediately if they snap off. Just one of these PokÃ©mon can thoroughly tear apart a supertanker.
pokedexAS: Sharpedo can swim at speeds of up to 75 mph by jetting seawater out of its backside. This PokÃ©mon's drawback is its inability to swim long distances.

name: Wailmer
pokedexX: It bounces playfully like a ball. The more seawater it swallows, the higher it bounces.
pokedexY: It eats one ton of food every day. It plays by shooting stored seawater out its blowholes with great force.
pokedexOR: Wailmer's nostrils are located above its eyes. This playful PokÃ©mon loves to startle people by forcefully snorting out seawater it stores inside its body out of its nostrils.
pokedexAS: Wailmer can store water inside its body to transform itself into a ball for bouncing around on the ground. By filling itself up with more water, this PokÃ©mon can elevate the height of its bounces.

name: Wailord
pokedexX: It can sometimes knock out opponents with the shock created by breaching and crashing its big body onto the water.
pokedexY: The biggest of all PokÃ©mon. It can dive to a depth of almost 10,000 feet on only one breath.
pokedexOR: Wailord is the largest of all identified PokÃ©mon up to now. This giant PokÃ©mon swims languorously in the vast open sea, eating massive amounts of food at once with its enormous mouth.
pokedexAS: When chasing prey, Wailord herds them by leaping out of the water and making a humongous splash. It is breathtaking to see this PokÃ©mon leaping out of the sea with others in its pod.

name: Numel
pokedexX: Its humped back stores intensely hot magma. In rain, the magma cools, slowing its movement.
pokedexY: The magma in its body reaches 2,200 degrees Fahrenheit. Its hump gets smaller when it uses Fire-type moves.
pokedexOR: Numel is extremely dull witted-it doesn't notice being hit. However, it can't stand hunger for even a second. This PokÃ©mon's body is a seething cauldron of boiling magma.
pokedexAS: Numel stores magma of almost 2,200 degrees Fahrenheit within its body. If it gets wet, the magma cools and hardens. In that event, the PokÃ©mon's body grows heavy and its movements become sluggish.

name: Camerupt
pokedexX: The volcanoes on its back have a major eruption every 10 years--or whenever it becomes really angry.
pokedexY: If angered, the humps on its back erupt in a shower of molten lava. It lives in the craters of volcanoes.
pokedexOR: Camerupt has a volcano inside its body. Magma of 18,000 degrees Fahrenheit courses through its body. Occasionally, the humps on this PokÃ©mon's back erupt, spewing the superheated magma.
pokedexAS: The humps on Camerupt's back are formed by a transformation of its bones. They sometimes blast out molten magma. This PokÃ©mon apparently erupts often when it is enraged.

name: Torkoal
pokedexX: You find abandoned coal mines full of them. They dig tirelessly in search of coal.
pokedexY: It burns coal inside its shell for energy. It blows out black soot if it is endangered.
pokedexOR: Torkoal digs through mountains in search of coal. If it finds some, it fills hollow spaces on its shell with the coal and burns it. If it is attacked, this PokÃ©mon spouts thick black smoke to beat a retreat.
pokedexAS: Torkoal generates energy by burning coal. It grows weaker as the fire dies down. When it is preparing for battle, this PokÃ©mon burns more coal.

name: Spoink
pokedexX: It bounces constantly, using its tail like a spring. The shock of bouncing keeps its heart beating.
pokedexY: It bounces around on its tail to keep its heart pumping. It carries a pearl from Clamperl on its head.
pokedexOR: Spoink bounces around on its tail. The shock of its bouncing makes its heart pump. As a result, this PokÃ©mon cannot afford to stop bouncing-if it stops, its heart will stop.
pokedexAS: Spoink keeps a pearl on top of its head. The pearl functions to amplify this PokÃ©mon's psychokinetic powers. It is therefore on a constant search for a bigger pearl.

name: Grumpig
pokedexX: It uses black pearls to amplify its psychic power. It does a strange dance to control foes' minds.
pokedexY: It uses black pearls to amplify its psychic power. It does an odd dance to gain control over foes.
pokedexOR: Grumpig uses the black pearls on its body to amplify its psychic power waves for gaining total control over its foe. When this PokÃ©mon uses its special power, its snorting breath grows labored.
pokedexAS: Grumpig uses the black pearls on its body to wield its fantastic powers. When it is doing so, it dances bizarrely. This PokÃ©mon's black pearls are valuable as works of art.

name: Spinda
pokedexX: No two Spinda have the same pattern of spots. Its tottering step fouls the aim of foes.
pokedexY: The chances of two Spinda having identical spot  patterns is less than one in four billion.
pokedexOR: All the Spinda that exist in the world are said to have utterly unique spot patterns. The shaky, tottering steps of this PokÃ©mon give it the appearance of dancing.
pokedexAS: No two Spinda are said to have identical spot patterns on their hides. This PokÃ©mon moves in a curious manner as if it is stumbling in dizziness. Its lurching movements can cause the opponent to become confused.

name: Trapinch
pokedexX: It lives in arid deserts. It makes a sloping pit trap in sand where it patiently awaits prey.
pokedexY: It makes an inescapable conical pit and lies in wait at the bottom for prey to come tumbling down.
pokedexOR: Trapinch's nest is a sloped, bowl-like pit dug in sand. This PokÃ©mon patiently waits for prey to tumble down the pit. Its giant jaws have enough strength to crush even boulders.
pokedexAS: Trapinch is a patient hunter. It digs an inescapable pit in a desert and waits for its prey to come tumbling down. This PokÃ©mon can go a whole week without access to any water.

name: Vibrava
pokedexX: The ultrasonic waves it generates by rubbing its two wings together cause severe headaches.
pokedexY: It generates ultrasonic waves by violently flapping  its wings. After making its prey faint, it melts the  prey with acid.
pokedexOR: To make prey faint, Vibrava generates ultrasonic waves by vigorously making its two wings vibrate. This PokÃ©mon's ultrasonic waves are so powerful, they can bring on headaches in people.
pokedexAS: Vibrava's wings have not yet completed the process of growing. Rather than flying long distances, they are more useful for generating ultrasonic waves by vibrating.

name: Flygon
pokedexX: It hides itself by kicking up desert sand with its wings. Red covers shield its eyes from sand.
pokedexY: Known as "The Desert Spirit," this PokÃ©mon hides in  the sandstorms it causes by beating its wings.
pokedexOR: Flygon is nicknamed "the elemental spirit of the desert." Because its flapping wings whip up a cloud of sand, this PokÃ©mon is always enveloped in a sandstorm while flying.
pokedexAS: Flygon whips up a sandstorm by flapping its wings. The wings create a series of notes that sound like singing. Because the "singing" is the only thing that can be heard in a sandstorm, this PokÃ©mon is said to be the desert spirit.

name: Cacnea
pokedexX: It lives in arid locations. Its yellow flowers bloom once a year.
pokedexY: It prefers harsh environments such as deserts. It can survive for 30 days on water stored in its body.
pokedexOR: Cacnea lives in arid locations such as deserts. It releases a strong aroma from its flower to attract prey. When prey comes near, this PokÃ©mon shoots sharp thorns from its body to bring the victim down.
pokedexAS: The more arid and harsh the environment, the more pretty and fragrant a flower Cacnea grows. This PokÃ©mon battles by wildly swinging its thorny arms.

name: Cacturne
pokedexX: It becomes active at night, seeking prey that is exhausted from the day's desert heat.
pokedexY: Packs of them follow travellers through the desert until the travellers can no longer move.
pokedexOR: During the daytime, Cacturne remains unmoving so that it does not lose any moisture to the harsh desert sun. This PokÃ©mon becomes active at night when the temperature drops.
pokedexAS: If a traveler is going through a desert in the thick of night, Cacturne will follow in a ragtag group. The PokÃ©mon are biding their time, waiting for the traveler to tire and become incapable of moving.

name: Swablu
pokedexX: For some reason, it likes to land on people's heads softly and act like it's a hat.
pokedexY: It constantly grooms its cotton-like wings. It takes  a shower to clean itself if it becomes dirty.
pokedexOR: Swablu has light and fluffy wings that are like cottony clouds. This PokÃ©mon is not frightened of people. It lands on the heads of people and sits there like a cotton-fluff hat.
pokedexAS: Swablu loves to make things clean. If it spots something dirty, it will wipe and polish it with its cottony wings. If its wings become dirty, this PokÃ©mon finds a stream and showers itself.

name: Altaria
pokedexX: It flies gracefully through the sky. Its melodic humming makes you feel like you're in a dream.
pokedexY: On sunny days, it flies freely through the sky and  blends into the clouds. It sings in a  beautiful soprano.
pokedexOR: Altaria dances and wheels through the sky among billowing, cotton-like clouds. By singing melodies in its crystal-clear voice, this PokÃ©mon makes its listeners experience dreamy wonderment.
pokedexAS: Altaria sings in a gorgeous soprano. Its wings are like cotton clouds. This PokÃ©mon catches updrafts with its buoyant wings and soars way up into the wild blue yonder.

name: Zangoose
pokedexX: It has feuded with Seviper for many generations. Its sharp claws are its biggest weapons.
pokedexY: Its fur would all stand on end if it smelled a Seviper nearby. Its sharp claws tear up its foes.
pokedexOR: Memories of battling its archrival Seviper are etched into every cell of Zangoose's body. This PokÃ©mon adroitly dodges attacks with incredible agility.
pokedexAS: Zangoose usually stays on all fours, but when angered, it gets up on its hind legs and extends its claws. This PokÃ©mon shares a bitter rivalry with Seviper that dates back over generations.

name: Seviper
pokedexX: In battle, it uses its bladed tail to counter any  Zangoose. It secretes a deadly venom in its tail.
pokedexY: Constant polishing makes the edge of the blade on its tail extremely sharp. It's Zangoose's archrival.
pokedexOR: Seviper shares a generations-long feud with Zangoose. The scars on its body are evidence of vicious battles. This PokÃ©mon attacks using its sword-edged tail.
pokedexAS: Seviper's swordlike tail serves two purposes-it slashes foes and douses them with secreted poison. This PokÃ©mon will not give up its long-running blood feud with Zangoose.

name: Lunatone
pokedexX: Because it turns active on nights of the full moon, it is said to have some link to the lunar phases.
pokedexY: It was discovered at the site of a meteor strike 40 years ago. Its stare can lull its foes to sleep.
pokedexOR: Lunatone was discovered at a location where a meteoroid fell. As a result, some people theorize that this PokÃ©mon came from space. However, no one has been able to prove this theory so far.
pokedexAS: Lunatone becomes active around the time of the full moon. Instead of walking, it moves by floating in midair. The PokÃ©mon's intimidating red eyes cause all those who see it to become transfixed with fear.

name: Solrock
pokedexX: Solar energy is the source of its power,  so it is strong during the daytime.  When it spins, its body shines.
pokedexY: It absorbs solar energy during the day. Always expressionless, it can sense what its foe is thinking.
pokedexOR: Solrock is a new species of PokÃ©mon that is said to have fallen from space. It floats in air and moves silently. In battle, this PokÃ©mon releases intensely bright light.
pokedexAS: Sunlight is the source of Solrock's power. It is said to possess the ability to read the emotions of others. This PokÃ©mon gives off intense heat while rotating its body.

name: Barboach
pokedexX: It coats its entire body with a slimy fluid so it can squirm and slip away if grabbed.
pokedexY: Its whiskers make a superb radar. They are used to  locate prey, even in the murkiest of water.
pokedexOR: Barboach's sensitive whiskers serve as a superb radar system. This PokÃ©mon hides in mud, leaving only its two whiskers exposed while it waits for prey to come along.
pokedexAS: Barboach's body is covered with a slimy film. If a foe grabs it, this PokÃ©mon just slips out of the enemy's grip. This PokÃ©mon grows weak if the slimy coating dries up.

name: Whiscash
pokedexX: It claims a large swamp to itself. If a foe comes near it, it sets off tremors by thrashing around.
pokedexY: It makes its nest at the bottom of swamps.  It will eat anything--if it is alive, Whiscash will eat it.
pokedexOR: Whiscash is extremely territorial. Just one of these PokÃ©mon will claim a large pond as its exclusive territory. If a foe approaches it, it thrashes about and triggers a massive earthquake.
pokedexAS: If Whiscash goes on a wild rampage, it sets off a quake-like tremor with a radius of over three miles. This PokÃ©mon has the ability to predict real earthquakes.

name: Corphish
pokedexX: No matter how dirty the water in the river, it will adapt and thrive. It has a strong will to survive.
pokedexY: Its hardy vitality enables it to adapt to any environment. Its pincers will never release prey.
pokedexOR: Corphish were originally foreign PokÃ©mon that were imported as pets. They eventually turned up in the wild. This PokÃ©mon is very hardy and has greatly increased its population.
pokedexAS: Corphish catches prey with its sharp claws. It has no likes or dislikes when it comes to food-it will eat anything. This PokÃ©mon has no trouble living in filthy water.

name: Crawdaunt
pokedexX: It is a ruffian that uses its pincers to pick up and toss out other PokÃ©mon from its pond.
pokedexY: Loving to battle, this PokÃ©mon pinches all PokÃ©mon that enter its territory with its pincers and throws them out.
pokedexOR: Crawdaunt has an extremely violent nature that compels it to challenge other living things to battle. Other life-forms refuse to live in ponds inhabited by this PokÃ©mon, making them desolate places.
pokedexAS: Crawdaunt molts (sheds) its shell regularly. Immediately after molting, its shell is soft and tender. Until the shell hardens, this PokÃ©mon hides in its streambed burrow to avoid attack from its foes.

name: Baltoy
pokedexX: It moves while spinning around on its single foot. Some Baltoy have been seen spinning on their heads.
pokedexY: It moves while spinning around on its single foot. Some BALTOY have been seen spinning on their heads.
pokedexOR: Baltoy moves while spinning around on its one foot. Primitive wall paintings depicting this PokÃ©mon living among people were discovered in some ancient ruins.
pokedexAS: As soon as it spots others of its kind, Baltoy congregates with them and then begins crying noisily in unison. This PokÃ©mon sleeps while cleverly balancing itself on its one foot.

name: Claydol
pokedexX: An ancient clay figurine that came to life as a PokÃ©mon from exposure to a mysterious ray of light.
pokedexY: It is said that it originates from clay dolls made by an ancient civilization.
pokedexOR: Claydol are said to be dolls of mud made by primitive humans and brought to life by exposure to a mysterious ray. This PokÃ©mon moves about while levitating.
pokedexAS: Claydol is an enigma that appeared from a clay statue made by an ancient civilization dating back 20,000 years. This PokÃ©mon shoots beams from both its hands.

name: Lileep
pokedexX: It disguises its tentacles as flowers to attract and catch prey. It became extinct in ancient times.
pokedexY: It lived on the seafloor 100 million years ago and was reanimated scientifically.
pokedexOR: Lileep became extinct approximately a hundred million years ago. This ancient PokÃ©mon attaches itself to a rock on the seafloor and catches approaching prey using tentacles shaped like flower petals.
pokedexAS: Lileep is an ancient PokÃ©mon that was regenerated from a fossil. It remains permanently anchored to a rock. From its immobile perch, this PokÃ©mon intently scans for prey with its two eyes.

name: Cradily
pokedexX: It lives in the shallows of warm seas. When the tide goes out, it digs up prey from beaches.
pokedexY: It ensnares prey with its eight tentacles. It then melts the prey with a strong acid before feeding.
pokedexOR: Cradily roams around the ocean floor in search of food. This PokÃ©mon freely extends its tree trunk-like neck and captures unwary prey using its eight tentacles.
pokedexAS: Cradily's body serves as an anchor, preventing it from being washed away in rough seas. This PokÃ©mon secretes a strong digestive fluid from its tentacles.

name: Anorith
pokedexX: It is a kind of PokÃ©mon progenitor. It uses its extending claws to catch prey hiding among rocks on the seafloor.
pokedexY: A PokÃ©mon ancestor that was reanimated from a fossil. It lived in the sea and hunted with claws.
pokedexOR: Anorith was regenerated from a prehistoric fossil. This primitive PokÃ©mon once lived in warm seas. It grips its prey firmly between its two large claws.
pokedexAS: Anorith is said to be a type of PokÃ©mon predecessor, with eight wings at the sides of its body. This PokÃ©mon swam in the primordial sea by undulating these eight wings.

name: Armaldo
pokedexX: Its enormous, retractable claws can cut through most anything. Its entire body is clad in sturdy plates.
pokedexY: Protected by a hard shell, its body is very sturdy. It skewers prey with its claws to feed.
pokedexOR: Armaldo's tough armor makes all attacks bounce off. This PokÃ©mon's two enormous claws can be freely extended or contracted. They have the power to punch right through a steel slab.
pokedexAS: Armaldo is a PokÃ©mon species that became extinct in prehistoric times. This PokÃ©mon is said to have walked on its hind legs, which would have been more convenient for life on land.

name: Feebas
pokedexX: It eats anything, so it can even live in polluted streams and lakes. No one pays any attention to it.
pokedexY: It is the shabbiest PokÃ©mon of all. It forms in schools and lives at the bottom of rivers.
pokedexOR: Feebas's fins are ragged and tattered from the start of its life. Because of its shoddy appearance, this PokÃ©mon is largely ignored. It is capable of living in both the sea and in rivers.
pokedexAS: While Feebas's body is in tatters, it has a hardy and tenacious life force that enables it to live anywhere. However, this PokÃ©mon is also slow and dimwitted, making it an easy catch.

name: Milotic
pokedexX: Milotic is breathtakingly beautiful. Those that see it are said to forget their combative spirits.
pokedexY: It is the world's most beautiful PokÃ©mon. There are many works of art featuring Milotic.
pokedexOR: Milotic is said to be the most beautiful of all the PokÃ©mon. It has the power to becalm such emotions as anger and hostility to quell bitter feuding.
pokedexAS: Milotic live at the bottom of large lakes. When this PokÃ©mon's body glows a vivid pink, it releases a pulsing wave of energy that brings soothing calm to troubled hearts.

name: Castform
pokedexX: This PokÃ©mon can change its cells, taking different forms based on the temperature and humidity.
pokedexY: It has the ability to change its form into the sun, the rain, or a snow cloud, depending on the weather.
pokedexOR: Castform's appearance changes with the weather. This PokÃ©mon gained the ability to use the vast power of nature to protect its tiny body.
pokedexAS: Castform borrows the power of nature to transform itself into the guises of the sun, rain, and snow-clouds. This PokÃ©mon's feelings change with the weather.

name: Kecleon
pokedexX: It can freely change its body's color. The zigzag pattern on its belly doesn't change, however.
pokedexY: It changes its shading to match its surroundings so it can sneak up on prey. Only its belly patterns stay fixed.
pokedexOR: Kecleon is capable of changing its body colors at will to blend in with its surroundings. There is one exception-this PokÃ©mon can't change the zigzag pattern on its belly.
pokedexAS: Kecleon alters its body coloration to blend in with its surroundings, allowing it to sneak up on its prey unnoticed. Then it lashes out with its long, stretchy tongue to instantly ensnare the unsuspecting target.

name: Shuppet
pokedexX: It uses its horn to feed on envy and malice-- or so it's said. It's very active at night.
pokedexY: It loves vengeful emotions and hangs in rows under the eaves of houses where vengeful people live.
pokedexOR: Shuppet is attracted by feelings of jealousy and vindictiveness. If someone develops strong feelings of vengeance, this PokÃ©mon will appear in a swarm and line up beneath the eaves of that person's home.
pokedexAS: Shuppet grows by feeding on dark emotions, such as vengefulness and envy, in the hearts of people. It roams through cities in search of grudges that taint people.

name: Banette
pokedexX: A doll that became a PokÃ©mon over its grudge from being junked. It seeks the child that disowned it.
pokedexY: Strong feelings of hatred turned a puppet into a PokÃ©mon. If it opens its mouth, its cursed energy escapes.
pokedexOR: Banette generates energy for laying strong curses by sticking pins into its own body. This PokÃ©mon was originally a pitiful plush doll that was thrown away.
pokedexAS: A cursed energy permeated the stuffing of a discarded and forgotten plush doll, giving it new life as Banette. The PokÃ©mon's energy would escape if it were to ever open its mouth.

name: Duskull
pokedexX: It doggedly pursues its prey wherever it goes. However, the chase is abandoned at sunrise.
pokedexY: If it finds bad children who won't listen to their parents, it will spirit them away--or so it's said.
pokedexOR: Duskull can pass through any wall no matter how thick it may be. Once this PokÃ©mon chooses a target, it will doggedly pursue the intended victim until the break of dawn.
pokedexAS: Duskull wanders lost among the deep darkness of midnight. There is an oft-told admonishment given to misbehaving children that this PokÃ©mon will spirit away bad children who earn scoldings from their mothers.

name: Dusclops
pokedexX: Anyone who dares peer into its body to see its spectral ball of fire will have their spirit stolen away.
pokedexY: Its body is hollow. It is said that those who look into its body are sucked into the void.
pokedexOR: Dusclops's body is completely hollow-there is nothing at all inside. It is said that its body is like a black hole. This PokÃ©mon will absorb anything into its body, but nothing will ever come back out.
pokedexAS: Dusclops absorbs anything, however large the object may be. This PokÃ©mon hypnotizes its foe by waving its hands in a macabre manner and by bringing its single eye to bear. The hypnotized foe is made to do Dusclops's bidding.

name: Tropius
pokedexX: It flies by flapping its broad leaves and gives the sweet, delicious fruit around its neck to children.
pokedexY: The bunch of fruit around its neck ripens twice a year and is delicious. It's a highly favored tropical snack.
pokedexOR: The bunches of fruit around Tropius's neck are very popular with children. This PokÃ©mon loves fruit, and eats it continuously. Apparently, its love for fruit resulted in its own outgrowth of fruit.
pokedexAS: Children of the southern tropics eat as snacks the fruit that grows in bunches around the neck of Tropius. This PokÃ©mon flies by flapping the leaves on its back as if they were wings.

name: Chimecho
pokedexX: It uses the sucker on its head to hang from a tree or from eaves. It can produce seven different tones.
pokedexY: Emitting ultrasonic cries, it floats on winds to travel great distances.
pokedexOR: Chimecho makes its cries echo inside its hollow body. When this PokÃ©mon becomes enraged, its cries result in ultrasonic waves that have the power to knock foes flying.
pokedexAS: In high winds, Chimecho cries as it hangs from a tree branch or the eaves of a building using a suction cup on its head. This PokÃ©mon plucks berries with its long tail and eats them.

name: Absol
pokedexX: It senses coming disasters and appears before people only to warn them of impending danger.
pokedexY: It appears when it senses an impending natural disaster. As a result, it was mistaken as a doom bringer.
pokedexOR: Every time Absol appears before people, it is followed by a disaster such as an earthquake or a tidal wave. As a result, it came to be known as the disaster PokÃ©mon.
pokedexAS: Absol has the ability to foretell the coming of natural disasters. It lives in a harsh, rugged mountain environment. This PokÃ©mon very rarely ventures down from the mountains.

name: Wynaut
pokedexX: It tends to move in a pack with others. They cluster in a tight group to sleep in a cave.
pokedexY: It grows strong by pushing up against others en masse. It loves eating sweet fruit.
pokedexOR: Wynaut can always be seen with a big, happy smile on its face. Look at its tail to determine if it is angry. When angered, this PokÃ©mon will be slapping the ground with its tail.
pokedexAS: Wynaut gather on moonlit nights to play by squeezing up against each other. By being squeezed, this PokÃ©mon gains endurance and is trained to dole out powerful counterattacks.

name: Snorunt
pokedexX: It is said that several Snorunt gather under giant leaves and live together in harmony.
pokedexY: In the snow country, certain folklore says a house will prosper if a Snorunt lives there.
pokedexOR: Snorunt live in regions with heavy snowfall. In seasons without snow, such as spring and summer, this PokÃ©mon steals away to live quietly among stalactites and stalagmites deep in caverns.
pokedexAS: Snorunt survives by eating only snow and ice. Old folklore claims that a house visited by this PokÃ©mon is sure to prosper for many generations to come.

name: Glalie
pokedexX: To protect itself, it clad its body in an armor of ice, made by freezing moisture in the air.
pokedexY: It can instantly freeze moisture in the atmosphere. It uses this power to freeze its foes.
pokedexOR: Glalie has a body made of rock, which it hardens with an armor of ice. This PokÃ©mon has the ability to freeze moisture in the atmosphere into any shape it desires.
pokedexAS: Glalie has the ability to freely control ice. For example, it can instantly freeze its prey solid. After immobilizing its prey in ice, this PokÃ©mon enjoys eating it in leisurely fashion.

name: Spheal
pokedexX: They can't swim well yet, and they move much faster by rolling. When they're happy, they clap fins.
pokedexY: Its body is covered in fluffy fur. The fur keeps it from feeling cold while it is rolling on ice.
pokedexOR: Spheal is much faster rolling than walking to get around. When groups of this PokÃ©mon eat, they all clap at once to show their pleasure. Because of this, their mealtimes are noisy.
pokedexAS: Spheal always travels by rolling around on its ball-like body. When the season for ice floes arrives, this PokÃ©mon can be seen rolling about on ice and crossing the sea.

name: Sealeo
pokedexX: It has a very sensitive nose. It touches new things with its nose to examine them.
pokedexY: Be it Spheal or PokÃ© Ball, it will spin any round object on its nose with the greatest of ease.
pokedexOR: Sealeo has the habit of always juggling on the tip of its nose anything it sees for the first time. This PokÃ©mon occasionally entertains itself by balancing and rolling a Spheal on its nose.
pokedexAS: Sealeo often balances and rolls things on the tip of its nose. While the PokÃ©mon is rolling something, it checks the object's aroma and texture to determine whether it likes the object or not.

name: Walrein
pokedexX: It shatters ice with its big tusks. Its thick blubber repels not only the cold, but also enemy attacks.
pokedexY: It shatters drift ice with its strong tusks. Its thick layer of blubber repels enemy attacks.
pokedexOR: Walrein's two massively developed tusks can totally shatter blocks of ice weighing 10 tons with one blow. This PokÃ©mon's thick coat of blubber insulates it from subzero temperatures.
pokedexAS: Walrein swims all over in frigid seawater while crushing icebergs with its grand, imposing tusks. Its thick layer of blubber makes enemy attacks bounce off harmlessly.

name: Clamperl
pokedexX: When it evolves, it makes a mysterious pearl that amplifies psychic powers when it's held.
pokedexY: It is protected by a sturdy shell. Once in a lifetime, it makes a magnificent pearl.
pokedexOR: Clamperl's sturdy shell is not only good for protection-it is also used for clamping and catching prey. A fully grown Clamperl's shell will be scored with nicks and scratches all over.
pokedexAS: Clamperl grows while being protected by its rock-hard shell. When its body becomes too large to fit inside the shell, it is sure evidence that this PokÃ©mon is getting close to evolution.

name: Huntail
pokedexX: It lives deep in the sea where no light ever filters down. It lights up its small fishlike tail to attract prey.
pokedexY: It lives deep in the sea. With a tail shaped like a small fish, it attracts unsuspecting prey.
pokedexOR: Huntail's presence went unnoticed by people for a long time because it lives at extreme depths in the sea. This PokÃ©mon's eyes can see clearly even in the murky dark depths of the ocean.
pokedexAS: Huntail's tail is shaped like a fish. It uses the tail to attract prey, then swallows the prey whole with its large, gaping mouth. This PokÃ©mon swims by wiggling its slender body like a snake.

name: Gorebyss
pokedexX: It lives at the bottom of the sea. In the springtime, its pink body turns more vivid for some reason.
pokedexY: Its swimming form is exquisitely elegant. With its thin mouth, it feeds on seaweed that grows between rocks.
pokedexOR: Gorebyss lives in the southern seas at extreme depths. Its body is built to withstand the enormous pressure of water at incredible depths. Because of this, this PokÃ©mon's body is unharmed by ordinary attacks.
pokedexAS: Although Gorebyss is the very picture of elegance and beauty while swimming, it is also cruel. When it spots prey, this PokÃ©mon inserts its thin mouth into the prey's body and drains the prey of its body fluids.

name: Relicanth
pokedexX: It has remained unchanged for 100 million years. It was discovered during a deep-sea exploration.
pokedexY: A rare PokÃ©mon discovered during a deep-sea  exploration. It has not changed in over  100 million years.
pokedexOR: Relicanth is a PokÃ©mon species that existed for a hundred million years without ever changing its form. This ancient PokÃ©mon feeds on microscopic organisms with its toothless mouth.
pokedexAS: Relicanth is a rare species that was discovered in deep-sea explorations. This PokÃ©mon's body withstands the enormous water pressure of the ocean depths. Its body is covered in tough scales that are like craggy rocks.

name: Luvdisc
pokedexX: It lives in warm seas. It is said that a couple finding this PokÃ©mon will be blessed with eternal love.
pokedexY: During the spawning season, countless Luvdisc congregate at coral reefs, turning the waters pink.
pokedexOR: Luvdisc live in shallow seas in the tropics. This heart-shaped PokÃ©mon earned its name by swimming after loving couples it spotted in the ocean's waves.
pokedexAS: Luvdisc's heart-shaped body is a symbol of love and romance. It is said that any couple meeting this PokÃ©mon is promised a loving relationship that never ends.

name: Bagon
pokedexX: Its well-developed neck muscles and iron-like head can smash boulders into pieces.
pokedexY: Dreaming of one day flying, it practices by leaping off cliffs every day.
pokedexOR: Bagon has a dream of one day soaring in the sky. In doomed efforts to fly, this PokÃ©mon hurls itself off cliffs. As a result of its dives, its head has grown tough and as hard as tempered steel.
pokedexAS: Bagon harbors a never-ending dream of one day soaring high among the clouds. As if trying to dispel its frustration over its inability to fly, this PokÃ©mon slams its hard head against huge rocks and shatters them into pebbles.

name: Shelgon
pokedexX: Within its rugged shell, its cells have begun changing. The shell peels off the instant it evolves.
pokedexY: Its armored body makes all attacks bounce off. The armor is too tough, however, making it heavy and somewhat sluggish.
pokedexOR: Inside Shelgon's armor-like shell, cells are in the midst of transformation to create an entirely new body. This PokÃ©mon's shell is extremely heavy, making its movements sluggish.
pokedexAS: Covering Shelgon's body are outgrowths much like bones. The shell is very hard and bounces off enemy attacks. When awaiting evolution, this PokÃ©mon hides away in a cavern.

name: Salamence
pokedexX: It becomes uncontrollable if it is enraged. It destroys everything with shredding claws and fire.
pokedexY: It's uncontrollable if enraged. It flies around spouting flames and scorching fields and mountains.
pokedexOR: Salamence came about as a result of a strong, long-held dream of growing wings. It is said that this powerful desire triggered a sudden mutation in this PokÃ©mon's cells, causing it to sprout its magnificent wings.
pokedexAS: By evolving into Salamence, this PokÃ©mon finally realizes its long-held dream of growing wings. To express its joy, it flies and wheels all over the sky while spouting flames from its mouth.

name: Beldum
pokedexX: The magnetic force generated by its body repels the ground's natural magnetism, letting it float.
pokedexY: It converses with others by using magnetic pulses. In a swarm, they move in perfect unison.
pokedexOR: Instead of blood, a powerful magnetic force courses throughout Beldum's body. This PokÃ©mon communicates with others by sending controlled pulses of magnetism.
pokedexAS: Beldum keeps itself floating by generating a magnetic force that repels earth's natural magnetism. When it sleeps, this PokÃ©mon anchors itself to a cliff using the hooks on its rear.

name: Metang
pokedexX: It is formed by two Beldum joining together. Its steel body won't be scratched if it collides with a jet.
pokedexY: It is formed by two Beldum joining together. Its two brains are linked, amplifying its psychic power.
pokedexOR: When two Beldum fuse together, Metang is formed. The brains of the Beldum are joined by a magnetic nervous system. By linking its brains magnetically, this PokÃ©mon generates strong psychokinetic power.
pokedexAS: When two Beldum fuse together, Metang is formed. The brains of the Beldum are joined by a magnetic nervous system. This PokÃ©mon turns its arms to the rear for traveling at high speed.

name: Metagross
pokedexX: With four linked brains, it's more intelligent than a supercomputer, and it uses calculations to analyze foes.
pokedexY: Metang combined to form it. With four brains, it has the intelligence of a supercomputer.
pokedexOR: Metagross has four brains in total. Combined, the four brains can breeze through difficult calculations faster than a supercomputer. This PokÃ©mon can float in the air by tucking in its four legs.
pokedexAS: Metagross is the result of two Metang achieving fusion. When hunting, this PokÃ©mon pins the prey to the ground under its massive body. It then eats the helpless victim using the large mouth on its stomach.

name: Regirock
pokedexX: Its entire body is made of rock. If any part chips off in battle, it attaches rocks to repair itself.
pokedexY: The same rocks that form its body have been found in ground layers around the world.
pokedexOR: Regirock was sealed away by people long ago. If this PokÃ©mon's body is damaged in battle, it is said to seek out suitable rocks on its own to repair itself.
pokedexAS: Regirock's body is composed entirely of rocks. Recently, a study made the startling discovery that the rocks were all unearthed from different locations.

name: Regice
pokedexX: It is said to have slept in a glacier for thousands of years. Its body can't be melted, even by magma.
pokedexY: Its body is made of ice from the ice age. It controls frigid air of -328 degrees Fahrenheit.
pokedexOR: Regice's body was made during an ice age. The deep-frozen body can't be melted, even by fire. This PokÃ©mon controls frigid air of -328 degrees Fahrenheit.
pokedexAS: Regice cloaks itself with frigid air of -328 degrees Fahrenheit. Things will freeze solid just by going near this PokÃ©mon. Its icy body is so cold, it will not melt even if it is immersed in magma.

name: Registeel
pokedexX: Tempered by pressure underground over tens of thousands of years, its body cannot be scratched.
pokedexY: Its body is said to be harder than any kind of metal. A study has revealed that its body is hollow.
pokedexOR: Registeel has a body that is harder than any kind of metal. Its body is apparently hollow. No one has any idea what this PokÃ©mon eats.
pokedexAS: Registeel was imprisoned by people in ancient times. The metal composing its body is thought to be a curious substance that is not of this earth.

name: Latias
pokedexX: It communicates using telepathy. Its body is covered in down that refracts light to make it invisible.
pokedexY: Its body is covered with a down that can refract light in such a way that it becomes invisible.
pokedexOR: Latias is highly sensitive to the emotions of people. If it senses any hostility, this PokÃ©mon ruffles the feathers all over its body and cries shrilly to intimidate the foe.
pokedexAS: Latias is highly intelligent and capable of understanding human speech. It is covered with a glass-like down. The PokÃ©mon enfolds its body with its down and refracts light to alter its appearance.

name: Latios
pokedexX: A highly intelligent PokÃ©mon. By folding back its wings in flight, it can overtake jet planes.
pokedexY: It understands human speech and is highly intelligent. It is a tender PokÃ©mon that dislikes fighting.
pokedexOR: Latios has the ability to make others see an image of what it has seen or imagines in its head. This PokÃ©mon is intelligent and understands human speech.
pokedexAS: Latios will only open its heart to a Trainer with a compassionate spirit. This PokÃ©mon can fly faster than a jet plane by folding its forelegs to minimize air resistance.

name: Kyogre
pokedexX: A mythical PokÃ©mon said to have swelled the seas with rain and tidal waves. It battled with Groudon
pokedexY: It is said to have widened the seas by causing downpours. It had been asleep in a marine trench.
pokedexOR: Through Primal Reversion and with nature's full power, it will take back its true form. It can summon storms that cause the sea levels to rise.
pokedexAS: Kyogre is said to be the personification of the sea itself. Legends tell of its many clashes against Groudon, as each sought to gain the power of nature.

name: Groudon
pokedexX: Said to have expanded the lands by evaporating water with raging heat. It battled titanically with Kyogre
pokedexY: It had been asleep in underground magma ever since it fiercely fought Kyogre long ago.
pokedexOR: Groudon is said to be the personification of the land itself. Legends tell of its many clashes against Kyogre, as each sought to gain the power of nature.
pokedexAS: Through Primal Reversion and with nature's full power, it will take back its true form. It can cause magma to erupt and expand the landmass of the world.

name: Rayquaza
pokedexX: It lives in the ozone layer far above the clouds and cannot be seen from the ground.
pokedexY: It flies in the ozone layer, way up high in the sky. Until recently, no one had ever seen it.
pokedexOR: Rayquaza is said to have lived for hundreds of millions of years. Legends remain of how it put to rest the clash between Kyogre and Groudon.
pokedexAS: It flies forever through the ozone layer, consuming meteoroids for sustenance. The many meteoroids in its body provide the energy it needs to Mega Evolve.

name: Jirachi
pokedexX: Generations have believed that any wish written on a note on its head will come true when it awakens.
pokedexY: It is said to have the ability to grant any wish for just one week every thousand years.
pokedexOR: A legend states that Jirachi will make true any wish that is written on notes attached to its head when it awakens. If this PokÃ©mon senses danger, it will fight without awakening.
pokedexAS: Jirachi will awaken from its sleep of a thousand years if you sing to it in a voice of purity. It is said to make true any wish that people desire.

name: Deoxys
pokedexX: An alien virus that fell to earth on a meteor underwent a DNA mutation to become this PokÃ©mon.
pokedexY: DNA from a space virus mutated and became a PokÃ©mon. It appears where auroras are seen.
pokedexOR: The DNA of a space virus underwent a sudden mutation upon exposure to a laser beam and resulted in Deoxys. The crystalline organ on this PokÃ©monâ€™s chest appears to be its brain.
pokedexAS: Deoxys emerged from a virus that came from space. It is highly intelligent and wields psychokinetic powers. This PokÃ©mon shoots lasers from the crystalline organ on its chest.

name: Turtwig
pokedexX: Photosynthesis occurs across its body under the sun. The shell on its back is actually hardened soil.
pokedexY: It undertakes photosynthesis with its body, making oxygen. The leaf on its head wilts if it is thirsty.
pokedexOR: Photosynthesis occurs across its body under the sun. The shell on its back is actually hardened soil.
pokedexAS: It undertakes photosynthesis with its body, making oxygen. The leaf on its head wilts if it is thirsty.

name: Grotle
pokedexX: It lives along water in forests. In the daytime, it leaves the forest to sunbathe its treed shell.
pokedexY: It knows where pure water wells up. It carries fellow PokÃ©mon there on its back.
pokedexOR: It lives along water in forests. In the daytime, it leaves the forest to sunbathe its treed shell.
pokedexAS: It knows where pure water wells up. It carries fellow PokÃ©mon there on its back.

name: Torterra
