pokedexX: Ancient people imagined that beneath the ground, a gigantic Torterra dwelled.
pokedexY: Small PokÃ©mon occasionally gather on its unmoving back to begin building their nests.
pokedexOR: Ancient people imagined that beneath the ground, a gigantic Torterra dwelled.
pokedexAS: Small PokÃ©mon occasionally gather on its unmoving back to begin building their nests.

name: Chimchar
pokedexX: Its fiery rear end is fueled by gas made in its belly. Even rain can't extinguish the fire.
pokedexY: The gas made in its belly burns from its rear end. The fire burns weakly when it feels sick.
pokedexOR: Its fiery rear end is fueled by gas made in its belly. Even rain can't extinguish the fire.
pokedexAS: The gas made in its belly burns from its rear end. The fire burns weakly when it feels sick.

name: Monferno
pokedexX: It skillfully controls the intensity of the fire on its tail to keep its foes at an ideal distance.
pokedexY: It uses ceilings and walls to launch aerial attacks. Its fiery tail is but one weapon.
pokedexOR: It skillfully controls the intensity of the fire on its tail to keep its foes at an ideal distance.
pokedexAS: It uses ceilings and walls to launch aerial attacks. Its fiery tail is but one weapon.

name: Infernape
pokedexX: Its crown of fire is indicative of its fiery nature. It is beaten by none in terms of quickness.
pokedexY: It tosses its enemies around with agility. It uses all its limbs to fight in its own unique style.
pokedexOR: Its crown of fire is indicative of its fiery nature. It is beaten by none in terms of quickness.
pokedexAS: It tosses its enemies around with agility. It uses all its limbs to fight in its own unique style.

name: Piplup
pokedexX: It doesn't like to be taken care of. It's difficult to bond with since it won't listen to its Trainer.
pokedexY: Because it is very proud, it hates accepting food from people. Its thick down guards it from cold.
pokedexOR: It doesn't like to be taken care of. It's difficult to bond with since it won't listen to its Trainer.
pokedexAS: Because it is very proud, it hates accepting food from people. Its thick down guards it from cold.

name: Prinplup
pokedexX: It lives alone, away from others. Apparently, every one of them believes it is the most important.
pokedexY: It lives a solitary life. Its wings deliver wicked blows that can snap even the thickest of trees.
pokedexOR: It lives alone, away from others. Apparently, every one of them believes it is the most important.
pokedexAS: It lives a solitary life. Its wings deliver wicked blows that can snap even the thickest of trees.

name: Empoleon
pokedexX: It swims as fast as a jet boat. The edges of its wings are sharp and can slice apart drifting ice.
pokedexY: The three horns that extend from its beak attest to its power. The leader has the biggest horns.
pokedexOR: It swims as fast as a jet boat. The edges of its wings are sharp and can slice apart drifting ice.
pokedexAS: The three horns that extend from its beak attest to its power. The leader has the biggest horns.

name: Starly
pokedexX: They flock in great numbers. Though small, they flap their wings with great power.
pokedexY: They flock around mountains and fields, chasing after bug PokÃ©mon. Their singing is noisy and annoying.
pokedexOR: They flock in great numbers. Though small, they flap their wings with great power.
pokedexAS: They flock around mountains and fields, chasing after bug PokÃ©mon. Their singing is noisy and annoying.

name: Staravia
pokedexX: They maintain huge flocks, although fierce scuffles break out between various flocks.
pokedexY: It lives in forests and fields. Squabbles over territory occur when flocks collide.
pokedexOR: They maintain huge flocks, although fierce scuffles break out between various flocks.
pokedexAS: It lives in forests and fields. Squabbles over territory occur when flocks collide.

name: Staraptor
pokedexX: The muscles in its wings and legs are strong. It can easily fly while gripping a small PokÃ©mon.
pokedexY: When Staravia evolve into Staraptor, they leave the flock to live alone. They have sturdy wings.
pokedexOR: The muscles in its wings and legs are strong. It can easily fly while gripping a small PokÃ©mon.
pokedexAS: When Staravia evolve into Staraptor, they leave the flock to live alone. They have sturdy wings.

name: Bidoof
pokedexX: With nerves of steel, nothing can perturb it. It is more agile and active than it appears.
pokedexY: It constantly gnaws on logs and rocks to whittle down its front teeth. It nests alongside water.
pokedexOR: With nerves of steel, nothing can perturb it. It is more agile and active than it appears.
pokedexAS: It constantly gnaws on logs and rocks to whittle down its front teeth. It nests alongside water.

name: Bibarel
pokedexX: It busily makes its nest with stacks of branches and roots it has cut up with its sharp incisors.
pokedexY: It makes its nest by damming streams with bark and mud. It is known as an industrious worker.
pokedexOR: It busily makes its nest with stacks of branches and roots it has cut up with its sharp incisors.
pokedexAS: It makes its nest by damming streams with bark and mud. It is known as an industrious worker.

name: Kricketot
pokedexX: It chats with others using the sounds of its colliding antennae. These sounds are fall hallmarks.
pokedexY: When its antennae hit each other, it sounds like the music of a xylophone.
pokedexOR: It chats with others using the sounds of its colliding antennae. These sounds are fall hallmarks.
pokedexAS: When its antennae hit each other, it sounds like the music of a xylophone.

name: Kricketune
pokedexX: It crosses its knifelike arms in front of its chest when it cries. It can compose melodies ad lib.
pokedexY: It signals its emotions with its melodies. Scientists are studying these melodic patterns.
pokedexOR: It crosses its knifelike arms in front of its chest when it cries. It can compose melodies ad lib.
pokedexAS: It signals its emotions with its melodies. Scientists are studying these melodic patterns.

name: Shinx
pokedexX: The extension and contraction of its muscles generates electricity. It glows when in trouble.
pokedexY: All of its fur dazzles if danger is sensed. It flees while the foe is momentarily blinded.
pokedexOR: The extension and contraction of its muscles generates electricity. It glows when in trouble.
pokedexAS: All of its fur dazzles if danger is sensed. It flees while the foe is momentarily blinded.

name: Luxio
pokedexX: Its claws loose electricity with enough amperage to cause fainting. They live in small groups.
pokedexY: Strong electricity courses through the tips of its sharp claws. A light scratch causes fainting in foes.
pokedexOR: Its claws loose electricity with enough amperage to cause fainting. They live in small groups.
pokedexAS: Strong electricity courses through the tips of its sharp claws. A light scratch causes fainting in foes.

name: Luxray
pokedexX: When its eyes gleam gold, it can spot hiding prey--even those taking shelter behind a wall.
pokedexY: Luxray's ability to see through objects comes in handy when it's scouting for danger.
pokedexOR: When its eyes gleam gold, it can spot hiding prey-even those taking shelter behind a wall.
pokedexAS: Luxray's ability to see through objects comes in handy when it's scouting for danger.

name: Budew
pokedexX: When it feels the sun's warm touch, it opens its bud  to release pollen. It lives alongside clear pools.
pokedexY: Over the winter, it closes its bud and endures the cold. In spring, the bud opens and releases pollen.
pokedexOR: When it feels the sun's warm touch, it opens its bud to release pollen. It lives alongside clear pools.
pokedexAS: Over the winter, it closes its bud and endures the cold. In spring, the bud opens and releases pollen.

name: Roserade
pokedexX: Luring prey with a sweet scent, it uses poison whips on its arms to poison, bind, and finish off the prey.
pokedexY: With the movements of a dancer, it strikes with whips that are densely lined with poison thorns.
pokedexOR: Luring prey with a sweet scent, it uses poison whips on its arms to poison, bind, and finish off the prey.
pokedexAS: With the movements of a dancer, it strikes with whips that are densely lined with poison thorns.

name: Cranidos
pokedexX: It was resurrected from an iron ball-like fossil. It downs prey with its headbutts.
pokedexY: A lifelong jungle dweller from 100 million years ago, it would snap obstructing trees with headbutts.
pokedexOR: It was resurrected from an iron ball-like fossil. It downs prey with its headbutts.
pokedexAS: A lifelong jungle dweller from 100 million years ago, it would snap obstructing trees with headbutts.

name: Rampardos
pokedexX: Its skull withstands impacts of any magnitude. As a result, its brain never gets the chance to grow.
pokedexY: Its skull is a hard as iron. It is a brute that tears down jungle trees while catching prey.
pokedexOR: Its skull withstands impacts of any magnitude. As a result, its brain never gets the chance to grow.
pokedexAS: Its skull is as hard as iron. It is a brute that tears down jungle trees while catching prey.

name: Shieldon
pokedexX: It habitually polishes its face by rubbing it against tree trunks. It is weak to attacks from behind.
pokedexY: It was generated from a fossil dug out of a layer of clay that was older than anyone knows. It has a sturdy face.
pokedexOR: It habitually polishes its face by rubbing it against tree trunks. It is weak to attacks from behind.
pokedexAS: It was generated from a fossil dug out of a layer of clay that was older than anyone knows. It has a sturdy face.

name: Bastiodon
pokedexX: When they lined up side by side, no foe could break through. They shielded their young in that way.
pokedexY: Any frontal attack is repulsed. It is a docile PokÃ©mon that feeds on grass and berries.
pokedexOR: When they lined up side by side, no foe could break through. They shielded their young in that way.
pokedexAS: Any frontal attack is repulsed. It is a docile PokÃ©mon that feeds on grass and berries.

name: Burmy
pokedexX: To shelter itself from cold, wintry winds, it covers itself with a cloak made of twigs and leaves.
pokedexY: If its cloak is broken in battle, it quickly remakes the cloak with materials nearby.
pokedexOR: To shelter itself from cold, wintry winds, it covers itself with a cloak made of twigs and leaves.
pokedexAS: If its cloak is broken in battle, it quickly remakes the cloak with materials nearby.

name: Wormadam-Plant
pokedexX: Its appearance changes depending on where it evolved. The materials on hand become a part of its body.
pokedexY: When Burmy evolved, its cloak became a part of this PokÃ©mon's body. The cloak is never shed.
pokedexOR: Its appearance changes depending on where it evolved. The materials on hand become a part of its body.
pokedexAS: When Burmy evolved, its cloak became a part of this PokÃ©mon's body. The cloak is never shed.

name: Mothim
pokedexX: It loves the honey of flowers and steals honey collected by Combee.
pokedexY: It flutters around at night and steals honey from the Combee hive.
pokedexOR: It loves the honey of flowers and steals honey collected by Combee.
pokedexAS: It flutters around at night and steals honey from the Combee hive.

name: Combee
pokedexX: The trio is together from birth. It constantly gathers  honey from flowers to please Vespiquen.
pokedexY: It collects and delivers honey to its colony. At night, they cluster to form a beehive and sleep.
pokedexOR: The trio is together from birth. It constantly gathers honey from flowers to please Vespiquen.
pokedexAS: It collects and delivers honey to its colony. At night, they cluster to form a beehive and sleep.

name: Vespiquen
pokedexX: It houses its colony in cels in its body and releases various pheromones to make those grubs do its bidding
pokedexY: Its abdomen is a honeycomb for grubs. It raises its grubs on honey collected by Combee.
pokedexOR: It houses its colony in cells in its body and releases various pheromones to make those grubs do its bidding.
pokedexAS: Its abdomen is a honeycomb for grubs. It raises its grubs on honey collected by Combee.

name: Pachirisu
pokedexX: It makes fur balls that crackle with static electricity. It stores them with berries in tree holes.
pokedexY: A pair may be seen rubbing their cheek pouches together in an effort to share stored electricity.
pokedexOR: It makes fur balls that crackle with static electricity. It stores them with berries in tree holes.
pokedexAS: A pair may be seen rubbing their cheek pouches together in an effort to share stored electricity.

name: Buizel
pokedexX: It swims by rotating its two tails like a screw. When it dives, its flotation sac collapses.
pokedexY: It inflates the flotation sac around its neck and pokes its head out of the water to see what is going on.
pokedexOR: It swims by rotating its two tails like a screw. When it dives, its flotation sac collapses.
pokedexAS: It inflates the flotation sac around its neck and pokes its head out of the water to see what is going on.

name: Floatzel
pokedexX: It floats using its well-developed flotation sac. It assists in the rescues of drowning people.
pokedexY: Its flotation sac developed as a result of pursuing aquatic prey. It can double as a rubber raft.
pokedexOR: It floats using its well-developed flotation sac. It assists in the rescues of drowning people.
pokedexAS: Its flotation sac developed as a result of pursuing aquatic prey. It can double as a rubber raft.

name: Cherubi
pokedexX: Sunlight colors it red. When the small ball is drained of nutrients, it shrivels to herald evolution.
pokedexY: It evolves by sucking the energy out of the small ball where it had been storing nutrients.
pokedexOR: Sunlight colors it red. When the small ball is drained of nutrients, it shrivels to herald evolution.
pokedexAS: It evolves by sucking the energy out of the small ball where it had been storing nutrients.

name: Cherrim
pokedexX: During times of strong sunlight, its bud blooms, its petals open fully, and it becomes very active.
pokedexY: If it senses strong sunlight, it opens its folded petals to absorb the sun's rays with its whole body.
pokedexOR: During times of strong sunlight, its bud blooms, its petals open fully, and it becomes very active.
pokedexAS: If it senses strong sunlight, it opens its folded petals to absorb the sun's rays with its whole body.

name: Shellos
pokedexX: Beware of pushing strongly on its squishy body, as it makes a mysterious purple fluid ooze out.
pokedexY: Its shape and coloration vary, depending on its habitat.
pokedexOR: Beware of pushing strongly on its squishy body, as it makes a mysterious purple fluid ooze out.
pokedexAS: Its shape and coloration vary, depending on its habitat.

name: Gastrodon
pokedexX: When its natural enemy attacks, it oozes purple fluid and escapes.
pokedexY: It apparently had a huge shell for protection in ancient times. It lives in shallow tidal pools.
pokedexOR: When its natural enemy attacks, it oozes purple fluid and escapes.
pokedexAS: It apparently had a huge shell for protection in ancient times. It lives in shallow tidal pools.

name: Ambipom
pokedexX: They work in large colonies and make rings by linking their tails, apparently in friendship.
pokedexY: To eat, it deftly shucks nuts with its two tails. It rarely uses its arms now.
pokedexOR: They work in large colonies and make rings by linking their tails, apparently in friendship.
pokedexAS: To eat, it deftly shucks nuts with its two tails. It rarely uses its arms now.

name: Drifloon
pokedexX: A PokÃ©mon formed by the spirits of people and  PokÃ©mon. It loves damp, humid seasons.
pokedexY: These PokÃ©mon are called the "Signpost for Wandering Spirits." Children holding them sometimes vanish.
pokedexOR: A PokÃ©mon formed by the spirits of people and PokÃ©mon. It loves damp, humid seasons.
pokedexAS: These PokÃ©mon are called the "Signpost for Wandering Spirits." Children holding them sometimes vanish.

name: Drifblim
pokedexX: It carries people and PokÃ©mon when it flies. But since it only drifts, it can end up anywhere.
pokedexY: It's drowsy in daytime, but flies off in the evening in big groups. No one knows where they go.
pokedexOR: It carries people and PokÃ©mon when it flies. But since it only drifts, it can end up anywhere.
pokedexAS: It's drowsy in daytime, but flies off in the evening in big groups. No one knows where they go.

name: Buneary
pokedexX: Its ears are always rolled up. They can be forcefully extended to shatter even a large boulder.
pokedexY: When it senses danger, it perks up its ears. On cold nights, it sleeps with its head tucked into its fur.
pokedexOR: Its ears are always rolled up. They can be forcefully extended to shatter even a large boulder.
pokedexAS: When it senses danger, it perks up its ears. On cold nights, it sleeps with its head tucked into its fur.

name: Lopunny
pokedexX: Extremely cautious, it quickly bounds off when it senses danger.
pokedexY: The ears appear to be delicate. If they are touched roughly, it kicks with its graceful legs.
pokedexOR: Extremely cautious, it quickly bounds off when it senses danger.
pokedexAS: The ears appear to be delicate. If they are touched roughly, it kicks with its graceful legs.

name: Mismagius
pokedexX: It chants incantations. While they usually torment targets, some chants bring happiness.
pokedexY: Its cries sound like incantations. Those hearing it are tormented by headaches and hallucinations.
pokedexOR: It chants incantations. While they usually torment targets, some chants bring happiness.
pokedexAS: Its cries sound like incantations to torment the foe. It appears where you least expect it.

name: Honchkrow
pokedexX: If one utters a deep cry, many Murkrow gather quickly. For this, it is called "Summoner of Night."
pokedexY: Becoming active at night, it is known to swarm with numerous Murkrow in tow.
pokedexOR: If one utters a deep cry, many Murkrow gather quickly. For this, it is called "Summoner of Night."
pokedexAS: Becoming active at night, it is known to swarm with numerous Murkrow in tow.

name: Glameow
pokedexX: It claws if displeased and purrs when affectionate. Its fickleness is very popular among some.
pokedexY: When it's happy, Glameow demonstrates beautiful movements of its tail, like a dancing ribbon.
pokedexOR: It claws if displeased and purrs when affectionate. Its fickleness is very popular among some.
pokedexAS: When it's happy, Glameow demonstrates beautiful movements of its tail, like a dancing ribbon.

name: Purugly
pokedexX: It would claim another PokÃ©mon's nest as its own if it finds a nest sufficiently comfortable.
pokedexY: To make itself appear intimidatingly beefy, it tightly cinches its waist with its twin tails.
pokedexOR: It would claim another PokÃ©mon's nest as its own if it finds a nest sufficiently comfortable.
pokedexAS: To make itself appear intimidatingly beefy, it tightly cinches its waist with its twin tails.

name: Chingling
pokedexX: Each time it hops, it makes a ringing sound. It deafens foes by emitting high-frequency cries.
pokedexY: There is an orb inside its mouth. When it hops, the orb bounces all over and makes a ringing sound.
pokedexOR: Each time it hops, it makes a ringing sound. It deafens foes by emitting high-frequency cries.
pokedexAS: There is an orb inside its mouth. When it hops, the orb bounces all over and makes a ringing sound.

name: Stunky
pokedexX: It sprays a foul fluid from its rear. Its stench spreads over a mile radius, driving PokÃ©mon away.
pokedexY: It protects itself by spraying a noxious fluid from its rear. The stench lingers for 24 hours.
pokedexOR: It sprays a foul fluid from its rear. Its stench spreads over a mile radius, driving PokÃ©mon away.
pokedexAS: It protects itself by spraying a noxious fluid from its rear. The stench lingers for 24 hours.

name: Skuntank
pokedexX: It sprays a vile-smelling fluid from the tip of its tail to attack. Its range is over 160 feet.
pokedexY: It sprays a stinky fluid from its tail. The fluid smells worse the longer it is allowed to fester.
pokedexOR: It sprays a vile-smelling fluid from the tip of its tail to attack. Its range is over 160 feet.
pokedexAS: It sprays a stinky fluid from its tail. The fluid smells worse the longer it is allowed to fester.

name: Bronzor
pokedexX: Ancient people believed that the pattern on Bronzor's back contained a mysterious power.
pokedexY: Implements shaped like it were discovered in ancient tombs. It is unknown if they are related.
pokedexOR: Ancient people believed that the pattern on Bronzor's back contained a mysterious power.
pokedexAS: Implements shaped like it were discovered in ancient tombs. It is unknown if they are related.

name: Bronzong
pokedexX: In ages past, this PokÃ©mon was revered as a bringer of rain. It was found buried in the ground.
pokedexY: Ancient people believed that petitioning Bronzong for rain was the way to make crops grow.
pokedexOR: In ages past, this PokÃ©mon was revered as a bringer of rain. It was found buried in the ground.
pokedexAS: Ancient people believed that petitioning Bronzong for rain was the way to make crops grow.

name: Bonsly
pokedexX: It prefers arid environments. It leaks water from its eyes to adjust its body's fluid levels.
pokedexY: It prefers and arid atmosphere. It leaks water that looks like tears when adjusting its moisture level.
pokedexOR: It prefers arid environments. It leaks water from its eyes to adjust its body's fluid levels.
pokedexAS: It prefers an arid atmosphere. It leaks water that looks like tears when adjusting its moisture level.

name: Mime Jr.
pokedexX: In an attempt to confuse its enemy, it mimics the enemy's movements. Then it wastes no time in making itself scarce!
pokedexY: It habitually mimics foes. Once mimicked, the foe cannot take its eyes off this PokÃ©mon.
pokedexOR: In an attempt to confuse its enemy, it mimics the enemy's movements. Then it wastes no time in making itself scarce!
pokedexAS: It habitually mimics foes. Once mimicked, the foe cannot take its eyes off this PokÃ©mon.

name: Happiny
pokedexX: It carries a round, egg-shaped rock in its belly pouch and gives the rock to its friends.
pokedexY: It carefully carries a round, white rock that it thinks is an egg. It's bothered by how curly its hair looks.
pokedexOR: It carries a round, egg-shaped rock in its belly pouch and gives the rock to its friends.
pokedexAS: It carefully carries a round, white rock that it thinks is an egg. It's bothered by how curly its hair looks.

name: Chatot
pokedexX: It mimics the cries of other PokÃ©mon to trick them into thinking it's one of them. This way they won't attack  it.
pokedexY: It can learn and speak human words. If they gather, they all learn the same saying.
pokedexOR: It mimics the cries of other PokÃ©mon to trick them into thinking it's one of them. This way they won't attack it.
pokedexAS: It can learn and speak human words. If they gather, they all learn the same saying.

name: Spiritomb
pokedexX: A PokÃ©mon that was formed by 108 spirits. It is bound to a fissure in an odd keystone
pokedexY: It was bound to a fissure in an odd keystone as  punishment for misdeeds 500 years ago.
pokedexOR: A PokÃ©mon that was formed by 108 spirits. It is bound to a fissure in an odd keystone.
pokedexAS: It was bound to a fissure in an odd keystone as punishment for misdeeds 500 years ago.

name: Gible
pokedexX: It nests in horizontal holes warmed by geothermal heat. Foes who get too close can expect to be pounced on and bitten.
pokedexY: It nests in small, horizontal holes in cave walls. It pounces to catch prey that stray too close.
pokedexOR: It nests in horizontal holes warmed by geothermal heat. Foes who get too close can expect to be pounced on and bitten.
pokedexAS: It nests in small, horizontal holes in cave walls. It pounces to catch prey that stray too close.

name: Gabite
pokedexX: It love sparkly things. It seeks treasures in caves and hoards the loot in its nest.
pokedexY: As it digs to expand its nest, it habitually digs up gems that it then hoards in its nest.
pokedexOR: It loves sparkly things. It seeks treasures in caves and hoards the loot in its nest.
pokedexAS: As it digs to expand its nest, it habitually digs up gems that it then hoards in its nest.

name: Garchomp
pokedexX: When it folds up its body and extends its wings, it looks like a jet plane. It flies at sonic speed.
pokedexY: It flies at speeds equals to a jet fighter plane. It never allows its prey to escape.
pokedexOR: When it folds up its body and extends its wings, it looks like a jet plane. It flies at sonic speed.
pokedexAS: It flies at speeds equal to a jet fighter plane. It never allows its prey to escape.

name: Munchlax
pokedexX: It hides food under its long body hair. However, it forgets it has hidden the food.
pokedexY: It conceals food under the long fur on its body. It carts around this food stash and swallows it without chewing.
pokedexOR: It hides food under its long body hair. However, it forgets it has hidden the food.
pokedexAS: It conceals food under the long fur on its body. It carts around this food stash and swallows it without chewing.

name: Riolu
pokedexX: It uses the shape of auras, which change according to emotion, to communicate with others.
pokedexY: The aura that emanates from its body intensifies to alert others if it is afraid or sad.
pokedexOR: It uses the shapes of auras, which change according to emotion, to communicate with others.
pokedexAS: The aura that emanates from its body intensifies to alert others if it is afraid or sad.

name: Lucario
pokedexX: By catching the aura emanating from others, it can read their thoughts and movements.
pokedexY: By reading the auras of all things, it can tell how others are feeling from over half a mile away.
pokedexOR: By catching the aura emanating from others, it can read their thoughts and movements.
pokedexAS: By reading the auras of all things, it can tell how others are feeling from over half a mile away.

name: Hippopotas
pokedexX: It lives in arid places. Instead of perspiration,  it expels grainy sand from its body.
pokedexY: It enshrouds itself with sand to protect itself from germs. It does not enjoy getting wet.
pokedexOR: It lives in arid places. Instead of perspiration, it expels grainy sand from its body.
pokedexAS: It enshrouds itself with sand to protect itself from germs. It does not enjoy getting wet.

name: Hippowdon
pokedexX: It brandishes its gaping mouth in a display of fearsome strength. It raises vast quantities of sand while attacking.
pokedexY: It blasts internally stored sand from ports on its body to create a towering twister for attack.
pokedexOR: It brandishes its gaping mouth in a display of fearsome strength. It raises vast quantities of sand while attacking.
pokedexAS: It blasts internally stored sand from ports on its body to create a towering twister for attack.

name: Skorupi
pokedexX: It grips prey with its tail claws and injects poison. It tenaciously hangs on until the poison takes.
pokedexY: It burrows under the sand to lie in wait for prey. Its tail claws can inject its prey with a savage poison.
pokedexOR: It grips prey with its tail claws and injects poison. It tenaciously hangs on until the poison takes.
pokedexAS: It burrows under the sand to lie in wait for prey. Its tail claws can inject its prey with a savage poison.

name: Drapion
pokedexX: It takes pride in its strength. Even though it can tear foes apart, it finishes them off with powerful poison.
pokedexY: It has the power in its clawed arms to make scrap of a car. The tips of its claws release poison.
pokedexOR: It takes pride in its strength. Even though it can tear foes apart, it finishes them off with powerful poison.
pokedexAS: It has the power in its clawed arms to make scrap of a car. The tips of its claws release poison.

name: Croagunk
pokedexX: Its cheeks hold poison sacs. It tries to catch foes off guard to jab them with toxic fingers.
pokedexY: Inflating its poison sacs, it fills the area with an odd sound and hits flinching opponents with a poison jab.
pokedexOR: Its cheeks hold poison sacs. It tries to catch foes off guard to jab them with toxic fingers.
pokedexAS: Inflating its poison sacs, it fills the area with an odd sound and hits flinching opponents with a poison jab.

name: Toxicroak
pokedexX: It has a poison sac at its throat. When it croaks, the stored poison is churned for greater potency.
pokedexY: Its knuckle claws secrete a toxin so vile that even a scratch could prove fatal.
pokedexOR: It has a poison sac at its throat. When it croaks, the stored poison is churned for greater potency.
pokedexAS: Its knuckle claws secrete a toxin so vile that even a scratch could prove fatal.

name: Carnivine
pokedexX: It attracts prey with its sweet-smelling saliva, then chomps down. It takes a whole day to eat prey.
pokedexY: It binds itself to trees in marshes. It attracts prey with its sweet-smelling drool and gulps them down.
pokedexOR: It attracts prey with its sweet-smelling saliva, then chomps down. It takes a whole day to eat prey.
pokedexAS: It binds itself to trees in marshes. It attracts prey with its sweet-smelling drool and gulps them down.

name: Finneon
pokedexX: The line running down its side can store sunlight. It shines vividly at night.
pokedexY: After long exposure to sunlight, the patterns on its tail fins shine vividly when darkness arrives.
pokedexOR: The line running down its side can store sunlight. It shines vividly at night.
pokedexAS: After long exposure to sunlight, the patterns on its tail fins shine vividly when darkness arrives.

name: Lumineon
pokedexX: It lives on the deep-sea floor. It attracts prey by flashing the patterns on its four tail fins.
pokedexY: To avoid detection by predators, it crawls along the seafloor using the two fins on its chest.
pokedexOR: It lives on the deep-sea floor. It attracts prey by flashing the patterns on its four tail fins.
pokedexAS: To avoid detection by predators, it crawls along the seafloor using the two fins on its chest.

name: Mantyke
pokedexX: The pattern on its back varies by region. It often swims in a school of Remoraid.
pokedexY: When it swims close to the surface of the ocean, people aboard ships are able to observe the pattern on its back.
pokedexOR: The pattern on its back varies by region. It often swims in a school of Remoraid.
pokedexAS: When it swims close to the surface of the ocean, people aboard ships are able to observe the pattern on its back.

name: Snover
pokedexX: During cold seasons, it migrates to the mountain's lower reaches. It returns to the snow-covered summit in the spring.
pokedexY: In the spring, it grows berries with the texture of frozen treats around its belly.
pokedexOR: During cold seasons, it migrates to the mountain's lower reaches. It returns to the snow-covered summit in the spring.
pokedexAS: In the spring, it grows berries with the texture of frozen treats around its belly.

name: Abomasnow
pokedexX: It blankets wide areas in snow by whipping up blizzards. It is also known as "The Ice Monster."
pokedexY: It lives a quiet life on mountains that are perpetually covered in snow. It hides itself by whipping up blizzards.
pokedexOR: It blankets wide areas in snow by whipping up blizzards. It is also known as "The Ice Monster."
pokedexAS: It lives a quiet life on mountains that are perpetually covered in snow. It hides itself by whipping up blizzards.

name: Weavile
pokedexX: It lives in snowy regions. It carves patterns in trees with its claws as a signal to others.
pokedexY: They live in cold regions, forming groups of four or five that hunt prey with impressive coordination.
pokedexOR: It lives in snowy regions. It carves patterns in trees with its claws as a signal to others.
pokedexAS: They live in cold regions, forming groups of four or five that hunt prey with impressive coordination.

name: Magnezone
pokedexX: Sometimes the magnetism emitted by Magnezone is too strong, making them attract each other so they cannot move.
pokedexY: It evolved from exposure to a special magnetic field. Three units generate magnetism.
pokedexOR: Sometimes the magnetism emitted by Magnezone is too strong, making them attract each other so they cannot move.
pokedexAS: It evolved from exposure to a special magnetic field. Three units generate magnetism.

name: Lickilicky
pokedexX: It wraps things with its extensible tongue. Getting too close to it will leave you soaked with drool.

pokedexOR: It wraps things with its extensible tongue. Getting too close to it will leave you soaked with drool.
pokedexAS: Their saliva contains lots of components that can dissolve anything. The numbness caused by their lick does not dissipate.

name: Rhyperior
pokedexX: From holes in its palms, it fires out Geodude. Its carapace can withstand volcanic eruptions.
pokedexY: It puts rocks in holes in its palms and uses its muscles to shoot them. Geodude are shot at rare times.
pokedexOR: From holes in its palms, it fires out Geodude. Its carapace can withstand volcanic eruptions.
pokedexAS: It puts rocks in holes in its palms and uses its muscles to shoot them. Geodude are shot at rare times.

name: Tangrowth
pokedexX: It ensnares prey by extending arms made of vines. Losing arms to predators does not trouble it.
pokedexY: Its vines grow so profusely that, in the warm season, you can't even see its eyes.
pokedexOR: It ensnares prey by extending arms made of vines. Losing arms to predators does not trouble it.
pokedexAS: Its vines grow so profusely that, in the warm season, you can't even see its eyes.

name: Electivire
pokedexX: As its electric charge amplifies, blue sparks begin to crackle between its horns.
pokedexY: It pushes the tips of its two tails against the foe, then lets loose with over 20,000 volts of power.
pokedexOR: As its electric charge amplifies, blue sparks begin to crackle between its horns.
pokedexAS: It pushes the tips of its two tails against the foe, then lets loose with over 20,000 volts of power.

name: Magmortar
pokedexX: It blasts fireballs of over 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit from the ends of its arms. It lives in volcanic craters.
pokedexY: It blasts fireballs of over 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit out of its arms. Its breath also sears and sizzles.
pokedexOR: It blasts fireballs of over 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit from the ends of its arms. It lives in volcanic craters.
pokedexAS: It blasts fireballs of over 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit out of its arms. Its breath also sears and sizzles.

name: Togekiss
pokedexX: As everyone knows, it visits peaceful regions, bringing them gifts of kindness and sweet blessings.
pokedexY: It shares many blessings with people who respect one another's rights and avoid needless strife.
pokedexOR: As everyone knows, it visits peaceful regions, bringing them gifts of kindness and sweet blessings.
pokedexAS: It shares many blessings with people who respect one another's rights and avoid needless strife.

name: Yanmega
pokedexX: It prefers to battle by biting apart foes' heads instantly while flying at high speed.
pokedexY: This six-legged PokÃ©mon is easily capable of transporting an adult in flight. The wings on its tail help it stay balanced.
pokedexOR: It prefers to battle by biting apart foes' heads instantly while flying by at high speed.
pokedexAS: This six-legged PokÃ©mon is easily capable of transporting an adult in flight. The wings on its tail help it stay balanced.

name: Leafeon
pokedexX: When you see Leafeon asleep in a patch of sunshine, you'll know it is using photosynthesis to produce clean air.
pokedexY: Just like a plant, it uses photosynthesis. As a result, it is always enveloped in clear air.
pokedexOR: When you see Leafeon asleep in a patch of sunshine, you'll know it is using photosynthesis to produce clean air.

name: Glaceon

name: Gliscor
pokedexX: It observes prey while hanging inverted from branches. When the chance presents itself, it swoops!

pokedexAS: Its flight is soundless. It uses its lengthy tail to carry off its prey... Then its elongated fangs do the rest.

name: Mamoswine

pokedexOR: A frozen Mamoswine was dug from ice dating back 10,000 years. This PokÃ©mon has been around a long, long, long time.
pokedexAS: Its impressive tusks are made of ice. The population thinned when it turned warm after the ice age.

name: Porygon-Z
pokedexX: Additional software was installed to make it a better PokÃ©mon. It began acting oddly, however.

pokedexAS: Its programming was modified to enable it to travel through alien dimensions. Seems there might have been an error...

name: Gallade
pokedexX: Because it can sense what its foe is thinking, its attacks burst out first, fast, and fierce.

pokedexOR: Because it can sense what its foe is thinking, its attacks burst out first, fast, and fierce.
pokedexAS: A master of courtesy and swordsmanship, it fights using extending swords on its elbows.

name: Probopass

pokedexY: It freely controls three small units called Mini-Noses using magnetic force.

pokedexAS: It freely controls three small units called Mini-Noses using magnetic force.

pokedexOR: It is said to take lost spirits into its pliant body and guide them home.
pokedexAS: The antenna on its head captures radio waves from the world of spirits that command it to take people there.

pokedexX: It freezes foes with an icy breath nearly -60 degrees Fahrenheit. What seems to be its body is actually hollow.

name: Rotom
pokedexX: Research continues on this PokÃ©mon, which could be the power source of a unique motor.
pokedexY: Its body is composed of plasma. It is known to infiltrate electronic devices and wreak havoc.
pokedexOR: Research continues on this PokÃ©mon, which could be the power source of a unique motor.

pokedexOR: Known as "The Being of Emotion." It taught humans the nobility of sorrow, pain, and joy.

pokedexOR: Known as "The Being of Willpower." It sleeps at the bottom of a lake to keep the world in balance.

name: Dialga
pokedexX: A PokÃ©mon spoken of in legend. It is said that time began moving when Dialga was born.
pokedexY: It has the power to control time. It appears in Sinnoh-region myths as an ancient deity.
pokedexOR: A PokÃ©mon spoken of in legend. It is said that time began moving when Dialga was born.

name: Palkia
pokedexX: It is said to live in a gap in the spatial dimension parallel to ours. It appears in mythology.

pokedexAS: Boiling blood, like magma, circulates through its body. It makes its dwelling place in volcanic caves.

name: Regigigas
pokedexX: It is said to have made PokÃ©mon that look like itself from a special ice mountain, rocks, and magma.
pokedexY: There is an enduring legend that states this PokÃ©mon towed continents with ropes.
pokedexOR: It is said to have made PokÃ©mon that look like itself from a special ice mountain, rocks, and magma.
pokedexAS: There is an enduring legend that states this PokÃ©mon towed continents with ropes.

name: Giratina-Altered
pokedexX: This PokÃ©mon is said to live in a world on the reverse side of ours, where common knowledge is distorted and strange.
pokedexY: It was banished for its violence. It silently gazed upon the old world from the Distortion World.
pokedexOR: This PokÃ©mon is said to live in a world on the reverse side of ours, where common knowledge is distorted and strange.
pokedexAS: It was banished for its violence. It silently gazed upon the old world from the Distortion World.

name: Cresselia
pokedexX: Shiny particles are released from its wings like a veil. It is said to represent the crescent moon.

pokedexAS: Those who sleep holding Cresselia's feather are assured of joyful dreams. It is said to represent the crescent moon.

name: Phione

pokedexAS: It drifts in warm seas. It always returns to where it was born, no matter how far it may have drifted.

name: Manaphy
pokedexX: It is born with a wondrous power that lets it bond with any kind of PokÃ©mon.
pokedexY: It starts its life with a wondrous power that permits it to bond with any kind of PokÃ©mon.
pokedexOR: It is born with a wondrous power that lets it bond with any kind of PokÃ©mon.
pokedexAS: It starts its life with a wondrous power that permits it to bond with any kind of PokÃ©mon.

name: Darkrai
pokedexX: It chases people and PokÃ©mon from its territory by causing them to experience deep, nightmarish slumbers.

pokedexOR: It chases people and PokÃ©mon from its territory by causing them to experience deep, nightmarish slumbers.
pokedexAS: It can lull people to sleep and make them dream. It is active during nights of the new moon.

name: Shaymin-Land

name: Arceus
pokedexX: According to the legends of Sinnoh, this PokÃ©mon emerged from an egg and shaped all there is in this world.
pokedexY: It is told in mythology that this PokÃ©mon was born before the universe even existed.
pokedexOR: According to the legends of Sinnoh, this PokÃ©mon emerged from an egg and shaped all there is in this world.
pokedexAS: It is told in mythology that this PokÃ©mon was born before the universe even existed.

name: Victini
pokedexX: This PokÃ©mon brings victory. It is said that Trainers with Victini always win, regardless of the type of encounter.
pokedexY: When it shares the infinite energy it creates, that being's entire body will be overflowing with power.
pokedexOR: This PokÃ©mon brings victory. It is said that Trainers with Victini always win, regardless of the type of encounter.
pokedexAS: When it shares the infinite energy it creates, that being's entire body will be overflowing with power.

name: Snivy
pokedexX: Being exposed to sunlight makes its movements swifter. It uses vines more adeptly than its hands.

pokedexX: It moves along the ground as if sliding. Its swift movements befuddle its foes, and it then attacks with a vine whip.

pokedexAS: When it gets dirty, its leaves can't be used in photosynthesis, so it always keeps itself clean.

pokedexX: It only gives its all fighting against strong opponents who are not fazed by the glare from Serperior's noble eyes.

pokedexY: It loves to eat roasted berries, but sometimes it gets too excited and burns them to a crisp.

name: Oshawott

pokedexOR: Strict training is how it learns its flowing double-scalchop technique.

name: Samurott
pokedexX: In the time it takes a foe to blink, it can draw and sheathe the seamitars attached to its front legs.

pokedexAS: One swing of the sword incorporated in its armor can fell an opponent. A simple glare from one of them quiets everybody.

pokedexAS: Extremely cautious, one of them will always be on the lookout, but it won't notice a foe coming from behind.

pokedexOR: Using luminescent matter, it makes its eyes and body glow and stuns attacking opponents.

name: Lillipup
pokedexX: The long hair around its face provides an amazing radar that lets it sense subtle changes in its surroundings.
pokedexY: Though it is a very brave PokÃ©mon, it's also smart enough to check its foe's strength and avoid battle.
pokedexOR: The long hair around its face provides an amazing radar that lets it sense subtle changes in its surroundings.

name: Herdier
pokedexX: This very loyal PokÃ©mon helps Trainers, and it also takes care of other PokÃ©mon.

pokedexOR: This very loyal PokÃ©mon helps Trainers, and it also takes care of other PokÃ©mon.

name: Purrloin
pokedexX: Its cute act is a ruse. When victims let down their guard, they find their items taken, It attacks with sharp claws.

pokedexOR: Their beautiful form comes from the muscles they have developed. They run silently in the night.

name: Pansage
pokedexX: It shares the leaf on its head with weary-looking PokÃ©mon. These leaves are known to relieve stress.

name: Simisage
pokedexX: It attacks enemies with strikes of its thorn-covered tail. This PokÃ©mon is wild tempered.

pokedexOR: It attacks enemies with strikes of its thorn-covered tail. This PokÃ©mon is wild tempered.

name: Pansear
pokedexX: Very intelligent, it roasts berries before eating them. It likes to help people.

name: Pidove
pokedexX: This very forgetful PokÃ©mon will wait for a new order from its Trainer even though it already has one.

name: Tranquill

pokedexAS: They have lightning-like movements. When Zebstrika run at full speed, the sound of thunder reverberates.

name: Roggenrola
pokedexX: Its ear is hexagonal in shape. Compressed underground, its body is as hard as steel.
pokedexY: They were discovered a hundred years ago in an earthquake fissure. Inside each one is an energy core.
pokedexOR: Its ear is hexagonal in shape. Compressed underground, its body is as hard as steel.
pokedexAS: They were discovered a hundred years ago in an earthquake fissure. Inside each one is an energy core.

name: Boldore
pokedexX: Because its energy was too great to be contained, the energy leaked out and formed orange crystals.
pokedexY: When it is healthy, its core sticks out. Always facing the same way, it swiftly moves front to back and left to right.
pokedexOR: Because its energy was too great to be contained, the energy leaked and formed orange crystals.
pokedexAS: When it is healthy, its core sticks out. Always facing the same way, it swiftly moves front to back and left to right.

name: Gigalith
pokedexX: The solar rays it absorbs are processed in its energy core and fired as a ball of light.
pokedexY: Compressing the energy from its internal core lets it fire off an attack capable of blowing away a mountain.
pokedexOR: The solar rays it absorbs are processed in its energy core and fired as a ball of light.
pokedexAS: Compressing the energy from its internal core lets it fire off an attack capable of blowing away a mountain.

name: Woobat
pokedexX: Its habitat is dark forests and caves. It emits  ultrasonic waves from its nose to learn about its surroundings.
pokedexY: The heart-shaped mark left on a body after a Woobat has been attached to it is said to bring good fortune.
pokedexOR: Its habitat is dark forests and caves. It emits ultrasonic waves from its nose to learn about its surroundings.
pokedexAS: The heart-shaped mark left on a body after a Woobat has been attached to it is said to bring good fortune.

name: Swoobat
pokedexX: It shakes its tail vigorously when it emits ultrasonic waves strong enough to reduce concrete to rubble.
pokedexY: Anyone who comes into contact with the ultrasonic waves emitted by a courting male experiences a positive mood shift.
pokedexOR: It shakes its tail vigorously when it emits ultrasonic waves strong enough to reduce concrete to rubble.
pokedexAS: Anyone who comes into contact with the ultrasonic waves emitted by a courting male experiences a positive mood shift.

name: Drilbur
pokedexX: It makes its way swiftly through the soil by putting both claws together and rotating at high speed.
pokedexY: By spinning its body, it can dig straight through the ground at a speed of 30 mph.
pokedexOR: It makes its way swiftly through the soil by putting both claws together and rotating at high speed.
pokedexAS: By spinning its body, it can dig straight through the ground at a speed of 30 mph.

name: Excadrill
pokedexX: It can help in tunnel construction. Its drill has evolved into steel strong enough to bore through iron plates.
pokedexY: More than 300 feet below the surface, they build mazelike nests. Their activity can be destructive to subway tunnels.
pokedexOR: It can help in tunnel construction. Its drill has evolved into steel strong enough to bore through iron plates.
pokedexAS: More than 300 feet below the surface, they build mazelike nests. Their activity can be destructive to subway tunnels.

name: Audino
pokedexX: Using the feelers on its ears, it can tell how someone is feeling or when an egg might hatch.
pokedexY: It touches others with the feelers on its ears, using the sound of their heartbeats to tell how they are feeling.
pokedexOR: Using the feelers on its ears, it can tell how someone is feeling or when an egg might hatch.
pokedexAS: It touches others with the feelers on its ears, using the sound of their heartbeats to tell how they are feeling.

name: Timburr
pokedexX: These PokÃ©mon appear at building sites and help out with construction. They always carry squared logs.
pokedexY: Always carrying squared logs, they help out with construction. As they grow, they carry bigger logs.
pokedexOR: These PokÃ©mon appear at building sites and help out with construction. They always carry squared logs.
pokedexAS: Always carrying squared logs, they help out with construction. As they grow, they carry bigger logs.

name: Gurdurr
pokedexX: With strengthened bodies, they skillfully wield steel beams to take down buildings.
pokedexY: This PokÃ©mon is so muscular and strongly built that even a group of wrestlers could not make it budge an inch.
pokedexOR: With strengthened bodies, they skillfully wield steel beams to take down buildings.
pokedexAS: This PokÃ©mon is so muscular and strongly built that even a group of wrestlers could not make it budge an inch.

name: Conkeldurr
pokedexX: It is thought that Conkeldurr taught humans how to make concrete more than 2,000 years ago.
pokedexY: Rather than rely on force, they master moves that utilize the centrifugal force of spinning concrete.
pokedexOR: It is thought that Conkeldurr taught humans how to make concrete more than 2,000 years ago.
pokedexAS: Rather than rely on force, they master moves that utilize the centrifugal force of spinning concrete.

name: Tympole
pokedexX: By vibrating its cheeks, it emits sound waves imperceptible to humans and warns others of danger.
pokedexY: By vibrating its cheeks, it emits sound waves imperceptible to humans. It uses the rhythm of these sounds to talk.
pokedexOR: By vibrating its cheeks, it emits sound waves imperceptible to humans and warns others of danger.
pokedexAS: By vibrating its cheeks, it emits sound waves imperceptible to humans. It uses the rhythm of these sounds to talk.

name: Palpitoad
pokedexX: When they vibrate the bumps on their heads, they can make waves in water or earthquake-like vibrations on land.
pokedexY: It lives in the water and on land. It uses its long, sticky tongue to immobilize its opponents.
pokedexOR: When they vibrate the bumps on their heads, they can make waves in water or earthquake-like vibrations on land.
pokedexAS: It lives in the water and on land. It uses its long, sticky tongue to immobilize its opponents.

name: Seismitoad
pokedexX: It increases the power of its punches by vibrating the bumps on its fists. It can turn a boulder to rubble with one punch.
pokedexY: They shoot paralyzing liquid from their head bumps. They use vibration to hurt their opponents.
pokedexOR: It increases the power of its punches by vibrating the bumps on its fists. It can turn a boulder to rubble with one punch.
pokedexAS: They shoot paralyzing liquid from their head bumps. They use vibration to hurt their opponents.

name: Throh
pokedexX: When it tightens its belt, it becomes stronger. Wild Throh use vines to weave their own belts
pokedexY: When it encounters a foe bigger than itself, it wants to throw it. It changes belts as it gets stronger.
pokedexOR: When it tightens its belt, it becomes stronger. Wild Throh use vines to weave their own belts.
pokedexAS: When it encounters a foe bigger than itself, it wants to throw it. It changes belts as it gets stronger.

name: Sawk
pokedexX: Desiring the strongest karate chop, they seclude themselves in mountains and train without sleeping.
pokedexY: Tying their belts gets them pumped and makes their punches more destructive. Disturbing their training angers them.
pokedexOR: Desiring the strongest karate chop, they seclude themselves in mountains and train without sleeping.
pokedexAS: Tying their belts gets them pumped and makes their punches more destructive. Disturbing their training angers them.

name: Sewaddle
pokedexX: This PokÃ©mon makes clothes for itself. It chews up leaves and sews them with sticky thread extruded from its mouth.
pokedexY: Since this PokÃ©mon makes its own clothes out of leaves, it is a popular mascot for fashion designers.
pokedexOR: This PokÃ©mon makes clothes for itself. It chews up leaves and sews them with sticky thread extruded from its mouth.
pokedexAS: Since this PokÃ©mon makes its own clothes out of leaves, it is a popular mascot for fashion designers.

name: Swadloon
pokedexX: Forests where Swadloon live have superb foliage because the nutrients they make from fallen leaves nourish the plant life.
pokedexY: It protects itself from the cold by wrapping up in leaves. It stays on the move, eating leaves in forests.
pokedexOR: Forests where Swadloon live have superb foliage because the nutrients they make from fallen leaves nourish the plant life.
pokedexAS: It protects itself from the cold by wrapping up in leaves. It stays on the move, eating leaves in forests.

name: Leavanny
pokedexX: Upon finding a small PokÃ©mon, it weaves clothing for it from leaves by using the sticky silk secreted from its mouth.
pokedexY: It keeps its eggs warm with heat from fermenting leaves. It also uses leaves to make warm wrappings for Sewaddle.
pokedexOR: Upon finding a small PokÃ©mon, it weaves clothing for it from leaves by using the sticky silk secreted from its mouth.
pokedexAS: It keeps its eggs warm with heat from fermenting leaves. It also uses leaves to make warm wrappings for Sewaddle.

name: Venipede
pokedexX: It discovers what is going on around it by using the feelers on its head and tail. It is brutally aggressive.
pokedexY: Its bite injects a potent poison, enough to paralyze large bird PokÃ©mon that try to prey on it.
pokedexOR: It discovers what is going on around it by using the feelers on its head and tail. It is brutally aggressive.
pokedexAS: Its bite injects a potent poison, enough to paralyze large bird PokÃ©mon that try to prey on it.

name: Whirlipede
pokedexX: Protected by a hard shell, it spins its body like a wheel and crashes furiously into its enemies.
pokedexY: It is usually motionless, but when attacked, it rotates at high speed and then crashes into its opponent.
pokedexOR: Protected by a hard shell, it spins its body like a wheel and crashes furiously into its enemies.
pokedexAS: It is usually motionless, but when attacked, it rotates at high speed and then crashes into its opponent.

name: Scolipede
pokedexX: It clasps its prey with the claws on its neck until it stops moving. Then it finishes it off with deadly poison.
pokedexY: With quick movements, it chases down its foes, attacking relentlessly with its horns until it prevails.
pokedexOR: It clasps its prey with the claws on its neck until it stops moving. Then it finishes it off with deadly poison.
pokedexAS: With quick movements, it chases down its foes, attacking relentlessly with its horns until it prevails.

name: Cottonee
pokedexX: When attacked, it escapes by shooting cotton from its body. The cotton serves as a decoy to distract the attacker.
pokedexY: Perhaps because they feel more at ease in a group, they stick to others they find. They end up looking like a cloud.
pokedexOR: When attacked, it escapes by shooting cotton from its body. The cotton serves as a decoy to distract the attacker.
pokedexAS: Perhaps because they feel more at ease in a group, they stick to others they find. They end up looking like a cloud.

name: Whimsicott
pokedexX: They appear along with whirlwinds. They pull pranks, such as moving furniture and leaving balls of cotton in homes.
pokedexY: Like the wind, it can slip through any gap, no matter how small. It leaves balls of white fluff behind.
pokedexOR: They appear along with whirlwinds. They pull pranks, such as moving furniture and leaving balls of cotton in homes.
pokedexAS: Like the wind, it can slip through any gap, no matter how small. It leaves balls of white fluff behind.

name: Petilil
pokedexX: The leaves on its head are very bitter. Eating one of these leaves is known to refresh a tired body.
pokedexY: Since they prefer moist, nutrient-rich soil, the areas where Petilil live are known to be good for growing plants.
pokedexOR: The leaves on its head are very bitter. Eating one of these leaves is known to refresh a tired body.
pokedexAS: Since they prefer moist, nutrient-rich soil, the areas where Petilil live are known to be good for growing plants.

name: Lilligant
pokedexX: The fragrance if the garland on its head has a relaxing effect. It withers if a trainer does not take good care of it.
pokedexY: Even veteran Trainers face a challenge in getting its beautiful flower to bloom. This PokÃ©mon is popular with celebrities.
pokedexOR: The fragrance of the garland on its head has a relaxing effect. It withers if a Trainer does not take good care of it.
pokedexAS: Even veteran Trainers face a challenge in getting its beautiful flower to bloom. This PokÃ©mon is popular with celebrities.

name: Basculin-Red
pokedexX: Red- and blue-striped Basculin are very violent and always fighting. They are also remarkably tasty.
pokedexY: Red and blue Basculin usually do not get along, but sometimes members of one school mingle with the other's school.
pokedexOR: Red- and blue-striped Basculin are very violent and always fighting. They are also remarkably tasty.
pokedexAS: Red and blue Basculin usually do not get along, but sometimes members of one school mingle with the other's school.

name: Sandile
pokedexX: It moves along below the sand's surface, except for its nose and eyes. A dark membrane shields its eyes from the sun.
pokedexY: They live buried in the sands of the desert. The sun-warmed sands prevent their body temperature from dropping.
pokedexOR: It moves along below the sand's surface, except for its nose and eyes. A dark membrane shields its eyes from the sun.
pokedexAS: They live buried in the sands of the desert. The sun-warmed sands prevent their body temperature from dropping.

name: Krokorok
pokedexX: They live in groups of a few individuals. Protective membranes shield their eyes from sandstorms.
pokedexY: The special membrane covering its eyes can sense the heat of objects, so it can see its surroundings even in darkness.
pokedexOR: They live in groups of a few individuals. Protective membranes shield their eyes from sandstorms.
pokedexAS: The special membrane covering its eyes can sense the heat of objects, so it can see its surroundings even in darkness.

name: Krookodile
pokedexX: Very violent PokÃ©mon, they try to clamp down on anything that moves in front of their eyes.
pokedexY: They never allow prey to escape. Their jaws are so powerful, they can crush the body of an automobile.
pokedexOR: Very violent PokÃ©mon, they try to clamp down on anything that moves in front of their eyes.
pokedexAS: They never allow prey to escape. Their jaws are so powerful, they can crush the body of an automobile.

name: Darumaka
pokedexX: Darumaka's droppings are hot, so people used to put them in their clothes to keep themselves warm.
pokedexY: When it sleeps, it pulls its limbs into its body and its internal fire goes down to 1,100 F.
pokedexOR: Darumaka's droppings are hot, so people used to put them in their clothes to keep themselves warm.
pokedexAS: When it sleeps, it pulls its limbs into its body and its internal fire goes down to 1,100 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: Darmanitan
pokedexX: When one is injured in a fierce battle, it hardens into a stone-like form. Then it meditates and sharpens its mind.
pokedexY: Its internal fire burns at 2,500 degrees Fahrenheit, making enough power that it can destroy a dump truck with one punch.
pokedexOR: When one is injured in a fierce battle, it hardens into a stone-like form. Then it meditates and sharpens its mind.
pokedexAS: Its internal fire burns at 2,500 degrees Fahrenheit, making enough power that it can destroy a dump truck with one punch.

name: Maractus
pokedexX: It uses an up-tempo song and dance to drive away the bird PokÃ©mon that prey on its flower seeds
pokedexY: Arid regions are their habitat. They move rhythmically, making a sound similar to maracas.
pokedexOR: It uses an up-tempo song and dance to drive away the bird PokÃ©mon that prey on its flower seeds.
pokedexAS: Arid regions are their habitat. They move rhythmically, making a sound similar to maracas.

name: Dwebble
pokedexX: It makes a hole in a suitable rock. If that rock breaks, the PokÃ©mon remains agitated until it locates a replacement.
pokedexY: When it finds a stone of a suitable size, it secretes a liquid from its mouth to open up a hole to crawl into.
pokedexOR: It makes a hole in a suitable rock. If that rock breaks, the PokÃ©mon remains agitated until it locates a replacement.
pokedexAS: When it finds a stone of a suitable size, it secretes a liquid from its mouth to open up a hole to crawl into.

name: Crustle
pokedexX: It possesses legs of enormous strength, enabling it to carry heavy slabs for many days, even when crossing arid land.
pokedexY: Competing for territory, Crustle fight viciously. The one whose boulder is broken is the loser of the battle.
pokedexOR: It possesses legs of enormous strength, enabling it to carry heavy slabs for many days, even when crossing arid land.
pokedexAS: Competing for territory, Crustle fight viciously. The one whose boulder is broken is the loser of the battle.

name: Scraggy
pokedexX: Its skin has a rubbery elasticity, so it can reduce damage by defensively pulling its skin up to its neck.
pokedexY: Proud of its sturdy skull, it suddenly headbutts everything, but its weight makes it unstable, too.
pokedexOR: Its skin has a rubbery elasticity, so it can reduce damage by defensively pulling its skin up to its neck.
pokedexAS: Proud of its sturdy skull, it suddenly headbutts everything, but its weight makes it unstable, too.

name: Scrafty
pokedexX: It pulls up its shed skin to protect itself while it kicks. The bigger the crest, the more respected it is.
pokedexY: It can smash concrete blocks with its kicking attacks. The one with the biggest crest is the group leader.
pokedexOR: It pulls up its shed skin to protect itself while it kicks. The bigger the crest, the more respected it is.
pokedexAS: It can smash concrete blocks with its kicking attacks. The one with the biggest crest is the group leader.

name: Sigilyph
pokedexX: The guardians of an ancient city, they use their psychic power to attack enemies that invade their territory.
pokedexY: The guardians of an ancient city, they always fly the same route while keeping watch for invaders.
pokedexOR: The guardians of an ancient city, they use their psychic power to attack enemies that invade their territory.
pokedexAS: The guardians of an ancient city, they always fly the same route while keeping watch for invaders.

name: Yamask
pokedexX: These PokÃ©mon arose from the spirits of people interred in graves. Each retains memories of its former life.
pokedexY: Each of them carries a mask that used to be its face when it was human. Sometimes they look at it and cry.
pokedexOR: These PokÃ©mon arose from the spirits of people interred in graves. Each retains memories of its former life.
pokedexAS: Each of them carries a mask that used to be its face when it was human. Sometimes they look at it and cry.

name: Cofagrigus
pokedexX: It has been said that they swallow those who get too close and turn them into mummies. They like to eat gold nuggets.
pokedexY: Grave robbers who mistake them for real coffins and get too close end up trapped inside their bodies.
pokedexOR: It has been said that they swallow those who get too close and turn them into mummies. They like to eat gold nuggets.
pokedexAS: Grave robbers who mistake them for real coffins and get too close end up trapped inside their bodies.

name: Tirtouga
pokedexX: About 100 million years ago, these PokÃ©mon swam in oceans. It is thought they also went on land to attack prey.
pokedexY: Restored from a fossil, this PokÃ©mon can dive to depths beyond half a mile.
pokedexOR: About 100 million years ago, these PokÃ©mon swam in oceans. It is thought they also went on land to attack prey.
pokedexAS: Restored from a fossil, this PokÃ©mon can dive to depths beyond half a mile.

name: Carracosta
pokedexX: They can live in the ocean and on land. A slap from one of them is enough to open a hole in the bottom of a tanker.
pokedexY: It could knock out a foe with a slap from one of its developed front appendages and chew it up, shell or bones and all.
pokedexOR: They can live both in the ocean and on land. A slap from one of them is enough to open a hole in the bottom of a tanker.
pokedexAS: It could knock out a foe with a slap from one of its developed front appendages and chew it up, shell or bones and all.

name: Archen
pokedexX: Revived from a fossil, this PokÃ©mon is thought to be the ancestor of all bird PokÃ©mon.
pokedexY: Said to be an ancestor of bird PokÃ©mon, they were unable to fly and moved about by hopping from one branch to another.
pokedexOR: Revived from a fossil, this PokÃ©mon is thought to be the ancestor of all bird PokÃ©mon.
pokedexAS: Said to be an ancestor of bird PokÃ©mon, they were unable to fly and moved about by hopping from one branch to another.

name: Archeops
pokedexX: They are intelligent and will cooperate to catch prey. From the ground, they use a running start to take flight.
pokedexY: It runs better than it flies. It takes off into the sky by running at a speed of 25 mph.
pokedexOR: They are intelligent and will cooperate to catch prey. From the ground, they use a running start to take flight.
pokedexAS: It runs better than it flies. It takes off into the sky by running at a speed of 25 mph.

name: Trubbish
pokedexX: The combination of garbage bags and industrial waste caused the chemical reaction that created this PokÃ©mon.
pokedexY: Inhaling the gas they belch will make you sleep for a week. They prefer unsanitary places.
pokedexOR: The combination of garbage bags and industrial waste caused the chemical reaction that created this PokÃ©mon.
pokedexAS: Inhaling the gas they belch will make you sleep for a week. They prefer unsanitary places.

name: Garbodor
pokedexX: It clenches opponents with its left arm and finishes them off with foul-smelling poison gas belched from its mouth.
pokedexY: Consuming garbage makes new kinds of poison gases and liquids inside their bodies.
pokedexOR: It clenches opponents with its left arm and finishes them off with foul-smelling poison gas belched from its mouth.
pokedexAS: Consuming garbage makes new kinds of poison gases and liquids inside their bodies.

name: Zorua
pokedexX: It changes so it looks like its foe, tricks it, and then uses that opportunity to flee.
pokedexY: To protect themselves from danger, they hide their true identities by transforming into people and PokÃ©mon.
pokedexOR: It changes so it looks just like its foe, tricks it, and then uses that opportunity to flee.
pokedexAS: To protect themselves from danger, they hide their true identities by transforming into people and PokÃ©mon.

name: Zoroark
pokedexX: Each has the ability to fool a large group of people simultaneously. They protect their lair with illusory scenery.
pokedexY: Bonds between these PokÃ©mon are very strong.  It protects the safety of its pack by tricking  its opponents.
pokedexOR: Each has the ability to fool a large group of people simultaneously. They protect their lair with illusory scenery.
pokedexAS: Bonds between these PokÃ©mon are very strong. It protects the safety of its pack by tricking its opponents.

name: Minccino
pokedexX: Minccino greet each other by grooming one another thoroughly with their tails
pokedexY: These PokÃ©mon prefer a tidy habitat. They are always sweeping and dusting, using their tails as brooms.
pokedexOR: Minccino greet each other by grooming one another thoroughly with their tails.
pokedexAS: These PokÃ©mon prefer a tidy habitat. They are always sweeping and dusting, using their tails as brooms.

name: Cinccino
pokedexX: Their white fur feels amazing to touch. Their fur repels dust and prevents static electricity from building up.
pokedexY: Cinccino's body is coated in a special oil that helps it deflect attacks, such as punches.
pokedexOR: Their white fur feels amazing to touch. Their fur repels dust and prevents static electricity from building up.
pokedexAS: Cinccino's body is coated in a special oil that helps it deflect attacks, such as punches.

name: Gothita
pokedexX: Their ribbonlike feelers increase their psychic power. They are always staring at something.
pokedexY: They intently observe both Trainers and PokÃ©mon. Apparently, they are looking at something that only Gothita can see.
pokedexOR: Their ribbonlike feelers increase their psychic power. They are always staring at something.
pokedexAS: They intently observe both Trainers and PokÃ©mon. Apparently, they are looking at something that only Gothita can see.

name: Gothorita
pokedexX: Starlight is the source of their power. At night, they mark star positions by using psychic power to float stones.
pokedexY: According to many old tales, it creates friends for itself by controlling sleeping children on starry nights.
pokedexOR: Starlight is the source of their power. At night, they mark star positions by using psychic power to float stones.
pokedexAS: According to many old tales, it creates friends for itself by controlling sleeping children on starry nights.

name: Gothitelle
pokedexX: Starry skies thousands of light-years away are visible in the space distorted by their intense psychic power.
pokedexY: They can predict the future from the placement and movement of the stars. They can see Trainers' life spans.
pokedexOR: Starry skies thousands of light-years away are visible in the space distorted by their intense psychic power.
pokedexAS: They can predict the future from the placement and movement of the stars. They can see Trainers' life spans.

name: Solosis
pokedexX: Because their bodies are enveloped in a special liquid, they are fine in any environment, no matter how severe.
pokedexY: They drive away attackers by unleashing psychic power. They can use telepathy to talk with others.
pokedexOR: Because their bodies are enveloped in a special liquid, they are fine in any environment, no matter how severe.
pokedexAS: They drive away attackers by unleashing psychic power. They can use telepathy to talk with others.

name: Duosion
pokedexX: Since they have two divided brains, at times they suddenly try to take two different actions at once.
pokedexY: When their two divided brains think the same thoughts, their psychic power is maximized.
pokedexOR: Since they have two divided brains, at times they suddenly try to take two different actions at once.
pokedexAS: When their two divided brains think the same thoughts, their psychic power is maximized.

name: Reuniclus
pokedexX: They use psychic power to control their arms, which are made of a special liquid. They can crush boulders psychically.
pokedexY: When Reuniclus shake hands, a network forms between their brains, increasing their psychic power.
pokedexOR: They use psychic power to control their arms, which are made of a special liquid. They can crush boulders psychically.
pokedexAS: When Reuniclus shake hands, a network forms between their brains, increasing their psychic power.

name: Ducklett
pokedexX: When attacked, it uses its feathers to splash water, escaping under cover of the spray.
pokedexY: They are better at swimming than flying, and they happily eat their favorite food, peat moss, as they  dive underwater.
pokedexOR: When attacked, it uses its feathers to splash water, escaping under cover of the spray.
pokedexAS: They are better at swimming than flying, and they happily eat their favorite food, peat moss, as they dive underwater.

name: Swanna
pokedexX: Despite their elegant appearance, they can flap their wings strongly and fly for thousands of miles.
pokedexY: Swanna start to dance at dusk. The one dancing in the middle is the leader of the flock.
pokedexOR: Despite their elegant appearance, they can flap their wings strongly and fly for thousands of miles.
pokedexAS: Swanna start to dance at dusk. The one dancing in the middle is the leader of the flock.

name: Vanillite
pokedexX: The temperature of their breath is -58 degrees Fahrenheit. They create snow crystals and make snow fall in the area around them.
pokedexY: This PokÃ©mon formed from icicles bathed in energy from the morning sun. It sleeps buried in snow.
pokedexOR: The temperature of their breath is -58 degrees Fahrenheit. They create snow crystals and make snow fall in the areas around them.
pokedexAS: This PokÃ©mon formed from icicles bathed in energy from the morning sun. It sleeps buried in snow.

name: Vanillish
pokedexX: They cool down the surrounding air and create ice particles, which they use to freeze their foes.
pokedexY: Snowy mountains are this PokÃ©mon's habitat. During an ancient ice age, they moved to southern areas.
pokedexOR: They cool down the surrounding air and create ice particles, which they use to freeze their foes.
pokedexAS: Snowy mountains are this PokÃ©mon's habitat. During an ancient ice age, they moved to southern areas.

name: Vanilluxe
pokedexX: If both heads get angry simultaneously, this PokÃ©mon expels a blizzard, burying everything in snow.
pokedexY: Swallowing large amounts of water, they make snow clouds inside their bodies and, when angry, cause violent blizzards.
pokedexOR: If both heads get angry simultaneously, this PokÃ©mon expels a blizzard, burying everything in snow.
pokedexAS: Swallowing large amounts of water, they make snow clouds inside their bodies and, when angry, cause violent blizzards.

name: Deerling
pokedexX: Their coloring changes according to the season and can be slightly affected by the temperature and humidity as well.
pokedexY: The turning of the seasons changes the color and scent of this PokÃ©mon's fur. People use it to mark the seasons.
pokedexOR: Their coloring changes according to the seasons and can be slightly affected by the temperature and humidity as well.
pokedexAS: The turning of the seasons changes the color and scent of this PokÃ©mon's fur. People use it to mark the seasons.

name: Sawsbuck
pokedexX: They migrate according to the seasons. People can tell the season by looking at Sawsbuck's horns
pokedexY: They migrate according to the seasons, so some people call Sawsbuck the harbingers of spring.
pokedexOR: They migrate according to the seasons. People can tell the season by looking at Sawsbuck's horns.
pokedexAS: They migrate according to the seasons, so some people call Sawsbuck the harbingers of spring.

name: Emolga
pokedexX: They live on treetops and glide using the inside of a cape-like membrane while discharging electricity.
pokedexY: The energy made in its cheeks' electric pouches is stored inside its membrane and released while it is gliding.
pokedexOR: They live on treetops and glide using the inside of a cape-like membrane while discharging electricity.
pokedexAS: The energy made in its cheeks' electric pouches is stored inside its membrane and released while it is gliding.

name: Karrablast
pokedexX: These mysterious PokÃ©mon evolve when they receive electrical stimulation while they are in the same place as Shelmet.
pokedexY: For some reason they evolve when they receive electrical energy while they are attacking Shelmet.
pokedexOR: These mysterious PokÃ©mon evolve when they receive electrical stimulation while they are in the same place as Shelmet.
pokedexAS: For some reason they evolve when they receive electrical energy while they are attacking Shelmet.

name: Escavalier
pokedexX: Wearing the shell covering they stole from Shelmet, they defend themselves and attack with two lances.
pokedexY: These PokÃ©mon evolve by wearing the shell covering of a Shelmet. The steel armor protects their whole body.
pokedexOR: Wearing the shell covering they stole from Shelmet, they defend themselves and attack with two lances.
pokedexAS: These PokÃ©mon evolve by wearing the shell covering of a Shelmet. The steel armor protects their whole body.

name: Foongus
pokedexX: It lures people in with its PokÃ© Ball pattern, then releases poison spores. Why it resembles a PokÃ© Ball is unknown.
pokedexY: It lures PokÃ©mon with its pattern that looks just like a PokÃ© Ball, then releases poison spores.
pokedexOR: It lures people in with its PokÃ© Ball pattern, then releases poison spores. Why it resembles a PokÃ© Ball is unknown.
pokedexAS: It lures PokÃ©mon with its pattern that looks just like a PokÃ© Ball, then releases poison spores.

name: Amoonguss
pokedexX: They show off their PokÃ© Ball caps to lure prey, but very few PokÃ©mon are fooled by this.
pokedexY: It lures prey close by dancing and waving its arm caps, which resemble PokÃ© Balls, in a swaying motion.
pokedexOR: They show off their PokÃ© Ball caps to lure prey, but very few PokÃ©mon are fooled by this.
pokedexAS: It lures prey close by dancing and waving its arm caps, which resemble PokÃ© Balls, in a swaying motion.

name: Frillish
pokedexX: They paralyze prey with poison, then drag them down to their lairs, five miles below the surface.
pokedexY: If its veil-like arms stun and wrap a foe, that foe will be dragged miles below the surface, never to return.
pokedexOR: They paralyze prey with poison, then drag them down to their lairs, five miles below the surface.
pokedexAS: If its veil-like arms stun and wrap a foe, that foe will be dragged miles below the surface, never to return.

name: Jellicent
pokedexX: Its body is mostly seawater. It's said there's a castle of ships Jellicent have sunk on the seafloor.
pokedexY: The fate of the ships and crew that wander into Jellicent's habitat: all sunken, all lost, all vanished.
pokedexOR: Its body is mostly seawater. It's said there's a castle of ships Jellicent have sunk on the seafloor.
pokedexAS: The fate of the ships and crew that wander into Jellicent's habitat: all sunken, all lost, all vanished.

name: Alomomola
pokedexX: Floating in the open sea is how they live. When they find a wounded PokÃ©mon, they embrace it and bring it to shore.
pokedexY: It gently holds injured and weak PokÃ©mon in its fins. Its special membrane heals their wounds.
pokedexOR: Floating in the open sea is how they live. When they find a wounded PokÃ©mon, they embrace it and bring it to shore.
pokedexAS: It gently holds injured and weak PokÃ©mon in its fins. Its special membrane heals their wounds.

name: Joltik
pokedexX: Since it can't generate its own electricity, it sticks onto large-bodied PokÃ©mon and absorbs static electricity.
pokedexY: They attach themselves to large-bodied PokÃ©mon and absorbs static electricity, which they store in an electric pouch.
pokedexOR: Since it can't generate its own electricity, it sticks onto large-bodied PokÃ©mon and absorbs static electricity.
pokedexAS: They attach themselves to large-bodied PokÃ©mon and absorb static electricity, which they store in an electric pouch.

name: Galvantula
pokedexX: They employ an electrically charged web to trap their prey. While it is immobilized by shock, they leisurely consume it.
pokedexY: When attacked, they create an electric barrier by spitting out many electrically charged threads.
pokedexOR: They employ an electrically charged web to trap their prey. While it is immobilized by shock, they leisurely consume it.
pokedexAS: When attacked, they create an electric barrier by spitting out many electrically charged threads.

name: Ferroseed
pokedexX: When threatened, it attacks by shooting a barrage of spikes, which gives it a chance to escape by rolling away.
pokedexY: It absorbs the iron it finds in the rock while clinging to the ceiling. It shoots spikes when in danger.
pokedexOR: When threatened, it attacks by shooting a barrage of spikes, which gives it a chance to escape by rolling away.
