pokedexAS: It absorbs the iron it finds in the rock while clinging to the ceiling. It shoots spikes when in danger.

name: Ferrothorn
pokedexX: By swinging around its three spiky feelers and shooting spikes, it can obliterate an opponent.
pokedexY: They attach themselves to cave ceilings, firing steel spikes at targets passing beneath them.
pokedexOR: By swinging around its three spiky feelers and shooting spikes, it can obliterate an opponent.
pokedexAS: They attach themselves to cave ceilings, firing steel spikes at targets passing beneath them.

name: Klink
pokedexX: Interlocking two bodies and spinning around generates the energy they need to live.
pokedexY: The two minigears that mesh together are predetermined. Each will rebound from other minigears without meshing.
pokedexOR: Interlocking two bodies and spinning around generates the energy they need to live.
pokedexAS: The two minigears that mesh together are predetermined. Each will rebound from other minigears without meshing.

name: Klang
pokedexX: By changing the direction in which it rotates, it communicates its feeling to others. When angry, it rotates faster.
pokedexY: A minigear and big gear comprise its body. If the minigear it launches at a foe doesn't return, it will die.
pokedexOR: By changing the direction in which it rotates, it communicates its feelings to others. When angry, it rotates faster.
pokedexAS: A minigear and big gear comprise its body. If the minigear it launches at a foe doesn't return, it will die.

name: Klinklang
pokedexX: The gear with the red core is rotated at high speed for a rapid energy charge.
pokedexY: Its red core functions as an energy tank. It fires the charged energy through its spikes into an area.
pokedexOR: The gear with the red core is rotated at high speed for a rapid energy charge.
pokedexAS: Its red core functions as an energy tank. It fires the charged energy through its spikes into an area.

name: Tynamo
pokedexX: While one alone doesn't have much power, a chain of many Tynamo can be as powerful as lightning.
pokedexY: One alone can emit only a trickle of electricity, so a group of them gathers to unleash a powerful electric shock.
pokedexOR: While one alone doesn't have much power, a chain of many Tynamo can be as powerful as lightning.
pokedexAS: One alone can emit only a trickle of electricity, so a group of them gathers to unleash a powerful electric shock.

name: Eelektrik
pokedexX: It wraps itself around its prey and paralyzes it with electricity from the round spots on its sides. Then it chomps.
pokedexY: These PokÃ©mon have a big appetite. When they spot their prey, they attack it and paralyze it with electricity.
pokedexOR: It wraps itself around its prey and paralyzes it with electricity from the round spots on its sides. Then it chomps.
pokedexAS: These PokÃ©mon have a big appetite. When they spot their prey, they attack it and paralyze it with electricity.

name: Eelektross
pokedexX: With their sucker mouths, they suck in prey. Then they use their fangs to shock the prey with electricity.
pokedexY: They crawl out of the ocean using their arms. They will attack prey on shore and immediately drag it into the ocean.
pokedexOR: With their sucker mouths, they suck in prey. Then they use their fangs to shock the prey with electricity.
pokedexAS: They crawl out of the ocean using their arms. They will attack prey on shore and immediately drag it into the ocean.

name: Elgyem
pokedexX: It uses its strong psychic power to squeeze its opponent's brain, causing unendurable headaches.
pokedexY: Rumors of its origin are linked to a UFO crash site in the desert 50 years ago.
pokedexOR: It uses its strong psychic power to squeeze its opponent's brain, causing unendurable headaches.
pokedexAS: Rumors of its origin are linked to a UFO crash site in the desert 50 years ago.

name: Beheeyem
pokedexX: Apparently, it communicates by flashing its three fingers, but those patterns haven't been decoded.
pokedexY: It uses psychic power to control an opponent's brain and tamper with its memories.
pokedexOR: Apparently, it communicates by flashing its three fingers, but those patterns haven't been decoded.
pokedexAS: It uses psychic power to control an opponent's brain and tamper with its memories.

name: Litwick
pokedexX: While shining a light and pretending to be a guide, it leeches off the life force of any who follow it.
pokedexY: Litwick shines a light that absorbs the life energy of people and PokÃ©mon, which becomes the fuel that it burns.
pokedexOR: While shining a light and pretending to be a guide, it leeches off the life force of any who follow it.
pokedexAS: Litwick shines a light that absorbs the life energy of people and PokÃ©mon, which becomes the fuel that it burns.

name: Lampent
pokedexX: The spirits it absorbs fuel its baleful fire. It hangs around hospitals waiting for people to pass on.
pokedexY: It arrives near the moment of death and steals spirit from the body.
pokedexOR: The spirits it absorbs fuel its baleful fire. It hangs around hospitals waiting for people to pass on.
pokedexAS: It arrives near the moment of death and steals spirit from the body.

name: Chandelure
pokedexX: Being consumed in Chandelure's flame burns up the spirit, leaving the body behind.
pokedexY: The spirits burned up in its ominous flame lose their way and wander this world forever.
pokedexOR: Being consumed in Chandelure's flame burns up the spirit, leaving the body behind.
pokedexAS: The spirits burned up in its ominous flame lose their way and wander this world forever.

name: Axew
pokedexX: They use their tusks to crush the berries they eat. Repeated regrowth makes their tusks strong and sharp.
pokedexY: They mark their territory by leaving gashes in trees with their tusks. If a tusk breaks, a new one grows in quickly.
pokedexOR: They use their tusks to crush the berries they eat. Repeated regrowth makes their tusks strong and sharp.
pokedexAS: They mark their territory by leaving gashes in trees with their tusks. If a tusk breaks, a new one grows in quickly.

name: Fraxure
pokedexX: Their tusks can shatter rocks. Territory battles between Fraxure can be intensely violent.
pokedexY: A broken tusk will not grow back, so it diligently sharpens its tusks on river rocks after the end of a battle.
pokedexOR: Their tusks can shatter rocks. Territory battles between Fraxure can be intensely violent.
pokedexAS: A broken tusk will not grow back, so it diligently sharpens its tusks on river rocks after the end of a battle.

name: Haxorus
pokedexX: They are kind but can be relentless when defending territory. They challenge foes with tusks that can cut steel.
pokedexY: Their sturdy tusks will stay sharp even if used to cut steel beams. These PokÃ©mon are covered in hard armor.
pokedexOR: They are kind but can be relentless when defending territory. They challenge foes with tusks that can cut steel.
pokedexAS: Their sturdy tusks will stay sharp even if used to cut steel beams. These PokÃ©mon are covered in hard armor.

name: Cubchoo
pokedexX: Its nose is always running. It sniffs the snot back up because the mucus provides the raw material for its moves.
pokedexY: Their snot is a barometer of health. When healthly, their snot is sticky and the power of their ice moves increases.
pokedexOR: Its nose is always running. It sniffs the snot back up because the mucus provides the raw material for its moves.
pokedexAS: Their snot is a barometer of health. When healthy, their snot is sticky and the power of their ice moves increases.

name: Beartic
pokedexX: They love the cold seas of the north. They create pathways across the ocean waters by freezing their own breath.
pokedexY: It freezes its breath to create fangs and claws of ice to fight with. Cold northern areas are its habitat.
pokedexOR: They love the cold seas of the north. They create pathways across the ocean waters by freezing their own breath.
pokedexAS: It freezes its breath to create fangs and claws of ice to fight with. Cold northern areas are its habitat.

name: Cryogonal
pokedexX: They are born in snow clouds. They use chains made of ice crystals to capture prey.
pokedexY: They are composed of ice crystals. They capture prey with chains of ice, freezing the prey at -148 degrees Fahrenheit.
pokedexOR: They are born in snow clouds. They use chains made of ice crystals to capture prey.
pokedexAS: They are composed of ice crystals. They capture prey with chains of ice, freezing the prey at -148 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: Shelmet
pokedexX: When it and Karrablast are together, and both receive electrical stimulation, they both evolve.
pokedexY: It evolves when bathed in an electric-like energy along with Karrablast. The reason is still unknown.
pokedexOR: When it and Karrablast are together, and both receive electrical stimulation, they both evolve.
pokedexAS: It evolves when bathed in an electric-like energy along with Karrablast. The reason is still unknown.

name: Accelgor
pokedexX: Having removed its heavy shell, it becomes very light and can fight with ninja-like movements.
pokedexY: When its body dries out, it weakens. So, to prevent dehydration, it wraps itself in many layers of thin membrane.
pokedexOR: Having removed its heavy shell, it becomes very light and can fight with ninja-like movements.
pokedexAS: When its body dries out, it weakens. So, to prevent dehydration, it wraps itself in many layers of thin membrane.

name: Stunfisk
pokedexX: Its skin is very hard, so it is unhurt even if stepped on by sumo wrestlers. It smiles when transmitting electricity.
pokedexY: It conceals itself in the mud of the seashore. Then it waits. When prey touch it, it delivers a jolt of electricity.
pokedexOR: Its skin is very hard, so it is unhurt even if stepped on by sumo wrestlers. It smiles when transmitting electricity.
pokedexAS: It conceals itself in the mud of the seashore. Then it waits. When prey touch it, it delivers a jolt of electricity.

name: Mienfoo
pokedexX: It takes pride in the speed at which it can use moves. What it loses in power, it makes up for in quantity.
pokedexY: In fights, they dominate with onslaughts of flowing, continuous attacks. With their sharp claws, they cut enemies.
pokedexOR: It takes pride in the speed at which it can use moves. What it loses in power, it makes up for in quantity.
pokedexAS: In fights, they dominate with onslaughts of flowing, continuous attacks. With their sharp claws, they cut enemies.

name: Mienshao
pokedexX: It wields the fur on its arms like a whip. Its arm attacks come with such rapidity that they cannot ever be seen.
pokedexY: Using the long fur on its arms like whips, it launches into combo attacks that, once started, no one can stop.
pokedexOR: It wields the fur on its arms like a whip. Its arm attacks come with such rapidity that they cannot even be seen.
pokedexAS: Using the long fur on its arms like whips, it launches into combo attacks that, once started, no one can stop.

name: Druddigon
pokedexX: It races through narrow caves, using its sharp claws to catch prey. The skin on its face is harder than a rock.
pokedexY: It warms its body by absorbing sunlight with its wings. When its body temperature falls, it can no longer move.
pokedexOR: It races through narrow caves, using its sharp claws to catch prey. The skin on its face is harder than a rock.
pokedexAS: It warms its body by absorbing sunlight with its wings. When its body temperature falls, it can no longer move.

name: Golett
pokedexX: The energy that burns inside it enables it to move, but no one has yet been able to identify this energy.
pokedexY: Ancient science fashioned this PokÃ©mon from clay. It's been active for thousands of years.
pokedexOR: The energy that burns inside it enables it to move, but no one has yet been able to identify this energy.
pokedexAS: Ancient science fashioned this PokÃ©mon from clay. It's been active for thousands of years.

name: Golurk
pokedexX: It is said that Golurk were ordered to protect people and PokÃ©mon by the ancient people who made them.
pokedexY: It flies across the sky at Mach speeds. Removing the seal on its chest makes its internal energy go out of control.
pokedexOR: It is said that Golurk were ordered to protect people and PokÃ©mon by the ancient people who made them.
pokedexAS: It flies across the sky at Mach speeds. Removing the seal on its chest makes its internal energy go out of control.

name: Pawniard
pokedexX: Blades comprise this PokÃ©mon's entire body.  If battling dulls the blades, it sharpens them on stones by the river.
pokedexY: Ignoring their injuries, groups attack by sinking the blades that cover their bodies into their prey.
pokedexOR: Blades comprise this PokÃ©mon's entire body. If battling dulls the blades, it sharpens them on stones by the river.
pokedexAS: Ignoring their injuries, groups attack by sinking the blades that cover their bodies into their prey.

name: Bisharp
pokedexX: The pitiless PokÃ©mon commands a group of Pawniard to hound prey into immobility. It then moves in to finish the prey off.
pokedexY: Bisharp pursues prey in the company of a large group of Pawniard. Then Bisharp finishes off the prey.
pokedexOR: This pitiless PokÃ©mon commands a group of Pawniard to hound prey into immobility. It then moves in to finish the prey off.
pokedexAS: Bisharp pursues prey in the company of a large group of Pawniard. Then Bisharp finishes off the prey.

name: Bouffalant
pokedexX: They charge wildly and headbutt everything. Their headbutts have enough destructive force to derail a train.
pokedexY: Their fluffy fur absorbs damage, even if they strike foes with a fierce headbutt.
pokedexOR: They charge wildly and headbutt everything. Their headbutts have enough destructive force to derail a train.
pokedexAS: Their fluffy fur absorbs damage, even if they strike foes with a fierce headbutt.

name: Rufflet
pokedexX: They crush berries with their talons. They bravely stand up to any opponent, no matter how strong it is.
pokedexY: They will challenge anything, even strong opponents, without fear. Their frequent fights help them become stronger.
pokedexOR: They crush berries with their talons. They bravely stand up to any opponent, no matter how strong it is.
pokedexAS: They will challenge anything, even strong opponents, without fear. Their frequent fights help them become stronger.

name: Braviary
pokedexX: For the sake of its friends, this brave warrior of the sky will not stop battling, even if injured.
pokedexY: They fight for their friends without any thought about danger to themselves. One can carry a car while flying.
pokedexOR: For the sake of its friends, this brave warrior of the sky will not stop battling, even if injured.
pokedexAS: They fight for their friends without any thought about danger to themselves. One can carry a car while flying.

name: Vullaby
pokedexX: Its wings are too tiny to allow it to fly. As the time approaches for it to evolve, it discards the bones it was wearing.
pokedexY: Their wings are too tiny to allow them to fly. They guard their posteriors with bones that were gathered by Mandibuzz.
pokedexOR: Its wings are too tiny to allow it to fly. As the time approaches for it to evolve, it discards the bones it was wearing.
pokedexAS: Their wings are too tiny to allow them to fly. They guard their posteriors with bones that were gathered by Mandibuzz.

name: Mandibuzz
pokedexX: They fly in circles around the sky. When they spot prey, they attack and carry it back to their nest with ease.
pokedexY: Watching from the sky, they swoop to strike weakened PokÃ©mon on the ground. They decorate themselves with bones.
pokedexOR: They fly in circles around the sky. When they spot prey, they attack and carry it back to their nest with ease.
pokedexAS: Watching from the sky, they swoop to strike weakened PokÃ©mon on the ground. They decorate themselves with bones.

name: Heatmor
pokedexX: Using their very hot, flame-covered tongues, they burn through Durant's steel bodies and consume their insides.
pokedexY: It draws in air through its tail, transforms it into fire, and uses it like a tongue. It melts Durant and eats them.
pokedexOR: Using their very hot, flame-covered tongues, they burn through Durant's steel bodies and consume their insides.
pokedexAS: It draws in air through its tail, transforms it into fire, and uses it like a tongue. It melts Durant and eats them.

name: Durant
pokedexX: Individuals each play different roles in driving Heatmor, their natural predator, away from their colony.
pokedexY: They attack in groups, covering themselves in steel armor to protect themselves from Heatmor.
pokedexOR: Individuals each play different roles in driving Heatmor, their natural predator, away from their colony.
pokedexAS: They attack in groups, covering themselves in steel armor to protect themselves from Heatmor.

name: Deino
pokedexX: They cannot see, so they tackle and bite to learn about their surroundings. Their bodies are covered in wounds
pokedexY: Lacking sight, it's unaware of its surroundings, so it bumps into things and eats anything that moves.
pokedexOR: They cannot see, so they tackle and bite to learn about their surroundings. Their bodies are covered in wounds.
pokedexAS: Lacking sight, it's unaware of its surroundings, so it bumps into things and eats anything that moves.

name: Zweilous
pokedexX: The two heads do not get along. Whichever head eats more than the other gets to be the leader.
pokedexY: After it has eaten up all the food in its territory, it moves to another area. Its two heads do not get along.
pokedexOR: The two heads do not get along. Whichever head eats more than the other gets to be the leader.
pokedexAS: After it has eaten up all the food in its territory, it moves to another area. Its two heads do not get along.

name: Hydreigon
pokedexX: The heads on their arms do not have brains. They use all three heads to consume and destroy everything.
pokedexY: It responds to movement by attacking. This scary, three-headed PokÃ©mon devours everything in its path!
pokedexOR: The heads on their arms do not have brains. They use all three heads to consume and destroy everything.
pokedexAS: It responds to movement by attacking. This scary, three-headed PokÃ©mon devours everything in its path!

name: Larvesta
pokedexX: Said to have been born from the sun, it spews fire from its horns and encases itself in a cocoon of fire when it evolves.
pokedexY: The base of volcanoes is where they make their homes. They shoot fire from their five horns to repel attacking enemies.
pokedexOR: Said to have been born from the sun, it spews fire from its horns and encases itself in a cocoon of fire when it evolves.
pokedexAS: The base of volcanoes is where they make their homes. They shoot fire from their five horns to repel attacking enemies.

name: Volcarona
pokedexX: A sea of fire engulfs the surroundings of their battles, since they use their six wings to scatter their ember scales.
pokedexY: When volcanic ash darkened the atmosphere, it is said that Volcarona's fire provided a replacement for the sun.
pokedexOR: A sea of fire engulfs the surroundings of their battles, since they use their six wings to scatter their ember scales.
pokedexAS: When volcanic ash darkened the atmosphere, it is said that Volcarona's fire provided a replacement for the sun.

name: Cobalion
pokedexX: It has a body and heart of steel. Its glare is sufficient to make even an unruly PokÃ©mon obey it.
pokedexY: It has a body and heart of steel. It worked with its allies to punish people when they hurt PokÃ©mon.
pokedexOR: It has a body and heart of steel. Its glare is sufficient to make even an unruly PokÃ©mon obey it.
pokedexAS: It has a body and heart of steel. It worked with its allies to punish people when they hurt PokÃ©mon.

name: Terrakion
pokedexX: Its charge is strong enough to break through a giant castle wall in one blow. This PokÃ©mon is spoken of in legends.
pokedexY: Spoken of in legend, this PokÃ©mon used its phenomenal power to destroy a castle in its effort to protect PokÃ©mon.
pokedexOR: Its charge is strong enough to break through a giant castle wall in one blow. This PokÃ©mon is spoken of in legends.
pokedexAS: Spoken of in legend, this PokÃ©mon used its phenomenal power to destroy a castle in its effort to protect PokÃ©mon.

name: Virizion
pokedexX: Its head sprouts horns as sharp as blades. Using whirlwind-like movements, it confounds and swiftly cuts opponents.
pokedexY: Legends say this PokÃ©mon confounded opponents with its swift movements.
pokedexOR: Its head sprouts horns as sharp as blades. Using whirlwind-like movements, it confounds and swiftly cuts opponents.
pokedexAS: Legends say this PokÃ©mon confounded opponents with its swift movements.

name: Tornadus-Incarnate
pokedexX: The lower half of its body is wrapped in a cloud of energy. It zooms through the sky at 200 mph.
pokedexY: Tornadus expels massive energy from its tail, causing severe storms. Its power is great enough to blow houses away.
pokedexOR: The lower half of its body is wrapped in a cloud of energy. It zooms through the sky at 200 mph.
pokedexAS: Tornadus expels massive energy from its tail, causing severe storms. Its power is great enough to blow houses away.

name: Thundurus-Incarnate
pokedexX: The spikes on its tail discharge immense bolts of lightning. It flies around the Unova region firing off lightning bolts.
pokedexY: As it flies around, it shoots lightning all over the place and causes forest fires. It is therefore disliked.
pokedexOR: The spikes on its tail discharge immense bolts of lightning. It flies around the Unova region firing off lightning bolts.
pokedexAS: As it flies around, it shoots lightning all over the place and causes forest fires. It is therefore disliked.

name: Reshiram
pokedexX: This legendary PokÃ©mon can scorch the world with fire. It helps those who want to build a world of truth.
pokedexY: When Reshiram's tail flares, the heat energy moves the atmosphere and changes the world's weather.
pokedexOR: This legendary PokÃ©mon can scorch the world with fire. It helps those who want to build a world of truth.
pokedexAS: When Reshiram's tail flares, the heat energy moves the atmosphere and changes the world's weather.

name: Zekrom
pokedexX: This legendary PokÃ©mon can scorch the world with lightning. It assists those who want to build an ideal world.
pokedexY: Concealing itself in lightning clouds, it flies throughout the Unova region. It creates electricity in its tail.
pokedexOR: This legendary PokÃ©mon can scorch the world with lightning. It assists those who want to build an ideal world.
pokedexAS: Concealing itself in lightning clouds, it flies throughout the Unova region. It creates electricity in its tail.

name: Landorus-Incarnate
pokedexX: Lands visited by Landorus grant such bountiful crops that it has been hailed as "The Guardian of the Fields."
pokedexY: From the forces of lightning and wind, it creates energy to give nutrients to the soil and make the land abundant.
pokedexOR: Lands visited by Landorus grant such bountiful crops that it has been hailed as "The Guardian of the Fields."
pokedexAS: From the forces of lightning and wind, it creates energy to give nutrients to the soil and make the land abundant.

name: Kyurem
pokedexX: This legendary ice PokÃ©mon waits for a hero to fill in the missing parts of its body with truth or ideals.
pokedexY: It generates a powerful, freezing energy inside itself, but its body became frozen when the energy leaked out.
pokedexOR: This legendary ice PokÃ©mon waits for a hero to fill in the missing parts of its body with truth or ideals.
pokedexAS: It generates a powerful, freezing energy inside itself, but its body became frozen when the energy leaked out.

name: Keldeo
pokedexX: It crosses the world, running over the surfaces of oceans and rivers. It appears at scenic waterfronts.
pokedexY: When it is resolute, its body fills with power and it becomes swifter. Its jumps are then too fast to follow.
pokedexOR: It crosses the world, running over the surfaces of oceans and rivers. It appears at scenic waterfronts.
pokedexAS: When it is resolute, its body fills with power and it becomes swifter. Its jumps are then too fast to follow.

name: Meloetta-Aria
pokedexX: The melodies sung by Meloetta have the power to make PokÃ©mon that hear them happy or sad.
pokedexY: Its melodies are sung with a special vocalization method that can control the feelings of those who hear it.
pokedexOR: The melodies sung by Meloetta have the power to make PokÃ©mon that hear them happy or sad.
pokedexAS: Its melodies are sung with a special vocalization method that can control the feelings of those who hear it.

name: Genesect
pokedexX: This ancient bug PokÃ©mon was altered by Team Plasma. They upgraded the cannon on its back.
pokedexY: This PokÃ©mon existed 300 million years ago. Team Plasma altered it and attached a cannon to its back.
pokedexOR: This ancient bug PokÃ©mon was altered by Team Plasma. They upgraded the cannon on its back.
pokedexAS: This PokÃ©mon existed 300 million years ago. Team Plasma altered it and attached a cannon to its back.

name: Chespin
pokedexX: The quills on its head are usually soft. When it flexes them, the points become so hard and sharp that they can pierce rock.
pokedexY: Such a thick shell of wood covers its head and back that even a direct hit from a truck wouldn't faze it.
pokedexOR: The quills on its head are usually soft. When it flexes them, the points become so hard and sharp that they can pierce rock.
pokedexAS: Such a thick shell of wood covers its head and back that even a direct hit from a truck wouldn't faze it.

name: Quilladin
pokedexX: It relies on its sturdy shell to deflect predators' attacks. It counterattacks with its sharp quills.
pokedexY: They strengthen their lower bodies by running into one another. They are very kind and won't start fights.
pokedexOR: It relies on its sturdy shell to deflect predators' attacks. It counterattacks with its sharp quills.
pokedexAS: They strengthen their lower bodies by running into one another. They are very kind and won't start fights.

name: Chesnaught
pokedexX: Its Tackle is forceful enough to flip a 50-ton tank. It shields its allies from danger with its own body.
pokedexY: When it takes a defensive posture with its fists guarding its face, it could withstand a bomb blast.
pokedexOR: Its Tackle is forceful enough to flip a 50-ton tank. It shields its allies from danger with its own body.
pokedexAS: When it takes a defensive posture with its fists guarding its face, it could withstand a bomb blast.

name: Fennekin
pokedexX: Eating a twig fills it with energy,  and its roomy ears give vent to air  hotter than 390 degrees Fahrenheit.
pokedexY: As it walks, it munches on a twig in place of a snack. It intimidates opponents by puffing hot air out of its ears.
pokedexOR: Eating a twig fills it with energy, and its roomy ears give vent to air hotter than 390 degrees Fahrenheit.
pokedexAS: As it walks, it munches on a twig in place of a snack. It intimidates opponents by puffing hot air out of its ears.

name: Braixen
pokedexX: It has a twig stuck in its tail. With  friction from its tail fur, it sets the  twig on fire and launches into battle.
pokedexY: When the twig is plucked from its tail, friction sets the twig alight. The flame is used to send signals to its allies.
pokedexOR: It has a twig stuck in its tail. With friction from its tail fur, it sets the twig on fire and launches into battle.
pokedexAS: When the twig is plucked from its tail, friction sets the twig alight. The flame is used to send signals to its allies.

name: Delphox
pokedexX: It gazes into the flame at the tip of its branch to achieve a focused state, which allows it to see into the future.
pokedexY: Using psychic power, it generates a fiery vortex of 5,400 degrees Fahrenheit, incinerating foes swept into this whirl of flame.
pokedexOR: It gazes into the flame at the tip of its branch to achieve a focused state, which allows it to see into the future.
pokedexAS: Using psychic power, it generates a fiery vortex of 5,400 degrees Fahrenheit, incinerating foes swept into this whirl of flame.

name: Froakie
pokedexX: It secretes flexible bubbles from its chest and back. The bubbles reduce the damage it would otherwise take when attacked.
pokedexY: It protects its skin by covering its body in delicate bubbles. Beneath its happy-go-lucky air, it keeps a watchful eye on its surroundings.
pokedexOR: It secretes flexible bubbles from its chest and back. The bubbles reduce the damage it would otherwise take when attacked.
pokedexAS: It protects its skin by covering its body in delicate bubbles. Beneath its happy-go-lucky air, it keeps a watchful eye on its surroundings.

name: Frogadier
pokedexX: It can throw bubble-covered pebbles with precise control, hitting empty cans up to a hundred feet away.
pokedexY: Its swiftness is unparalleled. It can scale a tower of more than 2,000 feet in a minute's time.
pokedexOR: It can throw bubble-covered pebbles with precise control, hitting empty cans up to a hundred feet away.
pokedexAS: Its swiftness is unparalleled. It can scale a tower of more than 2,000 feet in a minute's time.

name: Greninja
pokedexX: It creates throwing stars out of compressed water. When it spins them and throws them at high speed, these stars can split metal in two.
pokedexY: It appears and vanishes with a ninja's grace. It toys with its enemies using swift movements, while slicing them with throwing stars of sharpest water.
pokedexOR: It creates throwing stars out of compressed water. When it spins them and throws them at high speed, these stars can split metal in two.
pokedexAS: It appears and vanishes with a ninja's grace. It toys with its enemies using swift movements, while slicing them with throwing stars of sharpest water.

name: Bunnelby
pokedexX: They use their large ears to dig burrows.  They will dig the whole night through.
pokedexY: It has ears like shovels. Digging holes strengthens its ears so much that they can sever thick roots effortlessly.
pokedexOR: They use their large ears to dig burrows. They will dig the whole night through.
pokedexAS: It has ears like shovels. Digging holes strengthens its ears so much that they can sever thick roots effortlessly.

name: Diggersby
pokedexX: With their powerful ears, they can heft boulders of a ton or more with ease. They can be a big help at construction sites.
pokedexY: As powerful as an excavator, its ears can reduce dense bedrock to rubble. When it's finished digging, it lounges lazily.
pokedexOR: With their powerful ears, they can heft boulders of a ton or more with ease. They can be a big help at construction sites.
pokedexAS: As powerful as an excavator, its ears can reduce dense bedrock to rubble. When it's finished digging, it lounges lazily.

name: Fletchling
pokedexX: These friendly PokÃ©mon send signals to one another with beautiful chirps and tail-feather movements.
pokedexY: Despite the beauty of its lilting voice, it's merciless to intruders that enter its territory.
pokedexOR: These friendly PokÃ©mon send signals to one another with beautiful chirps and tail-feather movements.
pokedexAS: Despite the beauty of its lilting voice, it's merciless to intruders that enter its territory.

name: Fletchinder
pokedexX: From its beak, it expels embers that set  the tall grass on fire. Then it pounces on  the bewildered prey that pop out of the grass.
pokedexY: The hotter the flame sac on its belly, the faster it can fly, but it takes some time to get the fire going.
pokedexOR: From its beak, it expels embers that set the tall grass on fire. Then it pounces on the bewildered prey that pop out of the grass.
pokedexAS: The hotter the flame sac on its belly, the faster it can fly, but it takes some time to get the fire going.

name: Talonflame
pokedexX: In the fever of an exciting battle, it showers embers from the gaps between its feathers and takes to the air.
pokedexY: When attacking prey, it can reach speeds of up to 310 mph. It finishes its prey off with a colossal kick.
pokedexOR: In the fever of an exciting battle, it showers embers from the gaps between its feathers and takes to the air.
pokedexAS: When attacking prey, it can reach speeds of up to 310 mph. It finishes its prey off with a colossal kick.

name: Scatterbug
pokedexX: When under attack from bird PokÃ©mon, it spews a poisonous black powder that causes paralysis on contact.
pokedexY: The powder that covers its body regulates its temperature, so it can live in any region or climate.
pokedexOR: When under attack from bird PokÃ©mon, it spews a poisonous black powder that causes paralysis on contact.
pokedexAS: The powder that covers its body regulates its temperature, so it can live in any region or climate.

name: Spewpa
pokedexX: It lives hidden within thicket shadows. When predators attack, it quickly bristles the fur  covering its body in an effort to threaten them.
pokedexY: The beaks of bird PokÃ©mon can't begin to scratch its stalwart body. To defend itself, it spews powder.
pokedexOR: It lives hidden within thicket shadows. When predators attack, it quickly bristles the fur covering its body in an effort to threaten them.
pokedexAS: The beaks of bird PokÃ©mon can't begin to scratch its stalwart body. To defend itself, it spews powder.

name: Vivillon
pokedexX: Vivillon with many different patterns are  found all over the world. These patterns  are affected by the climate of their habitat.
pokedexY: The patterns on this PokÃ©mon's wings depend on the climate and topography of its habitat. It scatters colorful scales.
pokedexOR: Vivillon with many different patterns are found all over the world. These patterns are affected by the climate of their habitat.
pokedexAS: The patterns on this PokÃ©mon's wings depend on the climate and topography of its habitat. It scatters colorful scales.

name: Litleo
pokedexX: The stronger the opponent it faces, the more heat surges from its mane and the more power flows through its body.
pokedexY: They set off on their own from their pride and live by themselves to become stronger. These hot-blooded PokÃ©mon are quick to fight.
pokedexOR: The stronger the opponent it faces, the more heat surges from its mane and the more power flows through its body.
pokedexAS: They set off on their own from their pride and live by themselves to become stronger. These hot-blooded PokÃ©mon are quick to fight.

name: Pyroar
pokedexX: The male with the largest mane of fire is the leader of the pride.
pokedexY: With fiery breath of more than 10,000 degrees Fahrenheit, they viciously threaten any challenger. The females protect the pride's cubs.
pokedexOR: The male with the largest mane of fire is the leader of the pride.
pokedexAS: With fiery breath of more than 10,000 degrees Fahrenheit, they viciously threaten any challenger. The females protect the pride's cubs.

name: FlabÃ©bÃ©
pokedexX: It draws out and controls the hidden power of flowers. The flower FlabÃ©bÃ© holds is most likely part of its body.
pokedexY: When it finds a flower it likes, it dwells on that flower its whole life long. It floats in the wind's embrace with an untroubled heart.
pokedexOR: It draws out and controls the hidden power of flowers. The flower FlabÃ©bÃ© holds is most likely part of its body.
pokedexAS: When it finds a flower it likes, it dwells on that flower its whole life long. It floats in the wind's embrace with an untroubled heart.

name: Floette
pokedexX: It flutters around fields of flowers and cares for flowers that are starting to wilt. It draws out the power of flowers to battle.
pokedexY: When the flowers of a well-tended flower bed bloom, it appears and celebrates with an elegant dance.
pokedexOR: It flutters around fields of flowers and cares for flowers that are starting to wilt. It draws out the power of flowers to battle.
pokedexAS: When the flowers of a well-tended flower bed bloom, it appears and celebrates with an elegant dance.

name: Florges
pokedexX: It claims exquisite flower gardens as its territory, and it obtains power from basking in the energy emitted by flowering plants.
pokedexY: In times long past, governors of castles would invite Florges to create flower gardens to embellish the castle domains.
pokedexOR: It claims exquisite flower gardens as its territory, and it obtains power from basking in the energy emitted by flowering plants.
pokedexAS: In times long past, governors of castles would invite Florges to create flower gardens to embellish the castle domains.

name: Skiddo
pokedexX: Thought to be one of the first PokÃ©mon to live in harmony with humans, it has a placid disposition.
pokedexY: If it has sunshine and water, it doesnt need to eat, because it can generate energy from the leaves on its back.
pokedexOR: Thought to be one of the first PokÃ©mon to live in harmony with humans, it has a placid disposition.
pokedexAS: If it has sunshine and water, it doesn't need to eat, because it can generate energy from the leaves on its back.

name: Gogoat
pokedexX: It can tell how its Trainer is feeling by subtle shifts in the grip on its horns. This empathic sense lets them run as if one being.
pokedexY: They inhabit mountainous regions. The leader of the herd is decided by a battle of clashing horns.
pokedexOR: It can tell how its Trainer is feeling by subtle shifts in the grip on its horns. This empathic sense lets them run as if one being.
pokedexAS: They inhabit mountainous regions. The leader of the herd is decided by a battle of clashing horns.

name: Pancham
pokedexX: It does its best to be taken seriously by its enemies, but its glare is not sufficiently intimidating. Chewing on a leaf is its trademark.
pokedexY: It does its level best to glare and pull a scary face, but it can't help grinning if anyone pats its head.
pokedexOR: It does its best to be taken seriously by its enemies, but its glare is not sufficiently intimidating. Chewing on a leaf is its trademark.
pokedexAS: It does its level best to glare and pull a scary face, but it can't help grinning if anyone pats its head.

name: Pangoro
pokedexX: Although it posses a violent temperament, it won't put up with bullying. It uses the leaf in its mouth to sense the movements of its enemies.
pokedexY: It charges ahead and bashes its opponents like a berserker, uncaring about any hits it might take. Its arms are mighty enough to snap a telephone pole.
pokedexOR: Although it possesses a violent temperament, it won't put up with bullying. It uses the leaf in its mouth to sense the movements of its enemies.
pokedexAS: It charges ahead and bashes its opponents like a berserker, uncaring about any hits it might take. Its arms are mighty enough to snap a telephone pole.

name: Furfrou
pokedexX: Trimming its fluffy fur not only makes  it more elegant but also increases the  swiftness of its movements.
pokedexY: Historically, in the Kalos region, these PokÃ©mon were the designated guardians of the king.
pokedexOR: Trimming its fluffy fur not only makes it more elegant but also increases the swiftness of its movements.
pokedexAS: Historically, in the Kalos region, these PokÃ©mon were the designated guardians of the king.

name: Espurr
pokedexX: The organ that emits its intense psychic power is sheltered by its ears to keep power from leaking out.
pokedexY: It has enough psychic energy to blast everything within 300 feet of itself, but it has no control over its power.
pokedexOR: The organ that emits its intense psychic power is sheltered by its ears to keep power from leaking out.
pokedexAS: It has enough psychic energy to blast everything within 300 feet of itself, but it has no control over its power.

name: Meowstic-M
pokedexX: When in danger, it raises its ears and releases enough psychic power to grind a 10-ton truck into dust.
pokedexY: The eyeball patterns on the interior of its ears emit psychic energy. It keeps the patterns tightly covered because that power is too immense.
pokedexOR: When in danger, it raises its ears and releases enough psychic power to grind a 10-ton truck into dust.
pokedexAS: The eyeball patterns on the interior of its ears emit psychic energy. It keeps the patterns tightly covered because that power is too immense.

name: Honedge
pokedexX: Apparently this PokÃ©mon is born when a departed spirit inhabits a sword. It attaches itself to people and drinks their life force.
pokedexY: If anyone dares to grab its hilt, it wraps a blue cloth around that person's arm and drains that person's life energy completely.
pokedexOR: Apparently this PokÃ©mon is born when a departed spirit inhabits a sword. It attaches itself to people and drinks their life force.
pokedexAS: If anyone dares to grab its hilt, it wraps a blue cloth around that person's arm and drains that person's life energy completely.

name: Doublade
pokedexX: When Honedge evolves, it divides into two swords, which cooperate via telepathy to coordinate attacks and slash their enemies to ribbons.
pokedexY: The complex attack patterns of its two swords are unstoppable, even for an opponent greatly accomplished at swordplay.
pokedexOR: When Honedge evolves, it divides into two swords, which cooperate via telepathy to coordinate attacks and slash their enemies to ribbons.
pokedexAS: The complex attack patterns of its two swords are unstoppable, even for an opponent greatly accomplished at swordplay.

name: Aegislash-Shield
pokedexX: Generations of kings were attended by these PokÃ©mon, which used their spectral power to manipulate and control people and PokÃ©mon.
pokedexY: Apparently, it can detect the innate qualities of leadership. According to legend, whoever it recognizes is destined to become king.
pokedexOR: Generations of kings were attended by these PokÃ©mon, which used their spectral power to manipulate and control people and PokÃ©mon.
pokedexAS: Apparently, it can detect the innate qualities of leadership. According to legend, whoever it recognizes is destined to become king.

name: Spritzee
pokedexX: It emits a scent that enraptures those who smell it. This fragance changes depending on what it has eaten.
pokedexY: In the past, rather than using perfume, royal ladies carried a Spritzee that would waft a fragrance they liked.
pokedexOR: It emits a scent that enraptures those who smell it. This fragrance changes depending on what it has eaten.
pokedexAS: In the past, rather than using perfume, royal ladies carried a Spritzee that would waft a fragrance they liked.

name: Aromatisse
pokedexX: It devises various scents, pleasant and unpleasant, and emits scents that its enemies dislike in order to gain an edge in battle.
pokedexY: Its scent is so overpowering that, unless a Trainer happens to really enjoy the smell, he or she will have a hard time walking alongside it.
pokedexOR: It devises various scents, pleasant and unpleasant, and emits scents that its enemies dislike in order to gain an edge in battle.
pokedexAS: Its scent is so overpowering that, unless a Trainer happens to really enjoy the smell, he or she will have a hard time walking alongside it.

name: Swirlix
pokedexX: To entangle its opponents in battle, it extrudes  white threads as sweet and sticky as cotton candy.
pokedexY: Because it eats nothing but sweets, its fur is as sticky sweet as cotton candy.
pokedexOR: To entangle its opponents in battle, it extrudes white threads as sweet and sticky as cotton candy.
pokedexAS: Because it eats nothing but sweets, its fur is as sticky sweet as cotton candy.

name: Slurpuff
pokedexX: It can distinguish the faintest of scents. It puts its sensitive sense of smell to use by helping pastry chefs in their work.
pokedexY: Its sense of smell is 100 million times better than a human's, so even the faintest scent tells it about everything in the area. It's like it can see with its nose!
pokedexOR: It can distinguish the faintest of scents. It puts its sensitive sense of smell to use by helping pastry chefs in their work.
pokedexAS: Its sense of smell is 100 million times better than a human's, so even the faintest scent tells it about everything in the area. It's like it can see with its nose!

name: Inkay
pokedexX: Opponents who stare at the flashing of the  light-emitting spots on its body become dazed and lose their will to fight.
pokedexY: It flashes the light-emitting spots on its body, which drains its opponent's will to fight. It takes the opportunity to scuttle away and hide.
pokedexOR: Opponents who stare at the flashing of the light-emitting spots on its body become dazed and lose their will to fight.
pokedexAS: It flashes the light-emitting spots on its body, which drains its opponent's will to fight. It takes the opportunity to scuttle away and hide.

name: Malamar
pokedexX: It wields the most compelling hypnotic powers of any PokÃ©mon, and it forces others to do whatever it wants.
pokedexY: It lures its prey close with hypnotic motions, then wraps its tentacles around it before finishing it off with digestive fluids.
pokedexOR: It wields the most compelling hypnotic powers of any PokÃ©mon, and it forces others to do whatever it wants.
pokedexAS: It lures its prey close with hypnotic motions, then wraps its tentacles around it before finishing it off with digestive fluids.

name: Binacle
pokedexX: Two Binacle live together on one rock. When they fight, one of them will move to a different rock.
pokedexY: They stretch and then contract, yanking their rocks along with them in bold hops. They eat  seaweed that washes up on the shoreline.
pokedexOR: Two Binacle live together on one rock. When they fight, one of them will move to a different rock.
pokedexAS: They stretch and then contract, yanking their rocks along with them in bold hops. They eat seaweed that washes up on the shoreline.

name: Barbaracle
pokedexX: When they evolve, two Binacle multiply into seven. They fight with the power of seven Binacle.
pokedexY: Barbaracle's legs and hands have minds of their own, and they will move independently. But they usually follow the head's orders.
pokedexOR: When they evolve, two Binacle multiply into seven. They fight with the power of seven Binacle.
pokedexAS: Barbaracle's legs and hands have minds of their own, and they will move independently. But they usually follow the head's orders.

name: Skrelp
pokedexX: Camouflaged as rotten kelp, they spray liquid poison on prey that approaches unawares and then finish it off.
pokedexY: It looks just like rotten kelp. It hides from foes while storing up power for its evolution.
pokedexOR: Camouflaged as rotten kelp, they spray liquid poison on prey that approaches unawares and then finish it off.
pokedexAS: It looks just like rotten kelp. It hides from foes while storing up power for its evolution.

name: Dragalge
pokedexX: Their poison is strong enough to eat through the hull of a tanker, and they spit it indiscriminately at anything that enters their territory.
pokedexY: Tales are told of ships that wander into seas where Dragalge live, never to return.
pokedexOR: Their poison is strong enough to eat through the hull of a tanker, and they spit it indiscriminately at anything that enters their territory.
pokedexAS: Tales are told of ships that wander into seas where Dragalge live, never to return.

name: Clauncher
pokedexX: They knock down flying prey by firing  compressed water from their massive  claws like shooting a pistol.
pokedexY: Through controlled explosions of internal gas, it can expel water like a pistol shot. At close distances, it can shatter rock.
pokedexOR: They knock down flying prey by firing compressed water from their massive claws like shooting a pistol.
pokedexAS: Through controlled explosions of internal gas, it can expel water like a pistol shot. At close distances, it can shatter rock.

name: Clawitzer
pokedexX: Their enormous claws launch cannonballs of water powerful enough to pierce tanker hulls.
pokedexY: By expelling water from the nozzle in the back of its claw, it can move at a speed of 60 knots.
pokedexOR: Their enormous claws launch cannonballs of water powerful enough to pierce tanker hulls.
pokedexAS: By expelling water from the nozzle in the back of its claw, it can move at a speed of 60 knots.

name: Helioptile
pokedexX: They make their home in deserts. They can  generate their energy from basking in the sun,  so eating food is not a requirement.
pokedexY: The frills on either side of its head have cells that generate electricity when exposed to sunlight.
pokedexOR: They make their home in deserts. They can generate their energy from basking in the sun, so eating food is not a requirement.
pokedexAS: The frills on either side of its head have cells that generate electricity when exposed to sunlight.

name: Heliolisk
pokedexX: They flare their frills and generate energy. A single Heliolisk can generate sufficient electricity to power a skyscraper.
pokedexY: It stimulates its muscles with electricity, boosting the strength in its legs and enabling it to run 100 yards in five seconds.
pokedexOR: They flare their frills and generate energy. A single Heliolisk can generate sufficient electricity to power a skyscraper.
pokedexAS: It stimulates its muscles with electricity, boosting the strength in its legs and enabling it to run 100 yards in five seconds.

name: Tyrunt
pokedexX: This PokÃ©mon was restored from a fossil. If something happens that it doesn't like, it throws a tantrum and runs wild.
pokedexY: Its immense jaws have enough destructive force that it can chew up an automobile. It lived 100 million years ago.
pokedexOR: This PokÃ©mon was restored from a fossil. If something happens that it doesn't like, it throws a tantrum and runs wild.
pokedexAS: Its immense jaws have enough destructive force that it can chew up an automobile. It lived 100 million years ago.

name: Tyrantrum
pokedexX: Thanks to its gargantuan jaws, which could shred thick metal plates as if they were paper, it was invincible in the ancient world it once inhabited.
pokedexY: Nothing could stop this PokÃ©mon 100 million years ago, so it behaved like a king.
pokedexOR: Thanks to its gargantuan jaws, which could shred thick metal plates as if they were paper, it was invincible in the ancient world it once inhabited.
pokedexAS: Nothing could stop this PokÃ©mon 100 million years ago, so it behaved like a king.

name: Amaura
pokedexX: This ancient PokÃ©mon was restored  from part of its body that had been  frozen in ice for over 100 million years.
pokedexY: This calm PokÃ©mon lived in a cold land where there were no violent predators like Tyrantrum.
pokedexOR: This ancient PokÃ©mon was restored from part of its body that had been frozen in ice for over 100 million years.
pokedexAS: This calm PokÃ©mon lived in a cold land where there were no violent predators like Tyrantrum.

name: Aurorus
pokedexX: The diamond-shaped crystals on its body expel air as cold as -240 degrees Fahrenheit, surrounding its enemies and encasing them in ice.
pokedexY: Using its diamond-shaped crystals, it can instantly create a wall of ice to block an opponent's attack.
pokedexOR: The diamond-shaped crystals on its body expel air as cold as -240 degrees Fahrenheit, surrounding its enemies and encasing them in ice.
pokedexAS: Using its diamond-shaped crystals, it can instantly create a wall of ice to block an opponent's attack.

name: Sylveon
pokedexX: It sends a soothing aura from its ribbonlike feelers to calm fights.
pokedexY: It wraps its ribbonlike feelers around the arm of its beloved Trainer and walks with him or her.
pokedexOR: It sends a soothing aura from its ribbonlike feelers to calm fights.
pokedexAS: It wraps its ribbonlike feelers around the arm of its beloved Trainer and walks with him or her.

name: Hawlucha
pokedexX: Although its body is small, its proficient fighting skills enable it to keep up with big bruisers like Machamp and Hariyama.
pokedexY: With its wings, it controls its position in the air. It likes to attack from above, a maneuver that is difficult to defend against.
pokedexOR: Although its body is small, its proficient fighting skills enable it to keep up with big bruisers like Machamp and Hariyama.
pokedexAS: With its wings, it controls its position in the air. It likes to attack from above, a maneuver that is difficult to defend against.

name: Dedenne
pokedexX: Its whiskers serve as antennas. By sending and  receiving electrical waves, it can communicate  with others over vast distances.
pokedexY: It uses its tail to absorb electricity from power plants or from outlets in houses, and then it fires the electricity from its whiskers.
pokedexOR: Its whiskers serve as antennas. By sending and receiving electrical waves, it can communicate with others over vast distances.
pokedexAS: It uses its tail to absorb electricity from power plants or from outlets in houses, and then it fires the electricity from its whiskers.

name: Carbink
pokedexX: Born from the temperatures and pressures deep underground, it fires beams from the stone in its head.
pokedexY: It has slept underground for hundreds of millions of years since its birth. It's occasionally found during the excavation of caves.
pokedexOR: Born from the temperatures and pressures deep underground, it fires beams from the stone in its head.
pokedexAS: It has slept underground for hundreds of millions of years since its birth. It's occasionally found during the excavation of caves.

name: Goomy
pokedexX: The weakest Dragon-Type PokÃ©mon, it lives in damp, shady places, so its body doesn't dry out.
pokedexY: It's covered in a slimy membrane that makes any punches or kicks slide off it harmlessly.
pokedexOR: The weakest Dragon-type PokÃ©mon, it lives in damp, shady places, so its body doesn't dry out.
pokedexAS: It's covered in a slimy membrane that makes any punches or kicks slide off it harmlessly.

name: Sliggoo
pokedexX: It drives away opponents by excreting a  sticky liquid that can dissolve anything.  Its eyes devolved, so it can't see anything.
pokedexY: Its four horns are a high-performance radar system. It uses them to sense sounds and smells, rather than using ears or a nose.
pokedexOR: It drives away opponents by excreting a sticky liquid that can dissolve anything. Its eyes devolved, so it can't see anything.
pokedexAS: Its four horns are a high-performance radar system. It uses them to sense sounds and smells, rather than using ears or a nose.

name: Goodra
pokedexX: This very friendly Dragon-type PokÃ©mon will hug its beloved Trainer, leaving that Trainer covered in sticky slime.
pokedexY: It attacks with retractable horns. It throws a punch that's the equivalent of the force of a hundred pro boxers.
pokedexOR: This very friendly Dragon-type PokÃ©mon will hug its beloved Trainer, leaving that Trainer covered in sticky slime.
pokedexAS: It attacks with retractable horns. It throws a punch that's the equivalent of the force of a hundred pro boxers.

name: Klefki
pokedexX: These key collectors threaten any attackers by fiercely jingling their keys at them.
pokedexY: It never lets go of a key that it likes, so people give it the keys to vaults and safes as a way to prevent crime.
pokedexOR: These key collectors threaten any attackers by fiercely jingling their keys at them.
pokedexAS: It never lets go of a key that it likes, so people give it the keys to vaults and safes as a way to prevent crime.

name: Phantump
pokedexX: These PokÃ©mon are created when spirits possess rotten tree stumps. They prefer to live in abandoned forests.
pokedexY: According to old tales, these PokÃ©mon are stumps possessed by the spirits of children who died while lost in the forest.
pokedexOR: These PokÃ©mon are created when spirits possess rotten tree stumps. They prefer to live in abandoned forests.
pokedexAS: According to old tales, these PokÃ©mon are stumps possessed by the spirits of children who died while lost in the forest.

name: Trevenant
pokedexX: It can control trees at will. It will trap people who harm the forest, so they can never leave.
pokedexY: Using its roots as a nervous system, it controls the trees in the forest. It's kind to the PokÃ©mon that reside in its body.
pokedexOR: It can control trees at will. It will trap people who harm the forest, so they can never leave.
pokedexAS: Using its roots as a nervous system, it controls the trees in the forest. It's kind to the PokÃ©mon that reside in its body.

name: Pumpkaboo-Average
pokedexX: The pumpkin body is inhabited by a spirit trapped in this world. As the sun sets, it becomes restless and active.
pokedexY: It is said to carry wandering spirits to the place where they belong so they can move on.
pokedexOR: The pumpkin body is inhabited by a spirit trapped in this world. As the sun sets, it becomes restless and active.
pokedexAS: It is said to carry wandering spirits to the place where they belong so they can move on.

name: Gourgeist-Average
pokedexX: Singing in eerie voices, they wander town streets on the night of the new moon. Anyone who hears their song is cursed.
pokedexY: It enwraps its prey in its hairlike arms. It sings joyfully as it observes the suffering of its prey.
pokedexOR: Singing in eerie voices, they wander town streets on the night of the new moon. Anyone who hears their song is cursed.
pokedexAS: It enwraps its prey in its hairlike arms. It sings joyfully as it observes the suffering of its prey.

name: Bergmite
pokedexX: It blocks opponents' attacks with the ice that shields its body. It uses cold air to repair any cracks with new ice.
pokedexY: Using air of -150 degrees Fahrenheit, they freeze opponents solid. They live in herds above the snow line on mountains.
pokedexOR: It blocks opponents' attacks with the ice that shields its body. It uses cold air to repair any cracks with new ice.
pokedexAS: Using air of -150 degrees Fahrenheit, they freeze opponents solid. They live in herds above the snow line on mountains.

name: Avalugg
pokedexX: Its ice-covered body is as hard as steel. Its cumbersome frame crushes anything that stands in its way.
pokedexY: The way several Bergmite huddle on its back makes it look like an aircraft carrier made of ice.
pokedexOR: Its ice-covered body is as hard as steel. Its cumbersome frame crushes anything that stands in its way.
pokedexAS: The way several Bergmite huddle on its back makes it look like an aircraft carrier made of ice.

name: Noibat
pokedexX: They live in pitch-black caves. Their enormous ears can emit ultrasonic waves of 200,000 hertz.
pokedexY: Even a robust wrestler will become dizzy and unable to stand when exposed to its 200,000-hertz ultrasonic waves.
pokedexOR: They live in pitch-black caves. Their enormous ears can emit ultrasonic waves of 200,000 hertz.
pokedexAS: Even a robust wrestler will become dizzy and unable to stand when exposed to its 200,000-hertz ultrasonic waves.

name: Noivern
pokedexX: They fly around on moonless nights and attack careless prey. Nothing can beat them in a battle in the dark.
pokedexY: The ultrasonic waves it emits from its ears can reduce a large boulder to pebbles. It swoops out of the dark to attack.
pokedexOR: They fly around on moonless nights and attack careless prey. Nothing can beat them in a battle in the dark.
pokedexAS: The ultrasonic waves it emits from its ears can reduce a large boulder to pebbles. It swoops out of the dark to attack.

name: Xerneas
pokedexX: Legends say it can share eternal life. It slept for a thousand years in the form of a tree before its revival.
pokedexY: When the horns on its head shine in seven colors, it is said to be sharing everlasting life.
pokedexOR: Legends say it can share eternal life. It slept for a thousand years in the form of a tree before its revival.
pokedexAS: When the horns on its head shine in seven colors, it is said to be sharing everlasting life.

name: Yveltal
pokedexX: When this legendary PokÃ©mon's wings and tail feathers spread wide and glow red, it absorbs the life force of living creatures.
pokedexY: When its life comes to an end, it absorbs the life energy of every living thing and turns into a cocoon once more.
pokedexOR: When this legendary PokÃ©mon's wings and tail feathers spread wide and glow red, it absorbs the life force of living creatures.
pokedexAS: When its life comes to an end, it absorbs the life energy of every living thing and turns into a cocoon once more.

name: Zygarde
pokedexX: When the Kalos region's ecosystem falls into disarray, it appears and reveals its secret power.
pokedexY: It's hypothesized that it's monitoring those who destroy the ecosystem from deep in the cave where it lives.
pokedexOR: When the Kalos region's ecosystem falls into disarray, it appears and reveals its secret power.
pokedexAS: It's hypothesized that it's monitoring those who destroy the ecosystem from deep in the cave where it lives.
